K03psp_4u:1: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:248: triṣv adhvasu trayāṇām adhvanām anupalabdhitām upādāya.
K03psp_4u:375: ity ākārāḥ sarvākārajñatādhiṣṭhānāḥ ity uktā ākārāḥ
K03psp_4u:376: atha khalu śakrasya devānām indrasyaitad abhavat,
K03psp_4u:377: pūrvajinakṛtādhikārās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:378: yeṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:379: yeṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:380: yeṣām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśrotrāvabhāsam āgamiṣyati. kaḥ punar vādo ya udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:381: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathatvāya pratipatsyante,
K03psp_4u:382: bahubuddhaparyupāsitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_4u:383: śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:384: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya tathatvāya pratipatsyante paripṛṣṭhāś ca
K03psp_4u:385: pūrvakā api taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ
K03psp_4u:387: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante. bahubuddhakoṭīṣu te dānapāramitāyāṃ caritāḥ,
K03psp_4u:388: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ bahubuddhakoṭīṣu te prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:9)
K03psp_4u:389: caritā, ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
K03psp_4u:390: atha khalu āyuṣmāñ cchāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:391: ye bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imām evaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:392: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:393: yathā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tathā te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā dhārayitavyāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:394: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā. na khalu pūrvam acaritena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śakyeyaṃ
K03psp_4u:395: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktum. ye punar bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā
K03psp_4u:396: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratikṣeptavyāṃ maṃsyante pūrvāntato 'pi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ
K03psp_4u:397: kuladuhitṛbhiś ca iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pratiksiptā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:398: tathā hi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāsti
K03psp_4u:399: śraddhā nāsti prasādo nāsti prema nāsty adhimuktis taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś
K03psp_4u:400: ca na buddhā vā bodhisattvā vā pratyekabuddhā vā śrāvakā vā paripraśnīkṛtāḥ,
K03psp_4u:431: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:432: gambhīrā bhadanta śāriputra prajñāpāramitā. kim atrāścaryaṃ syāt?
K03psp_4u:433: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvānte 'pi nādhimuktā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
K03psp_4u:442: daśatathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu pañcasv abhijñāsu nādhimuktāḥ,
K03psp_4u:443: aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu nādhimuktāḥ. ye pratikṣipeyur iti nātrāścaryam.
K03psp_4u:444: namaskaromi bhagavatyai prajñāpāramitāyai sarvajñajñānasya sa namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ
K03psp_4u:446: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:447: evam etat kauśikaivam etat. sarvajñajñānasya sa namaskāraṃ karoti,
K03psp_4u:448: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā namaskāraṃ karoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:449: ato nirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvākārajñatā,
K03psp_4u:450: sarvākārajñatānirjātā ca prajñāpāramitā prabhāvyante. sarvajñatāṃ kauśikātikramitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam,
K03psp_4u:451: evaṃ mārgajñatāyāṃ sthātukāmena sarvākārajñatājñānam utpādayitukāmena sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān
K03psp_4u:453: kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam,
K03psp_4u:454: evaṃ srotaāpattiphale sattvān sthāpayitukāmena sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve sattvān sthāpayitukāmena pratyekāyāṃ bodhau sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayitukāmena,
K03psp_4u:456: bhikṣusaṃghaṃ parikarṣayitukāmena iha bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpattavyam.
K03psp_4u:457: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:458: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bhavati?
K03psp_4u:463: kathaṃ vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yogam āpadyate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ yogam āpadyate?
K03psp_4u:464: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran saptatriṃsadbodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu yogam āpadyate?
K03psp_4u:465: evam apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu. kathaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu yogam āpadyate?
K03psp_4u:466: evam aṣṭavimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu yogam āpadyate. katham abhijñāsu yogam āpadyate?
K03psp_4u:467: evaṃ daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu. katham aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran yogam āpadyante bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
K03psp_4u:468: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:469: sādhu sādhu kauśika sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ kauśika yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam arthaṃ
K03psp_4u:470: paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase. idam api te kauśika buddhānubhāvena pratibhānam utpannam.
K03psp_4u:471: tena hi kauśika śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te. iti catvāraḥ prayoktākāraḥ
K03psp_4u:472: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:473: yadā rūpe na tiṣṭhati tadā rūpe na yogam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:475: vijñāne na tiṣṭhati yadā vijñāne na tiṣṭhati tadā vijñāne na yogam āpadyate. cakṣuṣi na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:476: evaṃ śrotre ghrāṇe jihvāyāṃ kāye manasi na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:477: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:478: evaṃ śabde gandhe rase spraṣṭavye dharmeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:479: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. cakṣurvijñāne na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:485: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. pṛthivīdhātau na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:488: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. avidyāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:489: evaṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne nāmarūpe ṣaḍāyatane sparśe vedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇāyām upādāne bhave jātau jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāseṣu na
K03psp_4u:490: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. dānapāramitāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:491: evaṃ śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:492: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:493: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:494: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. smṛtyupasthāneṣu na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:495: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:496: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ caturṣv apramāṇeṣu caturṣu dhyāneṣu catasṛṣv
K03psp_4u:497: ārūpyasamāpattiṣu pañcasv abhijñāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣv aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu navasv
K03psp_4u:499: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. evaṃ daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu vaiśāradyeṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
K03psp_4u:500: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:501: tathā hi sa rūpaṃ nopalabhate yatrāvatiṣṭheta yatra vā yogam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:503: vijñānaṃ nopalabhate yatrāvatiṣṭheta yatra vā yogam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:504: evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni pāramitāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣān dharmān
K03psp_4u:507: catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān nopalabhate yatrāvatiṣṭheta yatra vā yogam āpadyate.
K03psp_4u:509: punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na yujyate,
K03psp_4u:510: yad rūpe na yujyate evaṃ rūpe yogam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:517: buddhadharmeṣu na yujyate yad buddhadharmeṣu na yujyate,
K03psp_4u:518: evaṃ buddhadharmeṣu yogam āpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:519: tathā hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntato rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
K03psp_4u:525: madhyato vijñānaṃ nopalabhate. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni pāramitāḥ
K03psp_4u:527: aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvavihārasamāpattyabhijñāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhīn sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_4u:531: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:546: vijñānaduravagāhatayā śāriputra duravagāhā prajñāpāramitā. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ
K03psp_4u:560: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
K03psp_4u:562: sacec chāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ gambhīram iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_4u:564: vijñānaṃ gambhīram iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:566: gambhīrā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:567: tathā hi yā śāriputra yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ gambhīratā na te buddhadharmāḥ.
K03psp_4u:569: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ duravagāham iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_4u:571: vijñānaṃ duravagāham iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:573: duravagāhā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:574: tathā hi yā śāriputra yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ duravagāhatā na te buddhadharmāḥ.
K03psp_4u:576: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:15)
K03psp_4u:577: caran rūpam apramāṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_4u:579: vijñānam apramāṇam iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:581: apramāṇā iti na carati carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:582: tathā hi yā śāriputra yāvad buddhadharmāpramāṇatā na te buddhadharmāḥ.
K03psp_4u:585: yathā gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duravagāhā apramāṇā iyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_4u:586: tathā navayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ purato na vaktavyā mā
K03psp_4u:587: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā uttrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
K03psp_4u:588: avinivartanīyasya yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyo sa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_4u:589: śrutvā nottrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsam āpatsyate na kāṅkṣayiṣyati na nirvicikitsiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:591: atha khalu śakro devānām indra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:592: saced bhadanta śāriputra navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta ko doṣaḥ syāt?
K03psp_4u:594: sacet kauśika navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_4u:595: bhāṣyeta uttrasyeta saṃtrasyeta saṃtrāsam āpadyeta pratibādhyeta pratikṣipet. nādhimucyeta
K03psp_4u:596: sthānam etat kauśika vidyate yas sa navayānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ
K03psp_4u:598: sa kṛcchreṇa cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta. iti kṛcchre cirābhisaṃbodhaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:599: śakra āha: santi punar bhadanta śāriputra avyākṛtā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
K03psp_4u:601: na te kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvāś cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyante anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. ya imāṃ (PSP_4:16)
K03psp_4u:602: prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
K03psp_4u:603: te ekaṃ vā dvau vā trīn vā tathāgatān atikramiṣyanti. tato vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyante
K03psp_4u:605: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
K03psp_4u:607: cirayānasaṃprasthitās te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti. ciracaritāḥ
K03psp_4u:608: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bahubuddhaparyupāsitās te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ
K03psp_4u:609: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante.
K03psp_4u:610: uttare ca śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:612: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:613: pratibhāti me bhagavan pratibhāti me sugata.
K03psp_4u:617: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan svapnāntaragato mahāyānasaṃprasthitaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayet,
K03psp_4u:618: dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayet,
K03psp_4u:620: veditavyam etad bhagavann abhyāsannī bhavaty ayaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. kaḥ punar vādo?
K03psp_4u:622: dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayet,
K03psp_4u:623: veditavyam etad bhagavann abhyāsannī bhavaty ayaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. iti vyākaraṇalābhaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:624: paripakvakuśalamūlās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:625: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyante śravaṇāya śrutvā ca pratipatsyante. cirayānasaṃprasthitās te bhagavan kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca
K03psp_4u:626: avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitāḥ kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:627: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti
K03psp_4u:628: paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. abhyāsannās te bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
K03psp_4u:629: ca bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇasya vyākariṣyanti vā, (PSP_4:17)
K03psp_4u:630: avinivartanīyā vā te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher,
K03psp_4u:631: yeṣāṃ svayam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. ity avinivartanīyaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:632: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikād aṭavīkāntārān niṣkrāmet,
K03psp_4u:634: niṣkrāmen niṣkramya paśyed grāmasya nagarasya nigamasya vā pūrvāni nimittāni gopālakān
K03psp_4u:635: vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmān vā vanāni vā udyānāni vā udyānanimittāni vā grāmān
K03psp_4u:636: vā nagarāṇi vā nigamān vā rājadhānīn vā rāṣṭrāṇi vā pūrvanimittāni grāmasya nagarasya
K03psp_4u:637: nigamasya vā dṛṣṭvaivaṃ bhavati yādṛśānīmāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante abhyāsanna ito
K03psp_4u:638: grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā rājadhānyo vā rāṣṭrāṇi vā bhaviṣyanti. sa āśvāsaprāpto bhavet,
K03psp_4u:639: na cāsya bhūyo bhavati caurabhayaṃ vā caṇḍālabhayaṃ vā caṇḍamṛgabhayaṃ vā bubhukṣābhayaṃ
K03psp_4u:640: vā pipāsābhayaṃ vā. evam eva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svayam iyaṃ
K03psp_4u:641: gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati
K03psp_4u:643: veditavyam etad bhagavann abhyāsanno 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati vyākaraṇasyānuttarāyāḥ
K03psp_4u:644: samyaksaṃbodher na cireṇābhisaṃbhotsyate. tena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na bhetavyaṃ
K03psp_4u:645: śrāvakabhūmer vā pratyekabuddhabhūmer vā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:646: imāni tāni pūrvanimittāni yad utemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya.
K03psp_4u:647: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:648: evam etac chāriputraivam etat. iti niryāṇaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:649: pratibhātu te śāriputra bhūyasyā mātrayā buddhānubhāvena.
K03psp_4u:651: tadyathā pi nāma bhagavan puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
K03psp_4u:652: sa gacchet mahāsamudraṃ darśanāya yathā yathā gacchet mahāsamudraṃ tathā tathā paśyet stambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ
K03psp_4u:653: tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre ito mahāsamudro nāsanna (PSP_4:18)
K03psp_4u:655: na hi mahāsamudrasyābhyāse kaścit stambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ vā dṛśyante. tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
K03psp_4u:656: sa yathā yathā gacchet mahāsamudraṃ darśanāya tathā tathā na paśyet stambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
K03psp_4u:657: tasyaivaṃ bhavati na dūre ito mahāsamudra āsanna ito mahāsamudraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:658: na hi mahāsamudrasyāsanne kaścit stambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ vā dṛśyate,
K03psp_4u:659: kiṃ cāpi sa puruṣaś cakṣuṣā mahāsamudran na paśyati. atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati,
K03psp_4u:661: neto bhūyo dūre mahāsamudra iti. evam eva bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ veditavyam,
K03psp_4u:662: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇutā udgṛhṇatā dhārayatā vācayatā paryavāpnuvatā yoniśo manasikurvatā,
K03psp_4u:663: evaṃ cintayitavyaṃ kiṃ cāpy ahaṃ tena bhagavatā na saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:664: samyaksaṃbodhau iyadbhiḥ kalpair iyadbhiḥ kalpaśatair iyadbhiḥ kalpasahasrair iyadbhiḥ
K03psp_4u:665: kalpaśatasahasrair iyadbhiḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrais tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:667: atha ca punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ veditavyam,
K03psp_4u:668: āsannībhūto 'smy anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vyākaraṇasyeti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:669: tathā hy aham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhe darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya
K03psp_4u:670: śravaṇāya śrutvā codgṛhṇāmi dhārayāmi vācayāmi paryavāpnomi yoniśaś ca manasikaromi.
K03psp_4u:672: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu stambheṣu ākarajāteṣu
K03psp_4u:673: veditavyaṃ jāmbūdvīpakair manuṣyair netaś cireṇa patrāṇi ca puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
K03psp_4u:675: imāni tāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyante netaś cireṇa patrāṇi ca puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:676: āttamanaskā jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā bhaviṣyanti tāni ca pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭvā stambeṣu,
K03psp_4u:677: evam eva bhagavan yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravanāya śrutvā (PSP_4:19)
K03psp_4u:678: codgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
K03psp_4u:679: bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ. veditavyam
K03psp_4u:680: etad bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvakair eva kuśalamūlair upanīto
K03psp_4u:682: yo 'ham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhe darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya
K03psp_4u:683: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyeyaṃ tatra devaputrāḥ pūrvabuddhadarśino
K03psp_4u:684: bhavanti. te pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ pūrvakāṇām api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
K03psp_4u:685: imāny eva pūrvanimittāni abhūvan vyākaraṇāya na cireṇāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_4u:688: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strīgurviṇī sā yathā yathā āsannaprasavā bhavati tathā tathāsyāḥ kāyo veṣṭate 'dhimātraṃ ca kāye vedanāklamathaś ca
K03psp_4u:693: tābhir vedanābhir vartamānābhir alpabhāṣyā ca bhavati,
K03psp_4u:695: tena pūrvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena bhāvitena niṣevitena imām evaṃrūpāṃ vedanāṃ
K03psp_4u:696: pratyanubhavāmīti. veditavyam evaṃ tato 'nyābhiḥ strībhir yādṛśāny asyāḥ striyo nimittāni
K03psp_4u:697: dṛśyante na cireṇaiveyaṃ strī prasaviṣyati. evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām
K03psp_4u:699: paripakvakuśalamūlānām iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upapatsyate upapannāṃ ca satīm
K03psp_4u:700: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:701: veditavyam etan na cireṇaiṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vyākaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:703: sādhu sādhu śāriputra idam api te śāriputra buddhānubhāvena pratibhānam utpannam. iti kṣiprābhisaṃbodhaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:704: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:705: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad anugṛhītāḥ suparīttāś ceme bodhisattvā mahāsattvās (PSP_4:20)
K03psp_4u:708: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya pratipannā
K03psp_4u:709: lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāñ ca manuṣyānāñ cānuttarāyai
K03psp_4u:710: samyaksaṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhante bodhisattvacaryāñ caranto 'nekāni sattvaśatāni anekāni
K03psp_4u:711: sattvasahasrāṇi anekāni sattvaśatasahasrāṇi anekāni sattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anugrahīṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:712: caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhir dānena priyavadyena arthacaryayā samānārthatayā daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayanti,
K03psp_4u:713: caturṣu dhyāneṣu caturṣv apramāṇeṣu catasṛṣv ārūpyasamāpattiṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā
K03psp_4u:714: caiteṣu dharmeṣu pratiṣṭhitā bhavanti. ātmanā ca dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca
K03psp_4u:715: dānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:716: pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:717: pratiṣṭhāpayanti. ātmanā ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
K03psp_4u:718: ātmanā ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca dhyānapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
K03psp_4u:719: ātmanā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti parāṃś ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
K03psp_4u:720: te ca prajñāpāramitām āgamya upāyakauśalyena sattvān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayanti
K03psp_4u:721: na cātmanā sākṣāt kurvanti. evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphale anāgāmiphale arhattve,
K03psp_4u:722: pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayanti na cātmanā pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣāt kurvanti.
K03psp_4u:723: ātmanā cāvinivartanīyāṃ bhūmim ākrāmanti parāṃś cāvinivartanīyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayanti.
K03psp_4u:725: anyāṃś ca bodhisattvān buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sattvān paripācayanti
K03psp_4u:726: parāṃś ca sattvaparipāke samādāpayanti. ātmanā cābhijñā utpādayanti parāṃś cābhijñāprāptaye
K03psp_4u:727: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca dhāraṇīmukhaṃ pariśodhayanti parān api dhāraṇīmukhapariśuddhaye
K03psp_4u:728: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca pratibhānasaṃpadaṃ pratilabhante parān api pratibhānasaṃpadi
K03psp_4u:729: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca rūpasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti parān api rūpasaṃpatpratilābhāya
K03psp_4u:730: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca lakṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti parān api (PSP_4:21)
K03psp_4u:731: lakṣaṇasaṃpatpratilābhāya samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca kumārabhūtasaṃpadaṃ parigṛhṇanti
K03psp_4u:732: parān api kumārabhūtasaṃpatpratigrahāya samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca bodhipakṣyān dharmān
K03psp_4u:733: niṣpādayanti parān api bodhipakṣyadharmapariniṣpattaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca satyavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitadhāraṇīmukhān
K03psp_4u:734: utpādayanti parān apy eṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni utpādayanti
K03psp_4u:735: parān api caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvida utpādayanti
K03psp_4u:736: parān api caturaḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ prāptaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:737: mahāmuditāṃ mahopekṣāṃ vibhāvayanti parān api caturapramāṇā vibhāvanāyai samādāpayanti.
K03psp_4u:738: ātmanā cāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān niṣpādayanti parān api aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu
K03psp_4u:739: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti parāṃś ca sarvākārajñatāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:740: samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān vijahanti parān api sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśotsargāya
K03psp_4u:741: samādāpayanti. ātmanā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante parāṃś ca samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:742: abhisaṃbodhaye samādāpayanti. ātmanā ca dharmacakraṃ pravartayanti parāṃś ca dharmacakraṃ
K03psp_4u:745: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:746: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad bahuguṇasamanvāgatās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K03psp_4u:747: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K03psp_4u:748: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati?
K03psp_4u:750: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpasya vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:751: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:755: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
K03psp_4u:756: pāramitānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām
K03psp_4u:759: sarvaśūnyatānāṃ sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāñ
K03psp_4u:760: catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vṛddhiṃ na samanupaśyati
K03psp_4u:764: yadā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpasya parihāṇiṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:765: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:767: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapāramitābodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇa
K03psp_4u:770: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. ity avṛddhyaparihāṇiprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:771: punar aparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dharma iti na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:776: kuśalam akuśalaṃ vyākṛtam avyākṛtam iti na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:787: prajñāpāramitān na samanupaśyati yāvat sarvajñatān na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:788: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:789: tathā hi subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇatām upādāya avinivartanīyatām upādāya riktatām upādāya tucchatām upādāya asāratām upādāya vaśikatām
K03psp_4u:796: saṃskārā, vijñānācintyatayā subhūte 'cintyaṃ deśyate. dānapāramitācintyatayā acintyaṃ deśyate,
K03psp_4u:797: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitācintyatayācintyaṃ
K03psp_4u:800: sarvajñatācintyatayā subhūte 'cintyaṃ deśyate. sacet subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_4u:801: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam acintyam iti na saṃjānīte,
K03psp_4u:803: vijñānam acintyam iti na saṃjānīte paripūrayiṣyati prajñāpāramitām. evaṃ dhātvāyatanāni
K03psp_4u:804: pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni pāramitāḥ śūnyatā sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_4u:811: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito bhavati,
K03psp_4u:816: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito bhavati,
K03psp_4u:820: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati,
K03psp_4u:826: vijñānasvabhāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati. evaṃ dhātūn āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaṃ
K03psp_4u:834: sarvajñatāsvabhāvan na kalpayati na vikalpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:839: sarvajñatā acintyā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvam api carito
K03psp_4u:840: bhavati ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlo bhavati bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ
K03psp_4u:850: sarvajñatāgambhīratayā subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā. ity avikalpaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:854: samyaksaṃbodher dātrī dharmacakrapravartikeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā. iti phalaratnadānaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:864: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad asyāṃ gambhirāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bahavo 'ntarāyā utpadyeran.
K03psp_4u:868: tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitā kṣipram eva likhitavyā,
K03psp_4u:869: uddiśatā dhārayatā vācayatā svādhyāyatā yoniśaś ca manasikurvatā,
K03psp_4u:870: bhāvayatā kṣipram eva bhāvayitavyā. mā khalv asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:871: likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:872: bhāvyamānāyāṃ vāntarāyaḥ syād iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:873: sacet subhūte yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā māsena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhet tena
K03psp_4u:874: likhitavyaiva bhavet. saced dvābhyāṃ tribhiś ca caturbhiḥ pañcabhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptabhir
K03psp_4u:875: aṣṭābhir yāvat saṃvatsareṇa likhet tena likhitavyaiva bhaved evam upadeṣṭavyā dhārayitavyā
K03psp_4u:876: vācayitavyā svādhyātavyā yoniśo manasikartavyā. sacet māsena vā bhāvayet tena bhāvayitavyā
K03psp_4u:877: bhavet yāvat saṃvatsareṇa bhāvayet tena bhāvayitavyā bhavet. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:880: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yad asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyāya yogam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:883: kiṃ cāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām udyogam āpadyeta antarāya
K03psp_4u:884: karaṇāya yad utālikhanāya yāvad abhāvanāyai bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
K03psp_4u:885: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhata uddiśato dhārayato vācayataḥ svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato
K03psp_4u:888: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:889: kasya bhagavann anubhāvena māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:890: mahāsattvānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ
K03psp_4u:893: buddhānubhāvena śāriputra māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartuṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:894: mahāsattvānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ
K03psp_4u:895: svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatām. ye 'pi te śāriputra samantā daśasu
K03psp_4u:896: dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_4u:897: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anubhāvāt. te 'pi buddhā bhagavantas tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāhariṣyanti anuparigrahīṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:898: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān na śaknoty antarāyaṃ kartum,
K03psp_4u:899: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatām. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:900: na hi śāriputra buddhair bhagavadbhir anuparigṛhītānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māreṇa pāpīyasā śaknoty antarāyaḥ kartum. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:901: dharmaṃ teṣāṃ śāriputra ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣv asaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣv aprameyā asaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_4u:902: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhato dhārayato vācayata uddiśataḥ
K03psp_4u:903: svādhyāyato yoniśo manasikurvato bhāvayato bodhisattvān mahāsattvān samanvāharanti.
K03psp_4u:905: veditavyaṃ tena śāriputra kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_4u:906: likhatā vā dhārayatā vā vācayatā vā uddiśatā vā svādhyāyatā vā yoniśo manasikurvatā
K03psp_4u:907: vā bhāvayatā vā buddhānubhāvenāham imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhāmi dhārayāmi
K03psp_4u:908: vācayāmi uddiśāmi svādhyāyāmi bhāvayāmi yoniśo manasikaromi.
K03psp_4u:910: yaḥ kaścid bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati
K03psp_4u:911: dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati bhāvayiṣyati
K03psp_4u:917: yathā vadasi yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_4u:918: likhiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśo manasikariṣyati
K03psp_4u:919: bhāvayiṣyati veditavyaṃ śāriputra sarvan tadbuddhānubhāvena sarve te buddhaparigṛhītā bhaviṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:922: jñātās te bhagavan jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te bhagavan māṃsacakṣuṣā
K03psp_4u:923: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvadigbhāge yāvad
K03psp_4u:924: daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
K03psp_4u:926: teṣāñ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
K03psp_4u:927: vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante.
K03psp_4u:930: jñātās te śāriputra jñānena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca dṛṣṭās te śāriputra māṃsacakṣuṣā
K03psp_4u:931: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvad
K03psp_4u:932: daśasu dikṣv aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyās tathāgatā arhantaḥ
K03psp_4u:934: teṣāñ ca ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
K03psp_4u:935: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti bhāvayiṣyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti
K03psp_4u:937: te khalu punar mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā abhyāsannī bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:939: ye 'pi te śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā
K03psp_4u:940: pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyanti. te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
K03psp_4u:941: kuladuhitaraś ca iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām adhimuktibahulā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:942: ye 'pīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ.
K03psp_4u:943: te 'pi śāriputra bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca jñātā dṛṣṭāś ca buddhair bhagavadbhis tathāgatāś ca buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti,
K03psp_4u:944: teṣām api kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca mahārthaṃ mahānuśaṃsaṃ mahāphalaṃ mahāvipākaṃ
K03psp_4u:945: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti. te tena kuśalamūlena na
K03psp_4u:946: jātu buddhair bhagavadbhir virahitā bhaviṣyanti. te na jātv apāyeṣūpapatsyante devamanuṣyeṣūpapatsyamānā
K03psp_4u:947: buddhabodhisattvair avirahitā bhaviṣyanti. avinivartanīyāṃ bhūmiṃ cātikramiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:948: te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā tenaiva kuśalamūlena na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ,
K03psp_4u:949: adhyātmaśūnyatayā bahirdhāśūnyatayā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:951: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair vimokṣamukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:952: aṣṭābhir vimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:953: abhijñābhiḥ samādhidhāraṇīmukhair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:954: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir yāvad
K03psp_4u:955: aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na jātu virahitā bhaviṣyanti sarvajñatayā ca.
K03psp_4u:957: iyaṃ ca śāriputra prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyati,
K03psp_4u:958: tatra bhikṣur bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti udgṛhīṣyanti
K03psp_4u:959: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti. te tena kuśalamūlena
K03psp_4u:960: na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti te devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ
K03psp_4u:961: pāramitābhir abhyudgamiṣyanti buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā mānayamānāḥ
K03psp_4u:962: pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāsyanti yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
K03psp_4u:963: seyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā dakṣiṇāpathād vartanyāṃ pracariṣyati. tatrāpi
K03psp_4u:964: bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti
K03psp_4u:966: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti
K03psp_4u:968: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:969: devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhavamānāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:970: buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvāṇā gurukurvāṇā mānayamānāḥ pūjayamānā anupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
K03psp_4u:971: sā khalu punar iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vartanyā uttarāpathe pracariṣyati,
K03psp_4u:972: tatrāpi śāriputra bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇy upāsakopāsikāś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:973: te tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ gamiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:974: te devamanuṣyasaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:975: buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:976: anupūrveṇa tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā.
K03psp_4u:977: tatra śāriputra iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā buddhakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:978: na hi śāriputra maṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmāntarddhānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:979: samanvāhṛtās te śāriputra mayā kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca,
K03psp_4u:980: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty udgṛhīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante,
K03psp_4u:981: ye 'pi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti
K03psp_4u:982: likhitvā ca satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis,
K03psp_4u:983: te ca khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaraś ca tena kuśalamūlena na durgativinipātaṃ
K03psp_4u:984: gamiṣyanti devamānuṣikīsaṃpattiṃ pratyanubhūya ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir abhyudgatā bhaviṣyanti
K03psp_4u:985: abhyudgamya buddhān bhagavataḥ satkurvanto gurukurvanto mānayanto pūjayanto 'nupūrveṇa
K03psp_4u:986: tribhir yānair niryāsyanti śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:988: kuladuhitaraś ca tathāgatena buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās tathāgatena praśastās te tathāgatena,
K03psp_4u:989: ye 'pi te samantād daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti
K03psp_4u:990: dhriyante yāpayanti tair api tathāgatair api arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair dṛṣṭās te
K03psp_4u:991: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca buddhacakṣuṣā varṇitās te praśastās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
K03psp_4u:993: vaistārikī punar iyaṃ bhagavan gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_4u:996: iyaṃ śāriputra gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā paścime kāle paścime samaye uttarasyāṃ diśi
K03psp_4u:997: vaistārikī bhaviṣyati. tatra śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye te kulaputrāḥ
K03psp_4u:998: kuladuhitaraś ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā ca likhiṣyanti
K03psp_4u:999: udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya
K03psp_4u:1000: ca pratipatsyante. cirayānasaṃprasthitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bahubuddhaparyupāsitās
K03psp_4u:1001: te tathāgatāvaropitakuśalamūlā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti śrutvā
K03psp_4u:1002: ca likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca
K03psp_4u:1005: kiyantas te bhagavan kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā bhaviṣyanti?
K03psp_4u:1006: , ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge śrutvā
K03psp_4u:1007: likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti
K03psp_4u:1010: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra paścime kāle paścime samaye uttare digbhāge bahavo bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1011: alpakāḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1012: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti
K03psp_4u:1013: vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti tathatvāya ca pratipatsyante.
K03psp_4u:1015: tena khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca ya
K03psp_4u:1016: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
K03psp_4u:1017: na saṃtrāsam āpatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1018: anubaddhā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ paripṛcchitāś ca paripraśnīkṛtāś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1019: prajñāpāramitā paripūrṇā hi te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
K03psp_4u:1020: dānapāramitāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1021: adhyātmaśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1022: bahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1023: adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1024: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:1026: ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1027: apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1028: āryasatyaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1029: aṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattiparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1030: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti samādhidhāraṇīmukhaparipūrṇāś ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1032: ca bhaviṣyanti. te khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca kuśalamūlopastabdhāś
K03psp_4u:1037: tathā hy amutra mayā teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kathitā,
K03psp_4u:1038: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās,
K03psp_4u:1039: tair api buddhair bhagavadbhis teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kathitā teṣāñ jātivyativṛttānām api ta eva samudācārā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1044: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca saṃhatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1045: te na śakyante bhettuṃ māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ prāg evānyaiḥ pāpecchaiḥ pāpasamācārair,
K03psp_4u:1048: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_4u:1049: śrutvā udārāṃ prītiṃ prasādaṃ pramodyaṃ pratilapsyante. te ca bahujanaṃ kuśalamūleṣu
K03psp_4u:1050: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti yad utānuttarām eva samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya.
K03psp_4u:1052: evaṃ ca taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca mama saṃmukhaṃ vāg bhāṣitā,
K03psp_4u:1053: vayaṃ bhagavan bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
K03psp_4u:1054: bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi kuśalamūleṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmo yad utānuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:1055: samyaksaṃbodhim ārabhya. bodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ
K03psp_4u:1056: samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmo 'vinivartanīyatve ca vyākariṣyāmaḥ. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:1057: anumoditā mayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca vāg bhāṣitā cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya,
K03psp_4u:1058: atītānām api tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ puratas taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś caivaṃ bhāṣitā,
K03psp_4u:1059: vayaṃ bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K03psp_4u:1060: bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto bodhāya pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ
K03psp_4u:1061: samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmo 'vinivartanīyatve na ca vyākariṣyāmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1062: tathā hi tair atītais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anumoditā teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca vāg bhāṣitā cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya,
K03psp_4u:1063: teṣāṃ ca khalu śāriputra kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca mayā anumoditam ete bodhisattvā
K03psp_4u:1064: mahāsattvā bodhāya caranto bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi
K03psp_4u:1066: pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti avinivartanīyatve vyākariṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:1068: te khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1069: rūpe śabde gandhe rase spraṣṭavye dharmeṣu te udārāṇi dānāni dāsyanti,
K03psp_4u:1070: udārāṇi dānāni dattvā udārāṇi kuśalamūlāny abhisaṃskariṣyanti. te udārāṇi kuśalamūlāni abhisaṃskṛtyodāraṃ vipākaṃ parigrahīṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1071: te udāraṃ vipākaṃ parigṛhya teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya vipākād vipākaṃ parigṛhīṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:1074: yadi vā adhyātmikāni yadi vā bāhyāni sa tena kuśalamūlena anyāni buddhakṣetrāṇi adhyālambiṣyati
K03psp_4u:1075: yatra saṃmukhī bhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ deśayanti. teṣu
K03psp_4u:1076: ca imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tatrāpi buddhakṣetre bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni
K03psp_4u:1077: prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyai
K03psp_4u:1080: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad idaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena na sa kaścid dharmo yo nājñāto,
K03psp_4u:1081: na sā kācid dharmatathatā yā nājñātā,
K03psp_4u:1082: na sā kācit sattvānāṃ caryā yā nājñātā,
K03psp_4u:1083: yatra hi nāmātītānām api tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātāḥ,
K03psp_4u:1084: anāgatānām api tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātāḥ,
K03psp_4u:1085: pratyutpannānām api tathāgatānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātā,
K03psp_4u:1086: ye ca te daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
K03psp_4u:1087: teṣām api tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisattvā buddhakṣetrāṇi śrāvakāś cājñātāḥ.
K03psp_4u:1089: ye 'pi te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ (PSP_4:34)
K03psp_4u:1091: te 'pi etāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā gaveṣiṣyante paryeṣiṣyante. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrāṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:1092: kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā gaveṣamāṇānāṃ paryeṣamāṇānām etāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ kecil lapsyante?
K03psp_4u:1095: prāyeṇa śāriputra teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarvā imāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā upapatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1096: tathā hi śāriputra te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānām udyogam āpannāḥ.
K03psp_4u:1098: kiṃ punar bhagavann ime gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotpatsyante?
K03psp_4u:1100: gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ śāriputra sūtrāntāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā pratisaṃyuktās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cotpatsyante.
K03psp_4u:1104: ye śāriputra bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ tīvreṇa prasādena nirapekṣāḥ kāye jīvite codyogam āpatsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1106: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayanti saṃdarśayanti samādāpayanti
K03psp_4u:1107: samuttejayanti saṃpraharṣayanti niveśayanti. teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra kulaputrāṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:1108: kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca jātivyativṛttānām apy etāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā upapatsyante,
K03psp_4u:1109: te ṣaṭpāramitāsu yathopadiṣṭāsu pravartamānās tāvad vīryaṃ na saṃśrayiṣyanti yāvan na buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyanti. sattvāṃś ca na paripācayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1111: iti prajñāpāramitāyā alobhavikalālobhaviparyayeṇa niyatilābhaguṇa ity uktā guṇāḥ
K03psp_4u:1112: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:1113: guṇā ime bhagavan parikīrtitās teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāsu cariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1115: buddhakṣetrāṇi pariśodhayiṣyanti. kīdṛśāḥ khalu punar bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntarāyā utpatsyante?
K03psp_4u:1118: idaṃ subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām.
K03psp_4u:1120: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃś cireṇa pratibhānam utpatsyate,
K03psp_4u:1123: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran kṛcchreṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati. kṛcchreṇa dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1128: anena subhūte paryāyena cireṇa pratibhānam utpatsyate,
K03psp_4u:1129: idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti kṛcchraprāptiḥ
K03psp_4u:1130: punar aparaṃ subhūte atikṣipraṃ pratibhānam utpatsyate tena ca maṃsyate,
K03psp_4u:1131: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1133: kena paryāyeṇa bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām atikṣipraṃ pratibhānotpattyā mārakarma utpatsyate?
K03psp_4u:1135: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'nupāyakuśalamūlasyātikṣipraṃ pratibhānam utpatsyate,
K03psp_4u:1136: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām atikṣipraṃ pratibhānotpattyā mārakarma veditavyam. ity āśupratibhānatā
K03psp_4u:1137: punar aparaṃ subhūte vijṛmbhamāṇā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1138: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1139: punar aparaṃ subhūte hasanta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1140: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1141: punar aparaṃ subhūte parasparam uccagghayamānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1142: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti kāyavikāradauṣṭhulyaṃ trividham
K03psp_4u:1144: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1146: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1147: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1148: na vayaṃ atrāsvādaṃ labhāmaha ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1149: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti cittadauṣṭhulyaṃ trividham
K03psp_4u:1150: punar aparaṃ subhūte vijṛmbhamāṇā utthāyāsānāt prakramiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1151: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1152: punar aparaṃ subhūte vijṛmbhamāṇā svādhyāsyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1154: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1155: punar aparaṃ subhūte parasparaṃ hasamānā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K03psp_4u:1157: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1158: punar aparaṃ subhūte parasparam uccagghayamānā likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1159: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1160: punar aparaṃ subhūte vikṣiptacittā udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1161: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1162: punar aparaṃ subhūte anyonyavyañjanasamaṅgina udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1163: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity ayogavihitasvādhyāyāditā
K03psp_4u:1164: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:1166: na vayam atra āsvādaṃ labhāmaha ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1167: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam iti. kena kāraṇena bhagavan nātrāsvādaṃ labhante?
K03psp_4u:1169: tathā hi subhūte pūrvam api na caritāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_4u:1171: tathā hi subhūte pūrvam api na caritā dānapāramitāyāṃ,
K03psp_4u:1172: tena kāraṇena subhūte āsvādaṃ na labhante,
K03psp_4u:1175: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:1176: na vayam atra vyākṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām ity aprasannacittā utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1177: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1179: kena kāraṇena bhagavan na vyākṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyām utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti?
K03psp_4u:1181: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anavakrāntaniyāmā vyākriyante anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:1182: na mamātra prajñāpāramitāyān nāma gṛhītam iti prasādan na pratilapsyante,
K03psp_4u:1183: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1185: kena kāraṇena bhagavan nāmadheyāni na parikīrtitāni bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām?
K03psp_4u:1187: na khalu punaḥ subhūte avyākṛtānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyāni parikīrtante,
K03psp_4u:1188: nāpi mama nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtitaṃ grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā rājadhānyā vā rāṣṭrasya vā yatrāhaṃ jāta iti,
K03psp_4u:1191: sa yathā yathāpakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante tathā tathā dūrībhaviṣyanti buddhadharmebhyo,
K03psp_4u:1194: yatra tena punar eva yogam āpattavyam iti,
K03psp_4u:1197: tān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante. evaṃ bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca sarvajñatājñānādhigamasya
K03psp_4u:1199: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1201: katame te bhagavan sūtrāntā ye sarvajñajñānasyāhārakā na bhavanti,
K03psp_4u:1210: te prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā tāṃ paryavāptavyāṃ maṃsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1211: prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottarair dharmair niryāsyanti,
K03psp_4u:1212: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu śikṣiṣyante. iti hetubhraṃśaḥ
K03psp_4u:1213: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kukkuraḥ svāmino 'ntikāt piṇḍañ chorayitvā karmakarasyāntikād
K03psp_4u:1214: ālopaṃ mārgitavyaṃ manyeta. evam eva subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani mahāyānikāḥ
K03psp_4u:1215: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ
K03psp_4u:1218: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1219: punar aparaṃ subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
K03psp_4u:1220: cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā lābhasatkārahetoḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktān
K03psp_4u:1222: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti praṇītāsvādabhraṃśaḥ
K03psp_4u:1223: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣo hastino 'rthiko bhavet,
K03psp_4u:1224: sa hastinaṃ labdhvā hastipadaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:1225: subhūte 'pi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet.
K03psp_4u:1229: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_4u:1230: riñcitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakayānapratisaṃyuktāḥ pratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktās
K03psp_4u:1231: tān paryavāptavyān maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:1232: subhūte 'pi nu paṇḍitajātīyās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
K03psp_4u:1236: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma (PSP_4:39)
K03psp_4u:1238: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet,
K03psp_4u:1239: sa mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā goṣpadaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta,
K03psp_4u:1240: tasya taṃ goṣpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavet,
K03psp_4u:1241: evaṃpramāṇo mahāsamudra iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:1242: subhūte 'pi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātiko bhavet.
K03psp_4u:1246: evam eva subhūte tathārūpās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca veditavyā,
K03psp_4u:1247: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā labdhvā vā tām utsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān udgrahītavyān maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:1248: subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyās te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
K03psp_4u:1252: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity uddeśabhraṃśaḥ
K03psp_4u:1253: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo bhavet,
K03psp_4u:1254: sa sūryācandramasor maṇḍalavimānāt pramāṇam udgrahītavyaṃ manyet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:1255: subhūte vaijayantaṃ paryeṣya vaijayantasamaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmaḥ sūryācandramasor vā maṇḍalavimānāt pramāṇam udgṛhṇīyād,
K03psp_4u:1256: api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo bhavet.
K03psp_4u:1260: evam eva subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani ekatyā bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
K03psp_4u:1261: kuladuhitaraś ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā labdhvā vā riñcitvā
K03psp_4u:1262: cchorayitvā vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ
K03psp_4u:1264: subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyās te bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaveyuḥ.
K03psp_4u:1268: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti hetuphalasaṃbandhabhraṃśaḥ
K03psp_4u:1269: punar aparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma kasyacid eva puruṣasya koṭṭarājānaṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhaved,
K03psp_4u:1271: ca yādṛśo 'yaṃ koṭṭarāja iti. sa koṭṭarājasya varṇasaṃsthānenākṛtyānimittaṃ liṅgāni udgṛhyaivaṃ vaded,
K03psp_4u:1272: rājñaś cakravartinaḥ īdṛśo varṇasaṃsthānākṛtiviśeṣa iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:1273: subhūte api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet.
K03psp_4u:1277: evam eva subhūte bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani ekatyā mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś
K03psp_4u:1278: ca ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā labdhvā vā tāṃ riñcitvā cchorayitvā vā
K03psp_4u:1279: śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:1280: subhūte 'pi nu te mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca paṇḍitajātikāḥ syuḥ.
K03psp_4u:1284: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti niruttarapadabhraṃśaḥ
K03psp_4u:1285: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ bahūni pratibhānāny utpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:1286: yānīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhyamānāṃ vikṣepsyanti. tadyathāpi nāma rūpapratibhānaṃ
K03psp_4u:1295: yāvad anuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhipratibhānam. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:1304: anupalambhā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:1305: na hi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām ime dharmāḥ saṃvidyante. sacet subhūte
K03psp_4u:1306: bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā
K03psp_4u:1307: likhanebhir dharmo vikṣipyate. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1313: na hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1314: na dhyānapāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na dānapāramitāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1315: na sarvaśūnyatānāṃ na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nāryasatyānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1316: nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānāṃ nāṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ nābhijñānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1317: na sarvasamādhīnāṃ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:1318: na daśānāṃ balānāṃ na vaiśāradyānāṃ na pratisaṃvidāṃ nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1319: na sarvajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate. yasyāś ca svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1320: so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ. seyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na cābhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo likhitum.
K03psp_4u:1322: sacet punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhāva iti saṃjñāsyanti idam api teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity abhāvābhiniveśāntarāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:1324: ye kecid bhagavan mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarair likhitvā gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā mayā likhiteti maṃsyante,
K03psp_4u:1325: te 'pi lipiṣv akṣareṣv imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhinivekṣyante,
K03psp_4u:1326: idam api bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti lipyakṣareṣu prajñāpāramitābhiniveśāntarāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:1357: sacet punar bhagavan mahāyānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā anakṣarāṃ prajñāpāramitām abhinivekṣyante,
K03psp_4u:1359: anakṣarāṃ dānapāramitām abhinivekṣyante. anakṣaraṃ rūpam abhinivekṣyante,
K03psp_4u:1361: anakṣaraṃ vijñānam abhinivekṣyante. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān
K03psp_4u:1362: dharmān vimokṣamukhāni satyāni apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr balāni vaiśāradyāni
K03psp_4u:1364: yāvat sarvajñatām anakṣarām abhinivekṣyante. idam api bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1366: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ cemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām utpatsyante janapadavitarkā,
K03psp_4u:1367: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1368: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ
K03psp_4u:1369: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām utpatsyante grāmamanasikārāḥ nagaramanasikārāḥ nigamamanasikārāḥ
K03psp_4u:1374: kāmavitarkapratisaṃyuktā manasikārāḥ saṃgaṇikā pratisaṃyuktā manasikārā utpatsyante. amī ca subhūte (PSP_4:43)
K03psp_4u:1375: 'nye ca bahuvidhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ manasikārā mārakarma veditavyam. imāṃ
K03psp_4u:1376: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ māraḥ
K03psp_4u:1377: pāpīyān antarāyān vikṣepān upasaṃhariṣyati. iti janapadādimanasikārāntarāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:1378: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatām
K03psp_4u:1379: lābhasatkāraślokāś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārās tāṃs te bodhisattvāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāsvādayantaḥ,
K03psp_4u:1380: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti yoniśo manasikariṣyanti. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1382: punar aparaṃ subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān ye te bhaviṣyanti gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntās tān upasaṃhariṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1383: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatām.
K03psp_4u:1384: na punar atra subhūte bodhisattvair upāyakuśalair gambhīragambhīreṣu sūtrānteṣu māreṇopasaṃhṛteṣu
K03psp_4u:1386: na hi subhūte te sūtrāntāḥ sarvajñatāyā āhārakāḥ. tatra subhūte ye 'nupāyakuśalā
K03psp_4u:1387: bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā riñciṣyanti yatra
K03psp_4u:1388: mayā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām upāyakauśalaṃ vistareṇākhyātam ihaiva gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:1389: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇopāyakauśalaṃ mārgitavyam. te khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāyānikāḥ
K03psp_4u:1390: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā tebhyaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktebhyaḥ
K03psp_4u:1391: sūtrāntebhya upāyakauśalyaṃ gaveṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:1392: mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. i ty amārgeṇopāyakauśalamārgaṇāntarāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:1393: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś cchandakā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitum uddeṣṭuṃ svādhyātuṃ paṭhituṃ,
K03psp_4u:1394: dharmabhāṇakaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti cchandakilāsavaidhuryam
K03psp_4u:1395: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaḥ akilāsī bhaviṣyati imāṃ (PSP_4:44)
K03psp_4u:1396: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayitum udgrahayituṃ deśayituṃ svādhyāyituṃ,
K03psp_4u:1397: dharmaśravaṇikāś ca deśāntarasaṃprasthitā bhaviṣyanti. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1398: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś ca prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitukāmā bhaviṣyanti udgrahītukāmā uddeṣṭukāmāḥ svādhyātukāmā,
K03psp_4u:1399: dharmabhāṇakaś ca deśāntarasaṃprasthito bhaviṣyati. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1401: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako lābhasatkāraślokaguruko bhaviṣyati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraraktaḥ,
K03psp_4u:1402: dharmaśravaṇikāś cālpecchāḥ saṃtuṣṭā ārabdhavīryā upasthitasmṛtayaḥ samāhitā ekāgracittāḥ
K03psp_4u:1403: prajñāvantaḥ. idam api subhūte visāmagryā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:1404: yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1405: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś cālpeccho bhaviṣyati saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikta ārabdhavīrya upasthitasmṛtiḥ samāhita ekāgracittaḥ prajñāvān,
K03psp_4u:1407: bhaviṣyanti. idam api subhūte visāmagryā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:1408: yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1410: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇaka āraṇyako bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1411: paiṇḍapātikaḥ pāṃśukūlikaḥ khalupaścādbhaktikaḥ ekāsanikaḥ prasthapiṇḍikaḥ śmāśānika ābhyavakāśiko vṛkṣamūliko naiṣadyiko yathāsaṃstarikas traicīvarikaḥ,
K03psp_4u:1412: dharmaśravaṇikāś ca nāraṇyakā bhaviṣyanti na paiṇḍapātikā na pāṃśukūlikā na khalupaścādbhaktikā
K03psp_4u:1413: na ekāsanikā na prasthapiṇḍikā na śmāśānikā nābhyavakāśikā na vṛkṣamūlikā na naiṣadyikā
K03psp_4u:1414: na yathāsaṃstarikā na traicīvarikāḥ. idam api subhūte visāmagryā iha gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:1416: svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1417: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇika āraṇyako bhaviṣyati yāvat traicīvariko,
K03psp_4u:1418: dharmabhāṇakaś ca nāraṇyako bhaviṣyati yāvan na traicīvarikaḥ. idam api subhūte visāmagryā
K03psp_4u:1419: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśaś
K03psp_4u:1420: ca manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1422: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś ca śrāddhā bhaviṣyanti kalyāṇadharmāṇa imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitukāmā uddeṣṭukāmāḥ svādhyātukāmāḥ,
K03psp_4u:1423: dharmabhāṇakaś cāśrāddho bhaviṣyati na kalyāṇadharmā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitān
K03psp_4u:1424: na likhitukāmo noddeṣṭukāmo na svādhyātukāmaḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:1426: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca śrāddho bhaviṣyati kalyāṇadharmā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhanāya dātukāmo 'rthikāya udgrahītukāmo,
K03psp_4u:1427: dharmaśravaṇikaś cāśrāddho bhaviṣyati na kalyāṇadharmā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
K03psp_4u:1428: na likhanāya dātukāmo noddeṣṭukāmo 'rthikāya nodgrahītukāmaḥ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:1431: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca sarvāstiparityāgī bhaviṣyati anāgṛhītacittaḥ,
K03psp_4u:1432: dharmaśravaṇikaś ca matsarī bhaviṣyati mahecchaḥ pāpeccho lābhasatkāraślokacīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraguruko
K03psp_4u:1433: bhaviṣyati. idam api subhūte visāmagryā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ
K03psp_4u:1435: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikaś ca sarvāstiparityāgī bhaviṣyati anāgṛhītacittaḥ,
K03psp_4u:1436: dharmabhāṇakaś ca matsarī bhaviṣyati kuṭukuñcakaḥ. idam api subhūte visāmagryā imāṃ
K03psp_4u:1437: gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:1439: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikaś ca dharmabhāṇakasyāntike parityaktukāmo bhaviṣyati cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān,
K03psp_4u:1440: dharmabhāṇakaś ca na grahītukāmo bhaviṣyati. iyam api subhūte visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1441: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1442: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako dharmaśravaṇikasyāntikād grahītukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1443: dharmaśravaṇikaś ca na dātukāmo bhaviṣyati. iyam api subhūte visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1444: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1446: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś codghaṭitajño bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1447: dharmaśravaṇikaś ca neyo bhaviṣyati vipañcitajño vā padaparamo vā. iyam api subhūte visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1448: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1449: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikaś codghaṭitajño bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1450: dharmabhāṇakaś ca neyo bhaviṣyati vipañcitajño vā padaparamo vā. iyam api subhūte visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1451: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ manasikurvatām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1453: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca dharmāntaraṃ jñāsyati sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānāvadānetivṛttakajātakanidānavaipulyādbhūtadharmopadeśānāṃ,
K03psp_4u:1454: dharmaśravaṇikāś ca dharmāntaran na jñāsyanti sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānāvadānetivṛttakajātakanidānavaipulyādbhūtadharmopadeśānāṃ,
K03psp_4u:1456: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ (PSP_4:47)
K03psp_4u:1457: manasikriyamāṇāyām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1458: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikaś ca dharmāntaraṃ jñāsyati sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānāvadānetivṛttakajātakanidānavaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśānāṃ,
K03psp_4u:1459: dharmabhāṇakaś ca dharmāntaran na jñāsyati sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānāvadānetivṛttakajātakanidānavaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśānām,
K03psp_4u:1461: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1463: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1464: dharmaśravaṇikaś ca na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1466: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ manasikurvatām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1467: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1468: dharmabhāṇakaś ca na ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati. iyam api subhūte visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1469: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ manasikurvatām. idam
K03psp_4u:1470: api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti ṣaṭpāramitāsamanvāgamāsamanvāgamavaidhuryam
K03psp_4u:1471: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś copāyakuśalo bhaviṣyati ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu,
K03psp_4u:1472: dharmaśravaṇikāś cānupāyakuśalā bhaviṣyanti ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu. iyam api subhūte visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1473: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1474: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś copāyakuśalā bhaviṣyanti ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu,
K03psp_4u:1477: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyām. (PSP_4:48)
K03psp_4u:1478: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity upāyānupāyakauśalavaidhuryam
K03psp_4u:1479: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca dhāraṇīpratilabdho bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1482: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1484: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca likhitukāmo bhaviṣyati dhārayitukāmo bhaviṣyati vācayitukāmaḥ svādhyātukāmo yāvat manasikartukāmo,
K03psp_4u:1485: dharmaśravaṇikāś ca na likhitukāmā bhaviṣyanti yāvan na manasikartukāmā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1487: imāṃ gambhirāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1488: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś ca likhitukāmā bhaviṣyanti yāvat manasikartukāmāḥ,
K03psp_4u:1489: dharmabhāṇakaś ca na likhitukāmo bhaviṣyati yāvan na manasikartukāmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:1491: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1493: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca vigatakāmacchandavyāpādastyānamiddhauddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitsā bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1496: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitukāmānāṃ yāvad bhāvayitukāmānām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1497: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikāś ca vigatakāmacchandavyāpādastyānamiddhauddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitsā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1500: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitukāmānāṃ yāvad bhāvayitukāmānām. (PSP_4:49)
K03psp_4u:1501: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1503: punar aparaṃ subhūte imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatāṃ kaścid eva tatrāgatya nirayānām avarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate tiryagyoneḥ,
K03psp_4u:1507: ihaiva tvaṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kuruṣveti kin te 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum. iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1508: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity apāyagativaimukhyam
K03psp_4u:1509: punar aparaṃ subhūte imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ yāvad yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ
K03psp_4u:1510: kaścid evāgatya cāturmahārājikānāṃ devānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ
K03psp_4u:1511: devānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate. evaṃ sukhaḥ kāmadhātuḥ kāmaparibhogair,
K03psp_4u:1514: tad api sarvam anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmīyaṃ vipariṇāmadharmi vyayadharmi virāgadharmi nirodhadharmi,
K03psp_4u:1515: ihaiva tvaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpnuhi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpnuhi pratyekabodhiṃ prāpnuhi,
K03psp_4u:1517: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1519: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca eko bhaviṣyaty advitīyaḥ svayaṃkārī,
K03psp_4u:1522: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1523: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikaś ca eko bhaviṣyaty advitīyaḥ svayaṃkārī,
K03psp_4u:1526: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ svādhyāyatām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity ekākiparṣadavacaratvavaidhuryam
K03psp_4u:1527: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇaka evaṃ vakṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1529: tasyāham imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dāsyāmi likhanāya vācanāya (PSP_4:50)
K03psp_4u:1533: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyām. idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma
K03psp_4u:1534: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikaś ca dharmabhāṇakam anubandhitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1536: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1537: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyām.
K03psp_4u:1538: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. ity anubandhikāmo
K03psp_4u:1540: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇaka āmiṣakiñcitkasya hetor imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dātukāmo bhaviṣyati likhanāya uddiśanāya yāvad bhāvanāyai,
K03psp_4u:1541: dharmaśravaṇikaś ca āmiṣakiñcitkasya hetor nopasaṃkramitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1542: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1543: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1544: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1546: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca tān diśaṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1548: dharmaśravaṇikaś ca na taṃ deśaṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1550: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1551: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1552: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmaśravaṇikaś ca tān diśaṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1554: dharmabhāṇakaś ca na taṃ deśaṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1556: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1557: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1559: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca tena gantukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1561: dharmaśravaṇikaś ca na tatra gantukāmo bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1565: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1566: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca tena gamiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1570: kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ kulaputrā āmiṣahetos tatra gantuṃ sucintitaṃ tāvat kuruta mā paścād vipratisāriṇo bhaviṣyatha piṇḍapātena labdhālabdhena,
K03psp_4u:1571: evaṃ tena dharmabhāṇakena sūkṣmeṇopāyena dharmapratyākhyānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1572: te nirviṇṇarūpā evaṃ jñāsyanti pratyākhyānanimittāny etāni naitāni dātukāmatānimittāni,
K03psp_4u:1574: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1575: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1577: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako bhikṣus tena prakramiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1578: yena caurabhayaṃ caṇḍālabhayaṃ lubdhakabhayaṃ candamṛgabhayam āśīviṣabhayaṃ kāntārāṭavībhayaṃ
K03psp_4u:1579: durgabhayaṃ tena prakramiṣyati dharmaśravaṇikāś cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmā
K03psp_4u:1582: kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ kulaputrās tatra gantuṃ yatra caurabhayaṃ caṇḍālabhayaṃ lubdhakabhayaṃ caṇḍamṛgabhayaṃ āśīviṣabhayaṃ kāntārāṭavībhayaṃ durgabhayaṃ
K03psp_4u:1583: dharmaśravaṇikāś cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmā dharmabhāṇakam anubaddhā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1585: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na lekhayitukāmo noddeṣṭukāmo na śrāvayitukāmas te
K03psp_4u:1586: tasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntikāc chrutvā nirviṇṇarūpā na tena gamiṣyanti yena sa dharmabhāṇako bhikṣur gamiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1588: asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1589: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti caurādinimittavaidhuryam
K03psp_4u:1590: punar aparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako bhikṣur bhikṣādakulaguruko bhaviṣyati sa tayā
K03psp_4u:1591: bhikṣādakulagurukatayā tāni ca kulāny abhīkṣṇaṃ vyavalokayitavyāni maṃsyate sa tayābhīkṣṇakulavyavalokanatayā (PSP_4:52)
K03psp_4u:1593: asti mayā yuṣmanto bhikṣādakulāny avyavalokayitavyāny upasaṃkramitavyāni,
K03psp_4u:1594: sa tān dharmaśravaṇikān pratyākhyāsyati pratyākhyātās te pratyudāvartiṣyante,
K03psp_4u:1595: iyam api subhūte visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ bhāvayatām uddiśatāṃ
K03psp_4u:1596: svādhyāyatām idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1598: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇa tathātathopāyena ceṣṭiṣyate yathāyathopāyena,
K03psp_4u:1599: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na kaścil likhiṣyati nodgrahīṣyati na paryavāpsyati na dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na svādhyāsyati na manasikariṣyati.
K03psp_4u:1600: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:1601: kena kāraṇena bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇa tathātathā ceṣṭiṣyate yathāyathā
K03psp_4u:1602: na kaścid imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati nodgrahīṣyati na paryavāpsyati
K03psp_4u:1603: na dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na svādhyāsyati na manasikariṣyati?
K03psp_4u:1605: prajñāpāramitānirjātāni hi sarvasattvānāṃ kleśaprahāṇāny evaṃ tathātathopāyena ceṣṭiṣyate
K03psp_4u:1606: yathāyathā na kaścid imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati nodgrahīṣyati na paryavāpsyati
K03psp_4u:1607: na dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na svādhyāsyati na manasikariṣyati.
K03psp_4u:1608: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣepsyati vivecayiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1609: naiṣā prajñāpāramitā yathāsmākaṃ sūtrāntam āgatam ity asya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām
K03psp_4u:1610: uddiśyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1611: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1612: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇa bodhisattvān upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1613: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati sa bodhisattvo bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_4u:1614: srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā prāpnoti sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā prāpnoti pratyekabodhiṃ vā prāpnoti,
K03psp_4u:1617: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ yāvad (PSP_4:53)
K03psp_4u:1619: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. iti mārasya pāpīyaso bhedaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:1620: punar aparaṃ subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyāṃ bahūni mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:1621: yāny antarāyakarāṇi bhaviṣyanti tāni mārakarmāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivarjayitavyāni.
K03psp_4u:1623: katamāni tāni bhagavan mārakarmāṇi yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhavyāni buddhvā ca vivarjitavyāni?
K03psp_4u:1625: prajñāpāramitāpratirūpakāni subhūte mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante. evaṃ dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā,
K03psp_4u:1627: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhavyāni buddhvā ca vivarjayitavyāni.
K03psp_4u:1628: punar aparaṃ subhūte adhyātmaśūnyatāpratirūpakāṇi yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāpratirūpakāṇi mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:1630: tāni buddhvā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇi vivarjayitavyāni. evañ ca vakṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1631: etān paryavāpnuhi etān paryavāpya ihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpnuhi sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ prāpnuhi,
K03psp_4u:1632: imāny eva tvaṃ catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvaya samyakprahāṇāni bhāvaya ṛddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān
