K03psp_4u:1636: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām udgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ yāvan manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:1637: bhāvyamānāyāṃ māraḥ pāpīyān evaṃrūpāṇi mārakarmāṇi upasaṃhariṣyati. iti prativarṇikopasaṃhāraḥ
K03psp_4u:1638: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1639: suvarṇavarṇakāyena vyāmaprabhāṃ kṛtvā tatra bodhisattvas taṃ dṛṣṭvā spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyati,
K03psp_4u:1641: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1642: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1643: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃs teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca purato buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgham upadarśayiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1645: aham apy anāgate 'dhvany evaṃrūpas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ syām,
K03psp_4u:1646: evaṃ ca bhikṣugaṇaṃ parikarṣeyaṃ yathā yaṃ tathāgato dharmaṃ deśayati tathaivāham api dharmaṃ deśayeyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:1647: sa tatra spṛhām utpādayiṣyati spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyati,
K03psp_4u:1649: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1650: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam.
K03psp_4u:1651: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān anekāni bodhisattvaśatāni anekāni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi upadarśayati,
K03psp_4u:1653: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1654: te bodhisattvās teṣāṃ māranirmitānām antike spṛhām utpādayiṣyanti spṛhām utpādya sarvajñatāyāḥ parihāsyanti,
K03psp_4u:1656: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyām uddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyamānāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyām,
K03psp_4u:1657: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:1658: na hīha subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1659: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ,
K03psp_4u:1661: na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:1662: na pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nāṣṭavimokṣā na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāḥ
K03psp_4u:1663: na sarvaśūnyatā na sarvasamādhayaḥ na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:1664: na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1665: yatra ca subhūte na rūpaṃ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1666: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1667: na skandhā na dhātavo nāyatanāni na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni na
K03psp_4u:1668: pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nāṣṭavimokṣā
K03psp_4u:1669: na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na sarvaśūnyatā
K03psp_4u:1671: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni na tathāgatabalāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikabuddhadharmā na vimokṣamukhāni na bodhiḥ saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:1672: yatra na bodhir na tatra buddho na bodhisattvā na śrāvakāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1675: punar aparaṃ subhūte bahvantarāyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1676: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāni jāmbūdvīpakāni ratnāni,
K03psp_4u:1678: bhaviṣyanti. evam etat subhūte teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:1680: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ yoniśo manasikriyamāṇāyāṃ bhāvyamānāyāṃ bahavo 'ntarāyā bhaviṣyanti
K03psp_4u:1683: evam etad bhagavann evam etat sugata,
K03psp_4u:1686: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti. alpabuddhayas te bhagavan mohapuruṣā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1687: mandabuddhayo ye 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti. na teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhiḥ
K03psp_4u:1688: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitān na likhiṣyanti likhyamānāyām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti bhāvyamānāyāñ cāntarāyaṃ kariṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:1690: evam etat subhūte evam etat mārādhiṣṭhitās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti
K03psp_4u:1693: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1695: alpabuddhikās te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca mandabuddhikāḥ parīttabuddhikā,
K03psp_4u:1696: na ca teṣām udārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ kramiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:1698: likhiṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti yāvan na bhāvayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1699: anyeṣāñ ca likhatāṃ yāvad bhāvayatām antarāyaṃ kariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1700: kiñ cāpi subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ yāvad bhāvyamānāyām imāni mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:1701: sacet punaḥ subhūte yad imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca likhatāṃ svādhyāyatām uddiśatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ bhāvayatāṃ mārakarmāṇi notpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:1706: balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmān yāvat sarvajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:1707: veditavyam idaṃ subhūte buddhānubhāva eṣa yenaiṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca
K03psp_4u:1708: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ
K03psp_4u:1711: sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyān dharmān sarvasamādhīn sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvavimokṣamukhāni paripūrayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1712: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīḥ pañcābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1714: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān paripūrayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:1715: sarvākārajñatāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti. ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
K03psp_4u:1716: te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca kṛtaśa udyogam āpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:1717: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo manasikurvatāṃ,
K03psp_4u:1718: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu avinivartanīyā bodhisattvās te 'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:1719: ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhatāṃ vācayatām uddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ yoniśo
K03psp_4u:1721: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyāḥ kasyāścid eva bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ,
K03psp_4u:1723: viṃśatir vā triṃśad vā catvāriṃśad vā pañcāśad vā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā,
K03psp_4u:1724: te 'syā mātur glānāyāḥ sarve 'py udyogam āpadyeran,
K03psp_4u:1725: kim ity asmākaṃ mātur antarāyo na bhavet,
K03psp_4u:1726: kim ity asmākaṃ mātā ciraṃ jīvet,
K03psp_4u:1727: kim ity asmākaṃ mātuḥ śarīre amanaāpaḥ sparśo na nipated,
K03psp_4u:1728: eṣāsmākaṃ jananī śarīrasya dātrī jīvitasya dhātrī,
K03psp_4u:1729: te tāṃ mātaram upasthitām upatiṣṭheran sugopitāṃ gopāyeyur,
K03psp_4u:1730: mā bhūd asyā jīvitāntarāyo vā śarīradaurbalyaṃ vā daṃśamaśakasarīsṛpopanipāto vā śītoṣṇakṣutpipāsādi duṣkhaṃ vā,
K03psp_4u:1731: evan te putrās tasyā mātuḥ sarvasukhopadhānāny upasaṃhareyuḥ,
K03psp_4u:1732: evan te tāṃ mātaraṃ sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyur mimīyur eṣāsmākam asya lokasya darśayitrī. evam eva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
K03psp_4u:1733: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:1734: eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāsmākaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ jananī jñānālokasya kārikā,
K03psp_4u:1735: ye 'pi te daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_4u:1736: te 'pīmām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:1737: eṣā hi gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā jananī tathāgatānām,
K03psp_4u:1739: tena tathāgatāḥ kṛtajñatām upādāya ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ buddhacakṣuṣā satatasamitaṃ samanvāharanti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1741: ato nirjātā hi tathāgatānām adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā,
K03psp_4u:1742: ato nirjātāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ,
K03psp_4u:1745: ato nirjātāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo,
K03psp_4u:1748: ato nirjātāni daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ,
K03psp_4u:1754: ato nirjātās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ. ye 'pi kecit subhūte (PSP_4:58)
K03psp_4u:1755: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
K03psp_4u:1756: sarve te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhāḥ abhisaṃbudhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca,
K03psp_4u:1757: ye 'pi te subhūte mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ
K03psp_4u:1758: prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti
K03psp_4u:1759: yoniśo manasikariṣyanti sarve te tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair buddhacakṣuṣā
K03psp_4u:1760: satatasamitaṃ samanvāhriyante teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ
K03psp_4u:1761: ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ satatasamitaṃ rakṣāvaraṇaṃ guptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti
K03psp_4u:1763: iti jāmbūdvīpakamahāratnodāharaṇādidṛṣṭāntena mahānubhāvatvam ity uktā doṣāḥ
K03psp_4u:1766: prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī ti. kathaṃ ca bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_4u:1767: kathañ ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitāsya lokasya darśayitrī?
K03psp_4u:1768: kathañ ca bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato janitaḥ?
K03psp_4u:1771: anayā subhūte gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā daśatathāgatabalāni janitāni,
K03psp_4u:1772: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahākaruṇā mahāmaitrī mahāmuditā mahopekṣā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yāvat sarvākārajñatā janitā,
K03psp_4u:1773: ebhiś ca subhūte dharmais tathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
K03psp_4u:1774: tasmāt tarhi subhūte anayā gambhīrayā prajñāpāramitayā tathāgato janitaḥ. iti tathāgatanirvṛttijñānam
K03psp_4u:1776: katamaḥ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena loka ity ākhyātaḥ?
K03psp_4u:1778: pañca subhūte skandhās tathāgatena loka ākhyātaḥ.
K03psp_4u:1780: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ?
K03psp_4u:1782: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā imān pañca skandhān lujyamānān darśayati,
K03psp_4u:1788: nāyūhaṃ na niryūhaṃ nātītān nānāgatān na pratyutpannān dharmān darśayati. tat kasya hetor?
K03psp_4u:1789: na hi śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā,
K03psp_4u:1792: nānabhisaṃskaro nānutpādo na nirodho nābhāvo nāsvabhāvo lujyate vā pralujyate vā. evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatena gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā lokasya darśayitrī ākhyātā. iti lokasya jñānam
K03psp_4u:1793: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajānanti,
K03psp_4u:1794: aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ paracittavidas te 'pi prajñāpāramitām āgamya prajānanti. na punaḥ subhūte iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sattvo na sattvaprajñaptir
K03psp_4u:1796: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
K03psp_4u:1798: na cakṣūrūpaṃ na cakṣurvijñānaṃ na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśo na cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanā upalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:1803: evaṃ na śrotraṃ na śabdo na ghrāṇaṃ na gandho na jihvā na raso na kāyo na spraṣṭavyaṃ
K03psp_4u:1804: na mano na dharmo na manovijñānaṃ na manaḥsaṃsparśo na manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanāprajñaptir
K03psp_4u:1805: upalabhyate. evaṃ na pāramitā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā na vimokṣamukhaṃ na balavaiśāradyapratisaṃvido
K03psp_4u:1806: nāveṇikabuddhadharmā yāvan na sarvākārajñatāprajñaptir upalabhyate. evaṃ hi subhūte
K03psp_4u:1807: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāṃ lokasya saṃdarśayitrī,
K03psp_4u:1808: sā punar iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na rūpasya darśayitrī yāvan na sarvajñatāyā darśayitrī. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:1809: prajñāpāramitā eva tāvat subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,

K03psp_4u:1982: yā sarvajñatāyās tathatā sā kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
K03psp_4u:1983: yā kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā sā laukikalokottarāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravāṇāṃ sāvadyānavadyānāṃ sakleśaniḥkleśāṇāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānānāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
K03psp_4u:1984: yā saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā sātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
K03psp_4u:1993: yā arhattvaphalatathatā sā pratyekabuddhatathatā yā pratyekabuddhatathatā sā pratyekabodhitathatā,
K03psp_4u:1997: yā tathāgatatathatā sā sarvasattvatathatā. iti hi yā ca tathāgatatathatā yā ca sarvasattvatathatā,
K03psp_4u:2000: yā cākṣayā sākṣayatvenādvaidhīkārā. iyaṃ subhūte sarvadharmatathatā,
K03psp_4u:2002: evam iyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathatā tathāgatānāṃ janayitrī,
K03psp_4u:2003: evaṃ hi subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā lokasya darśayitrī,
K03psp_4u:2004: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmatathatāṃ jānāti,
K03psp_4u:2006: yayā tathatayā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha ity ucyate.
K03psp_4u:2008: gambhīrā bhagavan yad uta sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā. anayā bhagavaṃs tathatayā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ prakāśikā. ko 'tra bhagavann adhimokṣyate?
K03psp_4u:2009: anyatrāvinivartanīyair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair dṛṣṭisaṃpannair vā pudgalair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair vā yāvad gambhīrā bhagavann ime dharmās
K03psp_4u:2011: tathā hi subhūte akṣayā tathatā. kasmād akṣayā?
K03psp_4u:2013: eṣā sā subhūte tathatā tathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyākhyātā yad uta sarvadharmatathatā. iti samyaksaṃbuddhasya tathatāvabodhatatparasamākhyānaprajñapanajñānāni
K03psp_4u:2014: atha khalu yāvantas trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrās
K03psp_4u:2015: te sarve divyāni candanacūrṇāni parigṛhya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya
K03psp_4u:2017: ekānte sthitāś ca te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
K03psp_4u:2018: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prakāśyate. kiṃlakṣaṇā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā?
K03psp_4u:2020: śūnyatālakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_4u:2021: ānimittalakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_4u:2022: apraṇihitalakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā.
K03psp_4u:2025: asvabhāvalakṣaṇā aniśritalakṣaṇā ākāśalakṣaṇā aśāśvatalakṣaṇā anucchedalakṣaṇā anabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇā
K03psp_4u:2026: anekārthalakṣaṇā anānārthalakṣaṇā anāgamanalakṣaṇā āgamanalakṣaṇā alakṣaṇā hi devaputrā
K03psp_4u:2027: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā. evaṃlakṣaṇā hi devaputrā iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_4u:2028: tathāgatena lokasaṃketena vyavahriyate na punaḥ paramārthena. ity anutpādānirodhādijñānam
K03psp_4u:2029: na hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena śakyante vikopayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2031: evaṃ na hi devaputrā lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vikopayati,
K03psp_4u:2034: iti hi lakṣaṇāni ca alakṣaṇāni ca lakṣaṇālakṣaṇāni ca,
K03psp_4u:2038: na hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni rūpasaṃskṛtāni,
K03psp_4u:2040: na vijñānasaṃskṛtāni na dhātusaṃskṛtāni nāyatanasaṃskṛtāni na pratītyasamutpādasaṃskṛtāni
K03psp_4u:2041: na dānapāramitāsaṃskṛtāni na śīlapāramitāsaṃskṛtāni na kṣāntipāramitāsaṃskṛtāni na
K03psp_4u:2045: nābhijñāsaṃskṛtāni na sarvasamādhisaṃskṛtāni na sarvadhāraṇīmukhasaṃskṛtāni na tathāgatabalasaṃskṛtāni
K03psp_4u:2048: na hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni manuṣyāṇāṃ vā amanuṣyāṇāṃ vā sāsravāṇi vā anāsravāṇi vā laukikāni vā lokottarāṇi vā saṃskṛtāni vā asaṃskṛtāni
K03psp_4u:2049: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān etad (PSP_4:69)
K03psp_4u:2050: avocat: yadi kaścid devaputrā ākāśaṃ kiṃ lakṣaṇam?
K03psp_4u:2051: iti vaded, api nu sa samyag vadamāno vadet.
K03psp_4u:2053: na bhagavan samyag vadamāno vadet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2054: na hi bhagavann ākāśaṃ kenacil lakṣaṇena saṃvidyate asaṃskṛtatvād ākāśadhātoḥ. ity avikalpajñānam
K03psp_4u:2056: utpādād vā devaputrās tathāgatānām anutpādād vā sthitaivaiṣā dharmadhātusthitir evaṃlakṣaṇā,
K03psp_4u:2057: yathā sthito lakṣaṇahetuḥ sā bhūtā tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhā,
K03psp_4u:2060: gambhīrāṇi bhagavann imāni lakṣaṇāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāni yeṣāṃ lakṣaṇānām abhisaṃbuddhatvāt,
K03psp_4u:2061: tathāgatasyāsaṅgajñānaṃ yeṣu lakṣaṇeṣu sthitvā tathāgatena sarvalakṣaṇāni saṃprakāśitāni,
K03psp_4u:2062: prajñāpāramitāsaṃprakāśanatayā bhagavaṃs tāni lakṣaṇāni saṃprakāśitāni. āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad gambhīreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ gocaro,
K03psp_4u:2063: yatra carato tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
K03psp_4u:2064: anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvalakṣaṇānāṃ prabhedaḥ kṛto,
K03psp_4u:2066: evaṃ skandhalakṣaṇasya dhātulakṣaṇasya āyatanalakṣaṇasya pratītyasamutpādalakṣaṇasya prabhedaḥ kṛto yāvat sarvajñatālakṣaṇasya prabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ. iti prabhedajñānam
K03psp_4u:2067: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:2084: sā tathāgatenālakṣaṇety abhisaṃbuddhā. avikopanalakṣaṇāni catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayas (PSP_4:70)
K03psp_4u:2085: tās tathāgatenālakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. nairyāṇikalakṣaṇāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmās te tathāgatenālakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. viviktalakṣaṇā
K03psp_4u:2087: anābhogalakṣaṇam apraṇihitaṃ tat tathāgatenālakṣaṇam ity abhisaṃbuddhaṃ vimocalakṣaṇā vimokṣyās te tathāgatenālakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ. suniścitalakṣaṇāni
K03psp_4u:2094: asaṃhāryalakṣaṇā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmās te tathāgatenālakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhā
K03psp_4u:2095: yāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ tathāgatenālakṣaṇam ity abhisaṃbuddham. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:2096: hi devaputrās tathāgatena sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā ity abhisaṃbuddhās tena tathāgato
K03psp_4u:2098: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_4u:2099: prajñāpāramitā subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya yenaiva janayitrī asya
K03psp_4u:2100: ca lokasya darśayitrī tena kāraṇena tathāgata imaṃ prajñāpāramitādharmam upaniśritya
K03psp_4u:2102: evaṃ dharmaṃ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati arcayaty apacāyate. iyaṃ sā subhūte
K03psp_4u:2103: prajñāpāramitādharmatā tasmād imāṃ tathāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkaroti gurukaroti
K03psp_4u:2104: mānayati pūjayaty arcayaty apacāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2105: ato hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2107: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte samyagvadamānā vadeyuḥ kṛtajñaḥ kṛtavedīti tathāgataṃ,
K03psp_4u:2108: te samyagvadamānāḥ samyag vadeyuḥ kṛtajñaḥ kṛtavedīti. kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgataḥ kṛtajño bhavati kṛtavedīti?
K03psp_4u:2110: yayā pratipadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhas tatas tathāgatas tad eva
K03psp_4u:2111: yānaṃ tām eva pratipadaṃ satkaroti gurukaroti mānayati pūjayati arcayaty apacāyate
K03psp_4u:2113: iyaṃ sā subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā. iti satkārādijñānam
K03psp_4u:2114: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā akṛtā ity abhisaṃbuddhāḥ kārakāsattām upādāya,
K03psp_4u:2115: avikṛtā ity abhisaṃbuddhā nigrahāsattām upādāya iyam api subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā
K03psp_4u:2116: kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā. evaṃ tathāgatena prajñāpāramitām āgamya sarvadharmā akṛtā ity
K03psp_4u:2118: punar aparaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya prajñāpāramitām āgamya sarvadharmeṣv akṛtakajñānaṃ
K03psp_4u:2119: pravṛttam apravṛttisaṃketenānena subhūte paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī
K03psp_4u:2120: asya ca lokasya darśayitrī. iti sarvatragajñānam
K03psp_4u:2123: kathaṃ tadā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī?
K03psp_4u:2125: evam etat subhūte evam etat sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2126: kathañ ca subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ?
K03psp_4u:2127: sarvadharmā hi subhūte śūnyāḥ ṛktakāḥ tucchakā asārakāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2128: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ.
K03psp_4u:2129: punar aparaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2130: kathañ ca subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ?
K03psp_4u:2132: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī. sā ca punā rūpasyādṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī,
K03psp_4u:2135: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasyādṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī. evaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāyā adṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī,
K03psp_4u:2136: evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
K03psp_4u:2144: yadā subhūte na rūpārambaṇaṃ vijñanam utpadyate,
K03psp_4u:2145: evaṃ hi subhūte rūpasyādṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī. evaṃ yadā subhūte na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārārambaṇaṃ, (PSP_4:72)
K03psp_4u:2147: evaṃ vijñānasyādṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī. yadā na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādārambaṇaṃ vijñānam utpadyate,
K03psp_4u:2148: evam eṣām adṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī. yadā na pāramitārambaṇaṃ vijñānam utpadyate,
K03psp_4u:2149: evaṃ pāramitānām adṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī. evaṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:2150: dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnāṃ
K03psp_4u:2154: evam āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām adṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī. yadā subhūte na sarvajñatārambaṇaṃ vijñānam utpadyate,
K03psp_4u:2155: evaṃ sarvajñatāyā adṛṣṭatvād darśayitrī. evaṃ hi subhūte iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī. ity
K03psp_4u:2156: punar aparaṃ subhūte kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī?
K03psp_4u:2157: iha subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati. kim iti lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati?
K03psp_4u:2161: daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
K03psp_4u:2162: catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
K03psp_4u:2163: avidyā pratyayo dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādo lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
K03psp_4u:2164: satkāyadṛṣṭipūrvakāni dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭikṛtāni lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
K03psp_4u:2165: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
K03psp_4u:2166: ṣaṭpāramitā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati. evam adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā
K03psp_4u:2167: śūnyatāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati. evaṃ daśabalāni
K03psp_4u:2168: vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati,
K03psp_4u:2169: sarvajñatā lokaḥ śūnya iti sūcayati. evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
K03psp_4u:2170: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaḥ śūnya iti jñāpayati. (PSP_4:73)
K03psp_4u:2171: kim iti lokaḥ śūnya iti jñāpayati?
K03psp_4u:2173: pratītyasamutpādo daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo lokaḥ śūnya iti jñāpayati,
K03psp_4u:2174: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā yāvat sarvajñatā lokaḥ śūnya iti jñapayati. evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitri asya ca lokasya
K03psp_4u:2175: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya lokaḥ śūnya iti darśayati. kim iti lokaḥ śūnya iti darśayati?
K03psp_4u:2176: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ daśakuśalāḥ karmapathāś catvāri dhyānāni catvāry
K03psp_4u:2177: apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ satkāyadṛṣṭipūrvakāṇi dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭikṛtāni ṣaṭpāramitāḥ
K03psp_4u:2179: yāvat sarvākārajñatā lokaḥ śūnya iti darśayati. evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya
K03psp_4u:2182: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya loko 'cintya iti darśayati. kim iti loko 'cintya iti darśayati?
K03psp_4u:2183: pañcaskandhā dhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādo yāvat sarvākārajñatā loko 'cintya iti darśayati. evaṃ vivikta iti atyantaśūnya iti svabhāvaśūnya iti darśayati.
K03psp_4u:2184: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya lokaḥ śānta iti darśayati. kim iti lokaḥ śānta iti darśayati?
K03psp_4u:2185: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā yāvat sarvākārajñatā lokaḥ śānta iti darśayati.
K03psp_4u:2186: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī.
K03psp_4u:2188: punar aparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati. kim iti lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati?
K03psp_4u:2191: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati. evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā lokaḥ śūnyataiveti darśayati. evaṃ hi subhūte (PSP_4:74)
K03psp_4u:2192: prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasya janayitrī asya ca lokasya darśayitrī. sā punar iyaṃ subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā tathāgatasyaivaṃ lokaṃ darśayati,
K03psp_4u:2193: yathā nehalokasaṃjñā nāpi paralokasaṃjñā bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2194: tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye nehalokasaṃjñāṃ paralokasaṃjñāṃ vā kuryād.
K03psp_4u:2197: mahākṛtyena bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā bhagavataḥ pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_4u:2201: mahākṛtyena subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā tathāgatānāṃ. kathaṃ ca subhūte mahākṛtyena prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
K03psp_4u:2202: mahākṛtyam idaṃ subhūte tathāgatānāṃ yad uta sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇalayanāparityāgārthena. kathaṃ ca subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
K03psp_4u:2203: acintyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam. evam acintyakṛtyena
K03psp_4u:2204: subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām. kathaṃ
K03psp_4u:2206: na hi subhūte kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:2207: yaḥ śaknuyāt tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ tulayitum. anena subhūte paryāyeṇātulyakṛtyena
K03psp_4u:2208: tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā. kathaṃ ca
K03psp_4u:2209: subhūte tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
K03psp_4u:2210: aprameyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ tan na śakyaṃ
K03psp_4u:2211: kenacit pramātum. anena subhūte paryāyeṇāprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_4u:2212: pratyupasthitā. kathañ ca subhūte tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām asaṃkhyeyakṛtyena
K03psp_4u:2214: asaṃkhyeyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ tan na śakyaṃ kenacit saṃkhyātum. anena subhūte paryāyeṇāsaṃkhyeyakṛtyena
K03psp_4u:2215: tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā. kathañ ca subhūte asamasamakṛtyena prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā?
K03psp_4u:2216: nāsti subhūte tathāgatānāṃ samaḥ kutaḥ punar uttaraḥ. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa asamasamakṛtyena tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā.
K03psp_4u:2218: kiṃ punar bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam?
K03psp_4u:2221: acintyaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam,
K03psp_4u:2222: evam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamaṃ subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam. rūpam api subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2224: vijñānaṃ subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam,
K03psp_4u:2225: evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādo 'cintyo 'tulyo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo 'samasamaḥ. evaṃ yāvat sarvajñatā 'py acintyā 'tulyā 'prameyā 'saṃkhyeyā
K03psp_4u:2227: yā subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra cittan na caitasikā vā dharmā upalapsyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2228: rūpaṃ hi subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman na prajñāyate,
K03psp_4u:2230: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman na prajñāyate. evaṃ dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādo 'cintyo 'tulyo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo 'samasamo na prajñāyate,
K03psp_4u:2233: kena kāraṇena bhagavan rūpam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman na prajñāyate,
K03psp_4u:2234: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasaman
K03psp_4u:2236: 'samasamo na prajñāyate. evaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāpi bhagavan kena kāraṇena 'cintyā 'tulyā
K03psp_4u:2239: rūpasyāpi cintanaṃ tulanaṃ pramāṇaṃ gaṇanaṃ samaviṣamatvaṃ na prajñayate. evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāś cintanaṃ tulanaṃ pramāṇaṃ gaṇanaṃ samaviṣamatvaṃ na prajñāyate.
K03psp_4u:2241: kena kāraṇena bhagavan rūpasya yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāś (PSP_4:76)
K03psp_4u:2242: cintanaṃ tulanaṃ pramāṇaṃ gaṇanaṃ samaviṣamatvaṃ na prajñāyate?
K03psp_4u:2250: subhūte yad rūpam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam api nu tatra rūpam upalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:2252: yat subhūte vijñānam acintyam atulyam aprameyam asaṃkhyeyam asamasamam api nu tatra
K03psp_4u:2253: vijñānam upalabhyate. ye dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2254: api nu tatra dhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā upalabhyante. yā subhūte sarvajñatā 'cintyā 'tulyā 'prameyā 'saṃkhyeyā 'samasamā 'pi nu tatra sarvajñatopalabhyate.
K03psp_4u:2258: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2259: ime te subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyāś cintanoparatatvād,
K03psp_4u:2263: asamasamāḥ samaviṣamoparatatvāt. anena subhūte paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2264: ime te subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyāś cintāsamatikrāntāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2268: asamasamāḥ samaviṣamasamatikrāntāḥ. acintyā iti subhūte acintanādhivacanam etat,
K03psp_4u:2273: ime te subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ. acintyā iti subhūte ākāśācintyatvād,
K03psp_4u:2274: evam atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā ākāśāsamasamatvād. evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatasya tathāgatadharmā acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā
K03psp_4u:2276: te na śakyante sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ sarvadevakenāpi lokena cintayituṃ vā
K03psp_4u:2277: tulayituṃ vā pramātuṃ vā saṃkhyātuṃ vā samaviṣamaṃ vā kartum. evam aprameyā buddhā
K03psp_4u:2279: asmin khalu punar acintyātulyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyāsamasamaparivartadharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
K03psp_4u:2280: viṃśatīnāṃ ca bhikṣuṇī śatānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
K03psp_4u:2281: ṣaṣṭeś copāsakasahasrāṇāṃ viṃśatīnām upāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddhaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2282: viṃśateś ca bodhisattvasahasrāṇām anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt.
K03psp_4u:2283: te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā buddhā bhaviṣyanti. ity acintyatādiviśeṣeṇa
K03psp_4u:2285: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:2289: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:2292: acintyakṛtyenātulyakṛtyenāprameyakṛtyenāsaṃkhyeyakṛtyenāsamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2293: atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pañcapāramitāḥ samāyuktāḥ. atra hi
K03psp_4u:2294: subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām adhyātmaśūnyatā samāyuktā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā samāyuktā,
K03psp_4u:2295: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi
K03psp_4u:2296: pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ samāyuktaḥ. atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:2297: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś
K03psp_4u:2298: catvāry āryasatyāni aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni
K03psp_4u:2299: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni samāyuktāni. atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:2301: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ samāyuktāḥ.
K03psp_4u:2302: atra hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ buddhabhūmiḥ samāyuktā yāvat sarvākārajñatā samāyuktā,
K03psp_4u:2303: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhnābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya (PSP_4:78)
K03psp_4u:2304: yāni tāni rājakṛtyāni bhavanti sarvāṇi tāny amātyasamāyuktāny alpotsukas tato rājā
K03psp_4u:2305: bhavaty apahṛtabhāraḥ rājakṛtye vā janapadakṛtye vā. evam eva subhūte ye kecic chrāvakadharmā
K03psp_4u:2306: vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā sarve te prajñāpāramitāsamāyuktāḥ
K03psp_4u:2307: prajñāpāramitā teṣāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_4u:2309: tathā hi subhūte gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā rūpasyāparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya pratyupasthitā,
K03psp_4u:2318: yāvat kathaṃ bhagavann anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya pratyupasthitā?
K03psp_4u:2320: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tad rūpaṃ yad rūpaṃ yena vā parigṛhṇīyād abhiniveśeta vā?
K03psp_4u:2325: samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tad vijñānaṃ yena vā parigṛhṇīyād abhiniveśeta?
K03psp_4u:2326: evaṃ yāvat samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yā parigṛhṇīyād abhiniveśeta?
K03psp_4u:2331: aham api subhūte tad rūpan na samanupaśyāmi yat parigṛhṇīyāṃ vā abhiniviśeyaṃ vā,
K03psp_4u:2334: aham api subhūte tad vijñānan na samanupaśyāmi yat parigṛhṇīyāṃ vā abhiniviśeyaṃ vā,
K03psp_4u:2336: evaṃ yāvad aham api subhūte tām (PSP_4:79)
K03psp_4u:2339: aham api subhūte buddhabhūmiṃ sarvajñatāṃ sarvākārajñatāṃ tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
K03psp_4u:2342: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair rūpan na parigrahītavyaṃ nābhiniveṣṭavyam. evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2343: vijñānaṃ subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na parigrahītavyan nābhiniveṣṭavyam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāni na parigrahītavyāni
K03psp_4u:2344: evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2346: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido
K03psp_4u:2347: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na parigrahītavyā nābhiniveṣṭavyā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
K03psp_4u:2348: na parigrahītavyā nābhiniveṣṭavyā. evaṃ buddhatvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvākārajñatvaṃ
K03psp_4u:2351: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
K03psp_4u:2352: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhā atarkā atarkāvacarā śāntā sūkṣmā
K03psp_4u:2353: nipunapaṇḍitavijñavedaniyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā. te khalu bhagavan bodhisattvāḥ
K03psp_4u:2356: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā avaropitakuśalamūlāḥ. te khalu bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:2359: saced bhagavan ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvāḥ sarve te śraddhānusāriṇo bhaveyuḥ,
K03psp_4u:2362: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yac ca jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2363: yā ceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām ekadevasikī kṣāntiruciś cintanā tulanā upaparīkṣaṇā gaṇanā iyam eva tataḥ paraṃ śreyaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2364: yasyeha evaṃrūpāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ruciḥ kṣāntiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2365: tathā hi yac ca śraddhānusāriṇo dharmānusāriṇo 'ṣṭamakasya srotaāpannānāṃ sakṛdāgāminām anāgāminām arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānañ ca prahāṇañ
K03psp_4u:2367: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma:
K03psp_4u:2369: yac ca yāvat pratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānaṃ yac ca prahāṇaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2372: yaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
K03psp_4u:2373: śrutvā ca likheta likhitvā ca uddiśyed yoniśaś ca manasikuryāt. eṣāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca kṣiprataraṃ parinirvāṇaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2374: na tv eva teṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāvirahitānām anyeṣu sūtrānteṣu caratām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2375: tathā hi iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sāmutkarṣikā dharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śraddhānusāribhir dharmānusāribhir aṣṭamakaiś ca śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2376: yatra ca srotaāpannaiḥ sakṛdāgāmibhir anāgāmibhir arhadbhiḥ pratyekabuddhair mahāyānasaṃprasthitair bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiś ca śikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2377: yathā tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ śikṣamāṇair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā.
K03psp_4u:2379: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā udānam udānayāmāsuh:
K03psp_4u:2382: yatra hi nāma bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā śraddhānusāriṇo niryāsyanti dharmānusāriṇo niryāsyanti aṣṭamakāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2385: yatra śikṣitvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante abhisaṃbhotsyante. na cāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate.
K03psp_4u:2387: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K03psp_4u:2388: bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntā abhūvan. te nātidūraṅ
K03psp_4u:2390: ye kāmāvacarā devaputrās te kāmadhātau prātiṣṭhante,
K03psp_4u:2391: ye rūpāvacarā devaputrās te rūpadhātau prātiṣṭhante.
K03psp_4u:2392: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:2393: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate sa kutaś cyuta ihopapanno bhaviṣyati?
K03psp_4u:2395: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate
K03psp_4u:2396: nāvaleṣyati na saṃleṣyati na dhanvāyiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati abhinandiṣyati
K03psp_4u:2397: cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotuṃ śrutvā cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ tenaiva
K03psp_4u:2399: na tān manasikārān gacchann āgacchan sthito niṣaṇnaḥ śāyito vā satatasamitam ucchrakṣyati,
K03psp_4u:2400: taṃ ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ pudgalaṃ satatasamitam anubandhiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:2401: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaur notsṛjati vatsam. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:2402: mahāsattvo 'syā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśas tāvan na jahāti taṃ dharmabhāṇakaṃ
K03psp_4u:2403: yāvad iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kāyagatā kṛtā bhaviṣyati dhṛtāvācitā paricitā manasā
K03psp_4u:2405: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo navayānikapudgalo manuṣyeṣv eva cyuto manuṣyeṣv evopapannaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2406: tathā hi tena navayānikena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvam apīyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā
K03psp_4u:2407: likhitvā pustakagatā satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitā arcitā apacāyitā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ
K03psp_4u:2408: samantāc ca dīpamālābhiḥ sa tena kuśalamūlena manuṣyeṣv eva cyuto manuṣyeṣv evopapannaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2412: syād bhagavan paryāyo yad etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo
K03psp_4u:2413: buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya tataś cyutaḥ sann ihopapanno
K03psp_4u:2414: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate 'dhimucya likhiṣyati
K03psp_4u:2415: likhitvodgṛhīṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati.
K03psp_4u:2418: syāt subhūte paryāyo yad etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo
K03psp_4u:2419: buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya tataś cyutaḥ sann ihopapanno
K03psp_4u:2420: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ saha śravaṇenādhimokṣyate adhimucya likhiṣyati
K03psp_4u:2421: likhitvodgrahīṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2422: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāc chrutā śrutvā codgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā svādhyāyitā manasikṛtā,
K03psp_4u:2423: sa tenaiva kuśalamūlena tair eva manasikārair ihopapannaḥ.
K03psp_4u:2424: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tuṣitebhyo devebhyaś cyutaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2425: iha manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyām upapannaḥ sa etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2426: tathā hi subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K03psp_4u:2427: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ sa tena kuśalamūlena ihopapannaḥ.
K03psp_4u:2428: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na śrutā,
K03psp_4u:2430: tasya manuṣyaloke upapannasya bhavati kāṅkṣayitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā,
K03psp_4u:2431: tena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pīyaṅ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na śrutā,
K03psp_4u:2433: tasyāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣayitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā,
K03psp_4u:2435: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato (PSP_4:83)
K03psp_4u:2437: tasyāsyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
K03psp_4u:2438: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi,
K03psp_4u:2439: adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na śrutā na paripraśnīkṛtā bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2440: tasyemāṅ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣayitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
K03psp_4u:2441: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni na paripraśnīkṛtāni bhavanti na śrutāni vā,
K03psp_4u:2442: tasyemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāsyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
K03psp_4u:2443: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi catvāri śamyakprahāṇāni
K03psp_4u:2444: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo na śrutaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2446: tasyāsyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāsyamāṇāyāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
K03psp_4u:2447: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi catvāri dhyānāni
K03psp_4u:2448: catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāry āryasatyāni pañcābhijñāḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni,
K03psp_4u:2449: aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvasamādhidhāraṇīmukhāni daśa bodhisattvabhūmayo
K03psp_4u:2450: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā na śrutā bhavanti,
K03psp_4u:2452: tasyemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
K03psp_4u:2453: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pi anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir na śrutā bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2455: tasyemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ bhavati dhanvāyitatvaṃ bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā.
K03psp_4u:2456: punar aparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntato 'pīyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā na śrutā bhavati na paripraśnīkṛtā (PSP_4:84)
K03psp_4u:2457: na bhāvitā na bahulīkṛtā na yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā,
K03psp_4u:2458: ekaṃ vā divasaṃ divasadvayaṃ vā divasatrayaṃ vā catvāri vā pañca vā ṣaḍ vā daśa vā divasāni,
K03psp_4u:2459: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sa saṃhāryā bhavati virahitaś ca bhavati prajñāpāramitayā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2460: evam etad bhavati subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato 'pi na śrutā na paripraśnīkṛtā na bhāvitā na bahulīkṛtā na yoniśaś ca manasikṛtā,
K03psp_4u:2461: tasya kañcit kālaṃ cchando bhavati gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kañcit kālaṃ cchando na bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2462: sa punar evaṃ saṃhriyate calācalayā buddhyā tūlapicūpamaś ca bhavati. sa khalu punaḥ
K03psp_4u:2463: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cirayānasaṃprasthito veditavyo na kalyāṇamitraparigṛhīto
K03psp_4u:2464: na samyaksaṃbuddhaparyupāsitaḥ. na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_4u:2465: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā uddiṣṭā na svādhyāyitā na yoniśo manasikṛtā na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2466: na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ. nādhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2468: na samyakprahāṇeṣu narddhipādeṣu nendriyeṣu na baleṣu na bodhyaṅgeṣu nāryāṣṭāṅgamārge śikṣitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2469: na pañcasv abhijñāsu nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu nāryasatyeṣu nāṣṭavimokṣeṣu śikṣitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2474: na vaiśāradyeṣu na pratisaṃvitsu nāṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2475: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitaḥ. te na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā navayānasaṃprasthitā veditavyāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2476: te dharmamātrakeṇa ca śraddhāmātrakeṇa ca premamātrakeṇa ca samanvāgatā,
K03psp_4u:2477: na punaḥ satkurvantīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhituṃ vā vācayituṃ vā uddeṣṭuṃ vā svādhyāyatuṃ
K03psp_4u:2478: vā yoniśo manasikaraṇāya yāvan na punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
K03psp_4u:2480: noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyanti nāpy anayā gambhīrayā
K03psp_4u:2481: prajñāpāramitayā param anugrahīṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā
K03psp_4u:2483: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatayā nānugrahīṣyanti. nāpīmāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anubhaviṣyanti. evaṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ dānapāramitāṃ,
K03psp_4u:2484: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nānubhaviṣyanti. teṣāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhūmibhyām anyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
K03psp_4u:2485: yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2486: tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ca iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato
K03psp_4u:2487: 'pi na likhitā noddiṣṭā na svādhyātā na yoniśo manasikṛtā nāpy anayā prajñāpāramitayā
K03psp_4u:2488: kaścid anuparigṛhīto nāpi tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitānubhūtā,
K03psp_4u:2489: te na teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāñ ca bhūmidvayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam. iti samudāgamaviśeṣeṇa nirodhe tṛtīyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
K03psp_4u:2490: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sāmudrikā naur yadā bhinnā bhavati tadā ye tatra puruṣāḥ kāṣṭhaṃ vā dṛtiṃ vā mṛtakuṇapaṃ vā nādhyālambante na parigṛhṇanti,
K03psp_4u:2491: veditavyam etat subhūte aprāptā eva te puruṣāḥ kulaṃ samudre kālaṃ kariṣyanti. ye
K03psp_4u:2492: khalu punaḥ sāmudrikāyāṃ nāvibhinnāyāṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vā dṛtiṃ vā mṛtakuṇapaṃ vā puruṣā
K03psp_4u:2494: veditavyam etat subhūte na te puruṣā mahāsamudre kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:2496: te akṣatā anupahatāḥ svastinā sthale sthāsyanti. evam eva subhūte ye te bodhisattvayānikāḥ
K03psp_4u:2497: kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa premamātrakeṇa ca samanvāgatā,
K03psp_4u:2498: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti nādhyālambiṣyante,
K03psp_4u:2499: veditavyam etat subhūte te bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāntarā evādhvani vyavasādam āpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:2500: aprāptā eva sarvākārajñatāṃ te śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:2501: yāvan na dhyānapāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na dānapāramitāṃ likhiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti, (PSP_4:86)
K03psp_4u:2502: nādhyālambiṣyanti. evaṃ na saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyān dharmān na catvāry āryasatyāni nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2503: nādhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvan nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ nāṣṭa vimokṣān na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr
K03psp_4u:2504: na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na sarvasamādhisamāpattīr na sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni
K03psp_4u:2505: na daśa balāni na vaiśāradyāni na pratisaṃvido nāveṇikān buddhadharmān yāvan na sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktān
K03psp_4u:2506: sūtrāntān likhiṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na yoniśo manasikariṣyanti nādhyālambiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:2507: veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāntarāpy adhvani vyavasādam āpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:2508: aprāptā eva sarvākārajñatāṃ te śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā sākṣātkariṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:2509: yeṣāṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām asti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti
K03psp_4u:2510: premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo
K03psp_4u:2512: te ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyanty uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti adhyālambiṣyante yoniśo manasikariṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:2513: paśya subhūte kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca śraddhāṃ kṣāntiṃ prema prasādam adhyāśayaṃ rucim adhimuktiṃ cchandaṃ tyāgam anikṣiptadhuratām anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:2514: yaiḥ prajñāpāramitā parigṛhītā dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitā parigṛhītā,
K03psp_4u:2515: yair adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāny apramāṇāni dhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2516: yair aṣṭa vimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni parigṛhītāni,
K03psp_4u:2517: yair daśa balāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvida āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2519: yair yāvat sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā te nāntarāpy adhvani vyavasādam āpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:2520: te 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmiñ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca sattvāṃś ca paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante.
K03psp_4u:2522: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭena (PSP_4:87)
K03psp_4u:2524: veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ ghaṭaś ciram anuvartsyate kṣipram eva vinakṣyati vilayam āpatsyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2526: sa bhūmiparyavasāna eva bhaviṣyati. evam eva subhūte kiñ cāpi bodhisattvayānikānāṃ
K03psp_4u:2527: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo
K03psp_4u:2528: 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:2547: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair aparigṛhītāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2549: veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā antarā vyasanam
K03psp_4u:2550: āpatsyante. kim iti subhūte bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntarā
K03psp_4u:2552: yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā?
K03psp_4u:2553: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahen nadyāḥ kūpād vā sarasto vā taḍāgād vā udapānād vā tasyodakaṃ
K03psp_4u:2554: veditavyam etat subhūte svastināyaṃ ghaṭo gṛhaṃ gamiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:2555: evam eva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti
K03psp_4u:2556: prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:2560: dhyānapāramitayā parigṛhīto vīryapāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ kṣāntipāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ śīlapāramitayā (PSP_4:88)
K03psp_4u:2563: veditavyam etad subhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādam āpatsyate,
K03psp_4u:2564: yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā akṣato 'nupahato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. ity ādhāraviśeṣeṇa mārge prathamaḥ
K03psp_4u:2565: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sāmudrikā naur anavabaddhānākoṭitā akoṭīkṛtā udake 'vatāritā bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2566: veditavyam etat subhūte iyaṃ naur antarā saṃsatsyate vyasanam āpatsyate,
K03psp_4u:2567: anyena bhāṇḍaṃ bhaviṣyati anyena naur bhaviṣyati. evaṃ sa vaṇig anupāyakuśalo veditavyo
K03psp_4u:2568: mahatānayena saṃyokṣyate mahatā ratnena bahiṣkṛto bhaviṣyati. evam eva kiṃ cāpi subhūte
K03psp_4u:2569: bodhisattvānām asti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti
K03psp_4u:2570: rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
K03psp_4u:2571: te ca prajñāpāramitayāparigṛhītā upāyakauśalena cāparigṛhītā dhyānapāramitayāparigṛhītā
K03psp_4u:2573: sarvaśūnyatābhir aparigṛhītāḥ saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyair dharmair aparigṛhītāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2584: veditavyam etat subhūte amī bodhisattvā antarā vyadhvani vyasanam āpatsyante,
K03psp_4u:2587: kiṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvānām antarā vyasanaṃ yad uta śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir
K03psp_4u:2588: vā. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātikaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāyāṃ nāvi svākoṭitāyām
K03psp_4u:2590: veditavyam etat subhūte neyaṃ sāmudrikā naur antarā vyasanam āpatsyate,
K03psp_4u:2591: gamiṣyaty eṣā taṃ pradeśaṃ yatrānayā gantavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2592: laukikānāñ ca ratnānāṃ sa vaṇig lābhī bhaviṣyati. evam eva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty (PSP_4:89)
K03psp_4u:2593: adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:2594: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2595: dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā dānapāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2596: sarvaśūnyatābhiḥ sarvabodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhair apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2601: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2603: veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyasanam āpatsyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2604: evam eva subhūte bhavati yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir
K03psp_4u:2605: asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti
K03psp_4u:2607: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīto bhavaty upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2608: dhyānapāramitayā vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā śīlapāramitayā dānapāramitayā parigṛhīto bhavati. evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatayā parigṛhīto bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2609: sa ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ patati.
K03psp_4u:2611: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo viṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakas tasya kaścid eva śarīre vyādhir utpadyeta vātiko vā paittiko vā śleṣmiko vā sāṃnipātiko vā,
K03psp_4u:2613: subhūte api nu sa puruṣo muktakaḥ śaktaḥ svayam utkrāntum.
K03psp_4u:2617: kaścit punaḥ subhūte sa puruṣa uttiṣṭhet?
K03psp_4u:2619: kiṃ cāpi bhagavan sa puruṣo mañcād uttiṣṭhed,
K03psp_4u:2620: atha ca punar apratibalaḥ krośāntaṃ vā prakramituṃ sa tayā jarayā taiś ca vyādhibhiḥ kṣapitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2624: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti
K03psp_4u:2625: prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:2633: veditavyam etat subhūte 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2634: tathā hi sa prajñāpāramitayā aparīgṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhīto yāvat sarvākārajñatayāparigṛhītaḥ.
K03psp_4u:2635: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo viṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2636: sa vātena vā pittena vā śleṣmanā vā sāṃnipātena vā parikṣapitas,
K03psp_4u:2637: taṃ mañcād utsthāpya dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇayoḥ pārśvayor abalaṃ vyānuparigṛhya evaṃ vadetām:
K03psp_4u:2638: āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenecchasi yena kāmo 'nuparigṛhītas tvam āvābhyāṃ nāntarā
K03psp_4u:2639: patiṣyasi yāvan na tat sthānam anuprāpto bhaviṣyasi. evam eva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya
K03psp_4u:2640: mahāsattvasyāsti śraddhāsti kṣāntir asti premāsti prasādo 'sty adhyāśayo 'sti rucir
K03psp_4u:2641: asty adhimuktir asti cchando 'sti tyāgo 'sty anikṣiptadhuratānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:2642: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto,
K03psp_4u:2649: veditavyam etat subhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā saṃsatsyate,
K03psp_4u:2650: pratibalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tat sthānam anuprāptuṃ yad utānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2653: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś cāparigṛhītāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalena cāparigṛhītāḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ ca patanti?
K03psp_4u:2655: sādhu sādhu subhūte yas tvaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham etam arthaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase,
K03psp_4u:2656: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādita eva yad dānan dadāti tad ahaṃkāramamakārapatitayā saṃtatyā dadāti,
K03psp_4u:2663: tasya tad dānan dadata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:2680: sa tena dānena manyate tad dānaṃ manyate dānaṃ mameti manyate,
K03psp_4u:2682: tayā prajñayā manyate tāṃ prajñāṃ manyate prajñāṃ mameti manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2683: na hi dānapāramitāyā ete vikalpāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2685: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā na hi prajñāpāramitāyā ete vikalpāḥ saṃvidyante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:2687: sa ca bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo nāraṃ jānāti na pāraṃ jānāti,
K03psp_4u:2688: so 'parigṛhīto dānapāramitayā śīlapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā vīryapāramitayā dhyānapāramitayā
K03psp_4u:2689: prajñāpāramitayāparigṛhīto yāvat sarvākārajñatayāparigṛhītaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati,
K03psp_4u:2690: na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām. kathañ ca bodhisattvo 'nupāyakuśalo bhavati?
K03psp_4u:2691: iha subhūte yo bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ādāv evam anupāyena dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_4u:2710: sa dānaṃ manyate dānena manyate dānaṃ mameti manyate,
K03psp_4u:2711: śīlaṃ manyate śīlena manyate śīlavān aham iti manyate,
K03psp_4u:2712: kṣāntiṃ manyate kṣāntyā manyate kṣamāvān aham iti manyate,
K03psp_4u:2713: vīryaṃ manyate vīryeṇa manyate vīryaṃ mameti manyate,
K03psp_4u:2714: dhyānaṃ manyate dhyānena manyate dhyānavān aham iti manyate,
K03psp_4u:2715: prajñāṃ manyate prajñayā manyate prajñā mameti manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2716: na hi dānapāramitāyāṃ vikalpaḥ saṃvidyate yathāsau vikalpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2717: tathā hy āramitaiṣā yad uta dānapāramitā,
K03psp_4u:2721: āramitaiṣā yad uta dhyānapāramitā. na hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vikalpaḥ saṃvidyate yathāsau vikalpayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2722: tathā hy āramitaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_4u:2723: sa ca bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro nāraṃ jānāti na pāraṃ jānāti,
K03psp_4u:2724: so 'parigṛhīto dānapāramitayā parigṛhītaḥ śīlapāramitayāparigṛhītaḥ kṣāntipāramitayāparigṛhīto vīryapāramitayāparigṛhīto dhyānapāramitayāparigṛhītaḥ
K03psp_4u:2725: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatayā śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati,
K03psp_4u:2726: na niryāsyati sarvākārajñatāyām. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā copāyakauśalena
K03psp_4u:2727: cāparigṛhītaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. kathaṃ ca subhūte
K03psp_4u:2728: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā copāyakauśalena ca parigṛhīto na śrāvakabhūmiṃ
K03psp_4u:2731: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ādāv eva dānaṃ dadan,
K03psp_4u:2739: ahaṃ dānan dadāmīdan dānan dadāmy asyai dānaṃ dadāmi,
K03psp_4u:2756: sa dānaṃ na manyate dānena na manyate dānaṃ mameti na manyate,
K03psp_4u:2757: śīlaṃ na manyate śīlena na manyate śīlaṃ mameti na manyate,
K03psp_4u:2758: kṣāntiṃ na manyate kṣāntyā na manyate kṣāntiṃ mameti na manyate,
K03psp_4u:2759: vīryaṃ na manyate vīryeṇa na manyate vīryaṃ mameti na manyate,
K03psp_4u:2760: dhyānaṃ na manyate dhyānena na manyate dhyānaṃ mameti na manyate,
K03psp_4u:2761: prajñāṃ na manyate prajñayā na manyate prajñā mameti na manyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2762: tathā hi dānapāramitāyāṃ vikalpo na saṃvidyate yena manyate,
K03psp_4u:2763: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyāṃ vikalpo na saṃvidyate yena manyate,
K03psp_4u:2764: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vikalpo na saṃvidyate yena manyate,
K03psp_4u:2766: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā āramitaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
K03psp_4u:2767: sa ca bodhisattvo mahāsattva āramitāñ ca pāramitāñ ca na manyate,
K03psp_4u:2771: yāvat sarvākārajñatayā parigṛhīto na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
K03psp_4u:2772: sarvākārajñatāṃ cārāgayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
K03psp_4u:2773: parigṛhīta upāyakauśalena ca parigṛhīto na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ
K03psp_4u:2776: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:2777: kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ?
K03psp_4u:2785: iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ (PSP_4:94)
K03psp_4u:2786: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni
K03psp_4u:2788: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā uddeṣṭāraḥ,
K03psp_4u:2790: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yadyad eva dānan dadāsi tattat sarvam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmaya,
K03psp_4u:2791: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yadyad eva śīlaṃ rakṣasi,
K03psp_4u:2797: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2798: mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārato mā vijñānataḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2799: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin dānapāramitayā parāmrākṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2800: mā śīlapāramitayā mā kṣāntipāramitayā mā vīryapāramitayā mā dhyānapāramitayā,
K03psp_4u:2802: mā adhyātmaśūnyatayā mā bahirdhāśūnyatayā mā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā parāmrākṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2807: mā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ mā āryasatyair mā aṣṭābhir vimokṣair mā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ,
K03psp_4u:2809: mā samādhibhir mā dhāraṇīmukhair mā daśabhis tathāgatabalair mā caturbhir vaiṣāradyair mā catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir mā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parāmrākṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2810: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputrānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ parāmrākṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2811: aparāmṛṣṭaṃ hi rūpam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyati,
K03psp_4u:2814: aparāmṛṣṭā dānapāramitā śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
K03psp_4u:2826: aparāmṛṣṭā yāvat sarvākārajñatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyati. mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2829: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra vijñāne spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2831: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2840: mā aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2843: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra sarvākārajñatāyāṃ spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2845: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra srotaāpattiphale spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2846: mā sakṛdāgāmiphale mā anāgāmiphale mā arhattve mā pratyekabodhau spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ,
K03psp_4u:2848: mānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau spṛhāṃ kārṣīḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2849: svabhāvaśūnyā hi kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ. ity anāsvādanāviśeṣeṇa mārge caturthaḥ kṣaṇaḥ iti viśeṣalakṣaṇam
K03psp_4u:2851: duṣkarakārakā hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
K03psp_4u:2852: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ.
K03psp_4u:2856: ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣv anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayanty anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā (PSP_4:96)
K03psp_4u:2858: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā lokasya sukhāya,
K03psp_4u:2859: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ saṃprasthitā lokasya trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāma ity anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ. lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmo,
K03psp_4u:2860: lokasya layanaṃ lokasya parāyaṇaṃ lokasya dvīpā lokasya pariṇāyakā anukampakā nāthā
K03psp_4u:2861: lokasya gatir bhaviṣyāma iti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ. kathañ ca
K03psp_4u:2862: subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ lokasya hitāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti?
K03psp_4u:2863: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvān pañcabhyo gatibhyaḥ parimocyābhayasthale
K03psp_4u:2864: kṣame nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayanti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:2865: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā lokasya hitāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti. iti hitakāritram
K03psp_4u:2866: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā lokasya sukhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti?
K03psp_4u:2867: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān
K03psp_4u:2869: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā lokānāṃ sukhāya saṃprasthitā bhavanti. iti sukhakāritram
K03psp_4u:2870: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti?
K03psp_4u:2871: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya yāni tāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni tataḥ sattvāṃs trāyanti,
K03psp_4u:2872: teṣāñ ca duṣkhānāṃ prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K03psp_4u:2873: te taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvānupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti.
K03psp_4u:2875: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā lokasya śaranaṃ bhavanti?
K03psp_4u:2876: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya jātijarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmaṇaḥ
K03psp_4u:2878: nirvāṇadhātau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā lokasya śaraṇaṃ
K03psp_4u:2880: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhavanti?
K03psp_4u:2881: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:2882: sarvadharmāṇām aśleṣāya dharman deśayanti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K03psp_4u:2883: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ layanaṃ bhavanti.
K03psp_4u:2885: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām aśleṣo bhavati?
K03psp_4u:2895: yo vijñānasyānirodhaḥ sa vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu
K03psp_4u:2896: pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca sarvapāramitāsu saptatriṃsatsu bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu āryasatyeṣv
K03psp_4u:2899: yaḥ subhūte sarvākārajñatāyā aśleṣaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā asaṃbandho,
K03psp_4u:2900: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā asaṃbandhaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādo,
K03psp_4u:2901: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anutpādaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā anirodho,
K03psp_4u:2902: yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā anirodhaḥ sa sarvākārajñatāyā aśleṣaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā
K03psp_4u:2903: mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ sarvadharmāśleṣāya dharman deśayanti.
K03psp_4u:2905: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmā lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti?
K03psp_4u:2906: iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām evaṃdharman deśayanti,
K03psp_4u:2907: yad rūpasya pāran na tad rūpaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2909: yad vijñānasya pāran na tad vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2910: yat skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pāran na te skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2911: yat sarvapāramitānāṃ pāran na tāḥ sarvapāramitāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2912: yat sarvaśūnyatānāṃ pāran na tāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2913: yad bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pāran na te bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2915: yad āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ pāran na te āveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2916: yāvad yat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pāran na sā sarvākārajñatā,
K03psp_4u:2917: yathā ca subhūte rūpan tathā sarvadharmās tathā sarvākārajñatā.
K03psp_4u:2919: yadi bhagavan yathā sarvadharmās tathā rūpaṃ nanv abhisaṃbuddhair ca bhavati bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:2920: na hi bhagavan rūpasya pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti,
K03psp_4u:2921: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:2922: na vijñānasya pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti. na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ
K03psp_4u:2924: pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti. idaṃ rūpam iti,
K03psp_4u:2926: idaṃ vijñānam iti yāvad ime skandhā ime dhātava imāny āyatanāni ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2927: imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni imāḥ pāramitā imāḥ śūnyatā ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā imāny āryasatyāni imā abhijñā imā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K03psp_4u:2933: na hi subhūte rūpasya pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti,
K03psp_4u:2934: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:2935: na vijñānasya pāre vikalpaḥ kaścit. evaṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāñ ca pāre vikalpaḥ kaścin,
K03psp_4u:2936: na pāramitānāṃ sarvaśūnyatānāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ pāre vikalpaḥ kaścin,
K03psp_4u:2938: evan na yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāḥ pāre vikalpaḥ kaścid asti. api nu subhūte duṣkaraṃ
K03psp_4u:2939: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ya imān evaṃrūpān dharmān upanidhyāyanti na cāvalīyante.
K03psp_4u:2940: evaṃ ca mayaite dharmā abhisaṃbodhavyā. evañ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyaitān
K03psp_4u:2941: dharmān evaṃśāntān evaṃpraṇītān prakāśayiṣyāma iti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā
K03psp_4u:2942: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti. iti suparāyaṇakāritram
K03psp_4u:2943: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasya dvīpā bhavanti?
K03psp_4u:2944: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ye pradeśā udakaparicchinnā bhavanti mahānadīṣu ca mahāsamudreṣu vā te subhūte dvīpā ity ucyante. evam eva subhūte rūpaṃ
K03psp_4u:2946: vijñānaṃ subhūte pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnāni,
K03psp_4u:2957: yāvat sarvākārajñatā pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnā. etena subhūte pūrvāntāparāntaparicchedena sarvadharmāḥ paricchinnāḥ,
K03psp_4u:2959: etac chāntam etat praṇītam etad yathātmyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:2960: yad uta śūnyatānupalambho dharmo paricchedas tṛṣṇākṣayo virāgo virodho nirvāṇam.
K03psp_4u:2961: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnān
K03psp_4u:2963: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasyāloko bhavati?
K03psp_4u:2964: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dīrgharātram avidyāṇḍakośaparyavanaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ tamobhibhūtānāṃ prajñayāvabhāsayan mohāndhakāram avidyātamobhinattitimiraṃ
K03psp_4u:2965: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasyāloko bhavati.
K03psp_4u:2966: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām ulkādhāro bhavati prabhākaraḥ?
K03psp_4u:2968: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya ya ime ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāś
K03psp_4u:2969: catuḥsaṃgrahavastupratisaṃyuktāś ca sūtrāntās teṣām arthan tattvataḥ sattvebhyaḥ prakāśayati,
K03psp_4u:2970: sattvāṃś ca tatra niyojayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_4u:2971: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām ulkādhāraḥ prabhākaro bhavati.
K03psp_4u:2972: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ sārthavāho bhavati?
K03psp_4u:2973: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kumārgasaṃprasthitānāṃ
K03psp_4u:2974: sattvānāṃ caturgamanagāminām ekāyanaṃ mārgam upadiśati sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye śokopadravāṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:2975: samatikramāya duḥkhadaurmanasyānām astaṃgamāyāryasya dharmasyādhigamāya nirvāṇasya sākṣātkriyāyai,
K03psp_4u:2976: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ sārthavāho bhavati. iti dvīpakāritram
K03psp_4u:2977: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya lokasya pariṇāyako bhavati?
K03psp_4u:2978: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvanikāye mahākaruṇām utpādyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:2983: dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati. upāyapāramitāyāḥ praṇidhānapāramitāyā balapāramitāyā
K03psp_4u:2988: abhijñānāṃ cānutpādāyānirodhāyāsaṃkleśāyā vyavadānāya dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati.
K03psp_4u:2991: sarvadhāraṇīmukhānāṃ daśānāṃ balānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām
K03psp_4u:2997: dharman deśayati saṃprakāśayati. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:2998: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ pariṇāyako bhavati. iti pariṇāyakakāritram
K03psp_4u:2999: kathañ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ sattvānāṃ gatir bhavati?
K03psp_4u:3000: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mūḍhānāṃ gatikānāṃ sattvānām antaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya gatir bhavati. ākāśagatikaṃ rūpam iti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati,
K03psp_4u:3002: ākāśagatikaṃ vijñānam iti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. ākāśagatikā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ
K03psp_4u:3003: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ceti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ
K03psp_4u:3006: 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā ākāśagatikā iti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. ākāśagatikā
K03psp_4u:3007: sarvajñateti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. anāgatigatikā rūpaśūnyatā sā nāgacchati
K03psp_4u:3010: anāgatigatikā vijñānaśūnyatā sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati.
K03psp_4u:3012: śūnyatā sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. evam anāgatigatikā
K03psp_4u:3016: sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. anāgatigatikā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiśūnyatā
K03psp_4u:3017: sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. anāgatigatikā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñāśūnyatā
K03psp_4u:3018: sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. anāgatigatikā daśatathāgatabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmaśūnyatā
K03psp_4u:3019: sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. anāgatigatikā sarvākārajñatāśūnyatā
K03psp_4u:3020: sā nāgacchati na gacchatīti sattvānāṃ dharman deśayati. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:3021: mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ gatir bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3022: śūnyatāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3023: na hi subhūte śūnyatāyā āgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. ānimittagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3024: na hi subhūte ānimittasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. apraṇihitagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3025: na hi subhūte 'praṇihitasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. anabhisaṃskāragatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:3026: na hi subhūte 'nabhisaṃskārasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. ity anābhogakāritram
K03psp_4u:3027: anutpādagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3028: na hi subhūte 'nutpādasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. anirodhagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3029: na hi subhūte 'nirodhasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. asaṃkleśāvyavadānagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:3030: na hi subhūte 'saṃkleśāvyavadānasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. ajātābhāvagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3031: na hi subhūte 'jātābhāvasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. svapnagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3032: na hi subhūte svapnasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. māyāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3033: na hi subhūte māyāyā āgatir vā gatir (PSP_4:103)
K03psp_4u:3034: vopalabhyate. pratiśrutkāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3035: na hi subhūte pratiśrutkāyā āgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. pratibhāsagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:3036: na hi subhūte pratibhāsasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. nirmitagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3037: na hi subhūte nirmitasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. marīcīgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3038: na hi subhūte marīcyā āgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. gandharvanagaragatikā hi subhūte sarva dharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:3039: na hi subhūte gandharvanagarasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. anantāparyantagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3040: na hi subhūte anantāparyantasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. anuddhārāpratyuddhāragatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3041: na hi subhūte 'nuddhārāpratyuddhārasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. anāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:3042: na hi subhote 'nāgater āgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. anāyūhāniryūhagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3043: na hi subhūte 'nāyūhāniryūhasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. ayogāviyogāśleṣāviśleṣagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3044: na hi subhūte 'yogāviyogāśleṣāviśleṣasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. ātmagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:3045: na hi subhūte ātmana āgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. sattvagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmā,
K03psp_4u:3046: jīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakotthāpakasamutthāpakagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3047: atyantatayā hi subhūte sattvo na saṃvidyate jīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakotthāpakasamutthāpakā na saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:3048: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. nityagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3049: sukhagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3050: ātmagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3052: hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3053: atyantatayā hi subhūte nityaṃ sukham ātmā śubhan na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3054: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. anityagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3055: duḥkhagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3056: anātmagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3057: aśubhagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3058: atyantatayā hi subhūte anityaṃ duḥkham anātmā aśubhan na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3059: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. rāgagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3060: doṣagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3061: mohagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3062: dṛṣṭigatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3063: atyantatayā hi subhūte dṛṣṭikṛtaṃ vastu na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3065: , kuta evāgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. tathatāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3066: na hi subhūte tathatāyā āgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:3067: dharmadhātugatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3068: bhūtakoṭigatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3069: samatāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3070: acintyadhātugatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3071: na hi subhūte dharmadhātor bhūtakoṭeḥ samatāyā acintyadhātor āgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate. acalagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3072: na hi subhūte 'calasya dharmasyāgatir vā gatir vopalabhyate.
K03psp_4u:3074: rūpagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3075: atyantatayā hi subhūte rūpan na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3076: kutaḥ punar asyāgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
K03psp_4u:3077: vijñānagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3078: atyantatayā hi subhūte vijñānan na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3079: kutaḥ punar asyāgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgagatikā
K03psp_4u:3080: hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3082: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. dānapāramitāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3083: atyantatayā hi subhūte dānapāramitā na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3084: kutaḥ punar asyā āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ śīlapāramitāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3085: kṣāntipāramitāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3086: vīryapāramitāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
