K03psp_4u:3087: dhyānapāramitāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3088: prajñāpāramitāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3089: atyantatayā hi subhūte śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitā na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3090: kutaḥ punar āsām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. adhyātmaśūnyatāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3091: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3094: kutaḥ punar āsām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. smṛtyupasthānagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3095: atyantatayā hi subhūte smṛtyupasthānāni na saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:3096: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3098: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattigatikā
K03psp_4u:3099: hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. āryasatyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhagatikā
K03psp_4u:3100: hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvicchūnyatānimittapraṇihitāṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā
K03psp_4u:3101: gatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3102: atyantatayā hi subhūte sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:3103: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. srotaāpattiphalagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3104: sakṛdāgāmiphalagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3105: anāgāmiphalagatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante,
K03psp_4u:3107: hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3109: kutaḥ punar eṣām āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati. anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhigatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmās te tāṅ gatin na vyativartante. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:3110: atyantatayā hi subhūte 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3111: kutaḥ punar asyā āgatir vā gatir vā bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_4u:3115: ye subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvacaritā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:3118: kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītāś ca ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣante. iti gatikāritram
K03psp_4u:3121: kāni punar bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ liṅgāny ākārāṇi nimittāni svabhāvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3123: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3124: rāgavinayaviviktasvabhāvās te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3125: doṣamohavinayaviviktasvabhāvās te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti. iti kleśaviviktasvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3126: rāgaliṅgaviviktasvabhāvāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3127: doṣamohaliṅgaviviktasvabhāvāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti. iti talliṅgavivekasvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3128: rāganimittavivekasvabhāvāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3129: doṣamohanimittavivekasvabhāvāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti. iti tannimittavivekasvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3130: rāgārāgaviviktasvabhāvāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3131: doṣādoṣamohāmohaviviktasvabhāvāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3134: kiṃgatikās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3137: sarvākārajñatāgatikā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3140: sarvākārajñatāgatikās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ gatir bhavanti.
K03psp_4u:3143: sarvākārajñatāgatikās te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ gatir bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3147: duṣkarakārakā bhagavaṃs te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3148: yair ayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti. na cātra sattvo na sattvaprajñaptir upalabhyate.
K03psp_4u:3151: duṣkarakārakās te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:3152: yair ayaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti. sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃnāho na rūpasaṃbaddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3153: atyantatayā hi subhūte rūpaṃ na saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:3154: na bodhisattvo na bodhisattvasaṃnāhas tenocyate subhūte na rūpasaṃbaddho 'yaṃ saṃnāha iti,
K03psp_4u:3156: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃnāho na vijñānasaṃbaddhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3157: atyantatayā hi subhūte vijñānan na saṃvidyate na bodhisattvo na bodhisattvasaṃnāhas
K03psp_4u:3158: tenocyate subhūte na vijñānasaṃbaddho 'yaṃ saṃnāha iti. na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya
K03psp_4u:3159: pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā saṃbaddho 'yaṃ saṃnāhaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3161: vā na saṃvidyante na bodhisattvo na bodhisattvasaṃnāhas tenocyate subhūte na pratītyasamutpādasaṃbandho
K03psp_4u:3162: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃbaddho 'yaṃ saṃnāha iti. evaṃ vistareṇa subhūte nāyaṃ saṃnāha
K03psp_4u:3164: yāvat subhūte nāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ sarvākārajñatāsaṃbaddhaḥ. tat (PSP_4:108)
K03psp_4u:3166: atyantatayā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā na saṃvidyate na bodhisattvo na bodhisattvasaṃnāhas tenocyate,
K03psp_4u:3167: yāvan na sarvākārajñatāsaṃbaddho 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃnāha iti. sarvadharmasaṃbaddho
K03psp_4u:3168: batāyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃnāho yair ayaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3172: asya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,
K03psp_4u:3173: evaṃ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya sthānadvayan na pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā,
K03psp_4u:3174: asthānam etat bhagavann anavakāśo 'yaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ
K03psp_4u:3175: sarvasattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā paten
K03psp_4u:3176: naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3177: na hi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sīmābaddhaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ. ity aikāntikasvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3178: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3179: kaṃ punas tvaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyann evaṃ vadasi?
K03psp_4u:3180: asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyān
K03psp_4u:3181: na dvayoḥ sthānayor anyatarānyataraṃ sthānaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā.
K03psp_4u:3183: tathā hi bhagavan na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3184: sarvasattvaparinirvāṇāya sarvākārajñatājñānasya kṛtaśo bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.
K03psp_4u:3187: na prādeśikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3188: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ parinirvāṇāya sarvākārajñatājñānasya kṛtaśo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ. ity
K03psp_4u:3190: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sā na kenacid bhāvayitavyā na kvacin na kathaṃcid bhāvayitavyā. tat kasya hetoḥ? na (PSP_4:109)
K03psp_4u:3191: hi bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kasyacid dharmasya pariniṣpattir upalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:3192: yo vā bhāvayed yaṃ vā bhāvayed yena vā bhāvayet,
K03psp_4u:3196: aparigrahabhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā.
K03psp_4u:3198: kasya subhūte bhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
K03psp_4u:3200: rūpabhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārabbhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
K03psp_4u:3204: dānapāramitābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā śīlapāramitābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
K03psp_4u:3209: adhyātmaśūnyatābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
K03psp_4u:3224: yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā.
K03psp_4u:3236: evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanodharmaḥ manovijñāna manaḥsaṃsparśamanaḥsaṃsparśapratyayavedanābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
K03psp_4u:3242: yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā avidyābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā
K03psp_4u:3253: jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsabhāvanāvibhāvanai ṣā yad uta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā. evaṃ sarvapāramitābhāvanāvibhāvanaiṣā yad uta
K03psp_4u:3261: iha subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām upaparīkṣitavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti,
K03psp_4u:3262: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nābhiniviśeta so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣitavyo,
K03psp_4u:3263: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3264: yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nābhiniviśeta so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva
K03psp_4u:3265: upaparīkṣitavyaḥ. evam adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ nābhiniviśeta,
K03psp_4u:3271: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ nābhiniviśeta so 'vinivartanīyo
K03psp_4u:3272: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3273: caran na parabhāṣitāni na paramantritāni sārataḥ parataḥ paśyati so 'vinivartanīyo
K03psp_4u:3275: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na parasya śraddhayā gacchati so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
K03psp_4u:3277: gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rāgasahitaiś cittotpādaiḥ saṃhriyate na doṣamohasahagataiś
K03psp_4u:3278: cittotpādaiḥ saṃhriyate so 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva upaparīkṣitavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:3279: yaḥ kaścid avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3280: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
K03psp_4u:3281: na cāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ prajñāpāramitayā cāvirahito bhavati,
K03psp_4u:3282: abhinandati prajñāpāramitāśravaṇaṃ śrutvā codgṛhṇāti paryavāpnoti dhārayati vācayati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tathatvāya pratipadyate,
K03psp_4u:3283: veditavyam etat subhūte pūrvāntato 'py anenāvinivartanīyena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_4u:3284: iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā udgṛhītā paryavāptā dhāritā vācitā yoniśaś ca
K03psp_4u:3285: manasikṛtā tathatvāya pratipannā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3286: tathā hi avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3287: bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate
K03psp_4u:3288: na cāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na pratyudāvartate uttare ca śrutvā udgṛhṇāti paryavāpnoti
K03psp_4u:3289: dhārayati vācayati yoniśaś ca manasikaroti tathatvāya pratipadyate. ity anabhiniveśasvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3291: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3292: nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na cāsya
K03psp_4u:3294: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vyavacārayitavyā?
K03psp_4u:3296: sarvākārajñatā nimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vyavacārayitavyā.
K03psp_4u:3298: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvākārajñatā nimnayā saṃtatyā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati?
K03psp_4u:3300: śūnyatānimnayā śūnyatāpravaṇayā śūnyatāprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā
K03psp_4u:3305: yāvad bhūtakoṭinimnayā bhūtakoṭipravaṇayā bhūtakoṭiprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā,
K03psp_4u:3307: iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati. svapnanimnayā nirmāṇanimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā,
K03psp_4u:3310: pratibimbanimnayā gandharvanagaranimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati.
K03psp_4u:3313: śūnyatānimnayā śūnyatāpravaṇayā śūnyatāprāgbhārayā saṃtatyā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3316: pravaṇayā prāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām iha gambhīrāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3317: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyavacāraṇā bhavati. kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_4u:3326: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvat sarvākārajñatām api vyavacārayati?
K03psp_4u:3328: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpaṃ vyavacārayati,
K03psp_4u:3329: na vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ vyavacārayati,
K03psp_4u:3336: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ vyavacārayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3337: tathā hi subhūte sarvākārajñatā na kenacit kṛtā na kutaścid āgatā na kvacid gatā nāpi kvacit sthitā na deśasthā na pradeśasthā na tasyāḥ saṃkhyā
K03psp_4u:3339: yasyāś ca na saṃkhyā na gamanaṃ nāgamanam upalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:3341: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārair na vijñānena na skandhair na dhātubhir nāyatanair na pratītyasamutpādena na pratītyasamutpādāṅgair,
K03psp_4u:3342: na dānena na śīlena na kṣāntyā na vīryeṇa na dhyānena na prajñayā yāvan na sarvākārajñatā jñānenābhisaṃboddhum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3345: vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3346: tathā hi subhūte yā ca rūpasya tathatā,
K03psp_4u:3348: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:3351: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
K03psp_4u:3354: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
K03psp_4u:3357: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca pāramitātathatā,
K03psp_4u:3367: yā ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
K03psp_4u:3368: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā divyāni candanacūrṇāni gṛhītvā divyāny
K03psp_4u:3371: yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tiṣṭhan,
K03psp_4u:3372: ekānte sthitāś ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
K03psp_4u:3373: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā durdṛśā duranubodhātarkātarkāvacarā śāntā śūkṣmā
K03psp_4u:3374: nipuṇapaṇḍitavijñavedanīyā sarvalokavipratyanīkā yad uta tathāgatānāṃ bodhir yatra
K03psp_4u:3376: evaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām evaṃ nipuṇāṃ nirdiśanti,
K03psp_4u:3379: vijñānam eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3381: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
K03psp_4u:3386: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā,
K03psp_4u:3389: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca yāvad buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tathatā,
K03psp_4u:3390: yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā.
K03psp_4u:3391: evam ukte bhagavāṃs tān kāmāvacārān rūpāvacārāṃś ca devaputrān etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3393: rūpam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā rūpaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3395: vijñānam eva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrā vijñānam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3396: yā ca rūpasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā,
K03psp_4u:3397: yā ca vedanāyās tathatā yā ca saṃjñāyās tathatā yā ca saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā,
K03psp_4u:3398: yā ca vijñānasya tathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda eva sarvākārajñatā,
K03psp_4u:3400: yā ca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. dānapāramitaiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva (PSP_4:116)
K03psp_4u:3403: prajñāpāramitaiva devaputrāḥ sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3405: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā,
K03psp_4u:3407: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. adhyātmaśūnyataiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivādhyātmaśūnyatā,
K03psp_4u:3408: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyataiva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3410: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. smṛtyupasthānāny eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva smṛtyupasthānāi,
K03psp_4u:3411: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3412: yā ca smṛtyupasthānatathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ yā ca samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3413: yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3414: yā cāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattitathatā yā ca sarvākārajñatātathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayāadvaidhīkārā.
K03psp_4u:3416: āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataivāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3418: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathathā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhā,
K03psp_4u:3419: buddhā eva sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñataiva buddhāḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3421: yā ca sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. idam api devaputrā
K03psp_4u:3422: arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgato 'lpotsukatāyāṃ cittaṃ nāmayāmāsa na dharmadeśanāyām. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3424: dharmo durdṛśo duranubodho 'tarko 'tarkāvacaraḥ śāntaḥ śūkṣmaḥ paṇḍitavijñavedanīyaḥ sarvalokavipratyanīko yad uteyaṃ tathāgatānāṃ bodhiḥ,
K03psp_4u:3425: sā na kenacid abhisaṃbuddhā na kadācid abhisaṃbuddhā na kvacid abhisaṃbuddhā iyaṃ
K03psp_4u:3426: sā dharmāṇāṃ gambhīratā dharmatā yatra na dvayasamudācāro nādvayasamudācāraḥ saṃvidyate.
K03psp_4u:3429: tathatāgambhīratayā dharmadhātugambhīratayā bhūtakoṭīgambhīratayā acintyadharmadhātugambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3432: devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ. rūpagambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3434: skandhagambhīratayā dhātugambhīratayāyatanagambhīratayā pratītyasamutpādagambhīratayā pratītyasamutpādāṅgagambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ
K03psp_4u:3436: śīlapāramitāgambhīratayā kṣāntipāramitāgambhīratayā vīryapāramitāgambhīratayā dhyānapāramitāgambhīratayā prajñāpāramitāgambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3437: adhyātmaśūnyatāgambhīratayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāgambhīratayā devaputrā gambhīro 'yaṃ dharmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3443: evam ukte devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
K03psp_4u:3444: sarvalokavipratyanīko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3445: nāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo rūpasyodgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate,
K03psp_4u:3446: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:3447: na vijñānasyodgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate, na (PSP_4:118)
K03psp_4u:3449: vā deśyate. evaṃ na sarvaśūnyatānāṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipkṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇām
K03psp_4u:3450: udgrahāya vā nānudgrahāya vā dharma upadeśyate,
K03psp_4u:3451: na sarvadharmāṇām udgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā dharmo deśyate,
K03psp_4u:3452: nāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya udgrahāya nānudgrahāya vā deśyate. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:3453: na sakṛdāgāmiphalasya nānāgāmiphalasya nārhattvasya na pratyekabodher yāvat sarvākārajñatāyā
K03psp_4u:3455: udgrahe ca lokaś carati mama rūpaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3456: mama vedanā mama saṃjñā mama saṃskārā mama vijñānaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3457: mama skandhā mama dhātavo mamāyatanāni mama pratītyasamutpādo 'haṃ pratītyasamutpannaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3458: mama dānam ahaṃ dānapatir mama śīlam ahaṃ śīlavān mama kṣāntir ahaṃ kṣāntimān mama vīryam ahaṃ vīryavān mama dhyānam ahaṃ dhyānavān mama prajñā ahaṃ prajñāvān,
K03psp_4u:3459: mamādhyātmaśūnyatā aham adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayāmi yāvan mamābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāham abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayāmi,
K03psp_4u:3461: mamāryasatyāni mamābhijñā mama vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni mama śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni
K03psp_4u:3463: mama srotaāpattiphalam ahaṃ srotaāpanno mama sakṛdāgāmiphalam ahaṃ sakṛdāgāmī mamānāgāmiphalam
K03psp_4u:3464: aham anāgāmī mamārhattvam aham arhan mama pratyekabodhir ahaṃ pratyekabuddho mama
K03psp_4u:3468: nāyaṃ devaputrā dharmo rūpasyodgrahāya deśyate nānudgrahāya,
K03psp_4u:3469: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:3470: na vijñānasyodgrahāya deśyate nānudgrahāya. ye tu devaputrā rūpasyodgrahāya caranti,
K03psp_4u:3473: na te bhavyāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayitum. ye skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādānām udgrahāya caranti,
K03psp_4u:3478: na te bhavyāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayituṃ yāvan na pratibalā dhyānavīryakṣāntiśīladānapāramitāṃ bhāvayituṃ,
K03psp_4u:3479: yāvan na pratibalāḥ sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayitum. iti sarvalokavipratyanīkasvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3484: yāvad dhyānapāramitā vīryapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā śīlapāramitā dānapāramitānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3493: sarvākārajñatānulomiko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ. nāyaṃ dharmaḥ kvacit pratihanyate rūpe na pratihanyate,
K03psp_4u:3494: evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne na pratihanyate,
K03psp_4u:3500: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ na pratihanyate. apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ dharmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3526: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
K03psp_4u:3527: anujāto 'yaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3528: tathā hi yadyad eva deśayati sarvatac chūnyatānimittāpraṇihitam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati.
K03psp_4u:3529: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtis tān kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān āmantrayāmāsa:
K03psp_4u:3532: kim ity anujātatvāt subhūtiḥ sthaviro 'nujātas tathāgatasya?
K03psp_4u:3535: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatasyānujātaḥ. yā tathāgatasya tathatā sā sarvadharmatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3536: yā sarvadharmatathatā sā tathāgatatathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3537: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yā tathāgatatathatā sā sthititathatā yā sthititathatā sā tathāgatatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3538: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatāvikārā nirvikārā,
K03psp_4u:3539: evaṃ hi subhūteḥ sthavirasya tathatāvikārā nirvikārā yathā tathāgatasya tathatā na
K03psp_4u:3540: kvacit pratihanyate. evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā na kvacit pratihanyate. yā ca tathāgatatathatā
K03psp_4u:3542: ekaivaiṣā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā na sā kadācin na tathatā,
K03psp_4u:3543: yataḥ sā na kadācin na tathatā tataḥ sā tathatādvayādvaidhīkārā. evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatā sarvatragāvikalpā
K03psp_4u:3544: evaṃ hi subhūtitathatā sarvatragāvikalpā nirvikalpā. yathā tathāgatatathatā abhinnā abhedatathatānupalabhyā,
K03psp_4u:3545: evaṃ subhūtitathatā abhinnā abhedatathatānupalabhyā. evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatānanyatathatā sarvadharmatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3546: yā na sā kadācin na tathatā,
K03psp_4u:3547: sadā sā tathatā tathaiva subhūtisthaviro 'nanyatathatā yā tathāgatam anujāto na kvacid anujātaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3548: evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviras tathāgatam anujātaḥ. yathā tathāgatatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
K03psp_4u:3549: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā. evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviratathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā,
K03psp_4u:3550: evaṃ hi subhūtisthaviras tathāgatam anujāta iti ucyate. atītatathatāsamatayā tathāgatatathatāsamatātathāgatatathatāsamatayātītatathatāsamatā,
K03psp_4u:3553: iti hy atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram.
K03psp_4u:3557: iti hi tathāgatatathatā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. skandhatathatayā tathāgatatathatā tathāgatatathatayā
K03psp_4u:3562: iti hi skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad (PSP_4:122)
K03psp_4u:3565: ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. dānapāramitātathatayā tathāgatatathatā
K03psp_4u:3570: evaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātathatayā tathāgatatathatā tathāgatatathatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātathatā,
K03psp_4u:3571: iti hy adhyātmaśūnyatātathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca,
K03psp_4u:3572: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātathatā ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. smṛtyupasthānatathatayā tathāgatatathatā tathāgatatathatayā
K03psp_4u:3575: ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattitathatayā
K03psp_4u:3579: ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitatathatayā
K03psp_4u:3583: iti hi śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitatathatā cāryasatyatathatā cābhijñātathatā ca tathāgatatathatā
K03psp_4u:3588: cāveṇikabuddhadharmatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. sarvākārajñatātathatayā tathāgatatathatā tathāgatatathatayā sarvākārajñatātathatā,
K03psp_4u:3589: iti hi sarvākārajñatātathatā ca tathāgatatathatā cādvayam etad advaidhīkāram. iyaṃ
K03psp_4u:3590: sā subhūte tathāgatatathatāyāṃ tathatām āgamya tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:3591: abhisaṃbuddhas tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate. asmin khalu punas tathatāparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe,
K03psp_4u:3592: yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāram aṣṭādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate,
K03psp_4u:3598: pūrvā dig unnamati paścimā dig avanamati,
K03psp_4u:3599: paścimā dig unnamati pūrvā dig avanamati,
K03psp_4u:3600: uttarā dig unnamati dakṣiṇā dig avanamati,
K03psp_4u:3601: dakṣiṇā dig unnamati uttarā dig avanamati,
K03psp_4u:3604: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā divyaiś candanacūrṇair bhagavantaṃ subhūtisthaviraṃ cābhyavakirann evaṃ ca vācam abhāṣanta,
K03psp_4u:3605: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad ayaṃ subhūtisthaviras tathāgatatathatayā tathāgatam anujātaḥ. ity agatisvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3606: atha khalu subhūtisthaviras teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ tām eva kathām anubadhnāti sma,
K03psp_4u:3607: iti hi devaputrāḥ subhūtisthaviro na rūpam anujāto na rūpasya tathatām anujāto,
K03psp_4u:3612: nānyatra vijñānatathatāyā anujātaḥ na skandhadhātvāyatanam anujāto na skandhadhātvāyatanatathatām
K03psp_4u:3613: anujāto nānyatra skandhadhātvāyatanatathatāyā anujātaḥ na pratītyasamutpādam anujāto
K03psp_4u:3615: nānyatra pratītyasamutpādatathatāyā anujātaḥ. evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā
K03psp_4u:3621: nānyatra saṃskṛtatathatāyā anujātaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3622: tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yo vānujāyeta yena vānujāyeta,
K03psp_4u:3623: yo vānujanyeta yena vānujanyeta. ity ajātisvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3624: atha khalv āyuṣmāc chāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3625: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavaṃs tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātusthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir,
K03psp_4u:3626: yatra na rūpam upalabhyate na rūpatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3627: yadā rūpam eva nopalabhyate kutaḥ punā rūpatathatopalapsyate,
K03psp_4u:3628: yatra na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
K03psp_4u:3629: yatra na vijñānam upalabhyate na vijñānatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3630: yadā vijñānam eva nopalabhyate kutaḥ punar vijñānatathatopalapsyate. yatra na skandhadhātvāyatanāny upalabhyante na skandhadhātvāyatanatathatā,
K03psp_4u:3632: kutaḥ punaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanatathatopalapsyate. yatra na pratītyasamutpādo na pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni copalabhyante na pratītyasamutpādatathatā na pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā vā,
K03psp_4u:3633: yadā pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny eva vā nopalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:3634: kutaḥ punaḥ pratītyasamutpādatathatā pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā vopalapsyate. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:3646: rūpam eva nopalabhyate kutaḥ punā rūpasya tathatopalapsyate,
K03psp_4u:3647: yatra na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
K03psp_4u:3648: na vijñānam upalabhyate na vijñānasya tathatopalabhyate vijñānam eva nopalabhyate kuto vijñānasya tathatopalapsyate. (PSP_4:125)
K03psp_4u:3649: yatra na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādā upalabhyante na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya tathatopalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:3651: kutaḥ punaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya tathatopalapsyate. evaṃ yāvan na sarvākārajñatopalabhyate na sarvākārajñatāyās tathatopalabhyate sarvākārajñataiva nopalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:3652: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvākārajñatāyās tathatopalapsyate. asyāṃ khalu punaḥ śāriputra tathatāyām
K03psp_4u:3653: avitathatāyām ananyatathatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhikṣuśatadvayasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
K03psp_4u:3654: pañcānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddhaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3656: ṣaṣṭeś ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ parihāṇadharmakāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni.
K03psp_4u:3657: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputras teṣāṃ bodhisattvānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni viditvā bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3658: ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yad eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni?
K03psp_4u:3660: etaiś ca śāriputra bodhisattvaiḥ pañcabuddhaśatāni paryupāsitāni sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānāny utpāditāni prajñā bhāvitā,
K03psp_4u:3661: te prajñāpāramitayā virahitatvād upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhītatvād evaṃ caritāḥ,
K03psp_4u:3662: vayaṃ dānaṃ dadāmo vayaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣāmo vayaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayāmo vayaṃ vīryam ārabhāmahe vayaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyāmahe vayaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3663: te prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād anupāyakauśalena dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñāṃ bhāvayāmāsuḥ,
K03psp_4u:3664: te nānātvasaṃjñāyāṃ caranto nānātvopalabdhyā bodhisattvaniyāmaṃ nāvakrāmanti,
K03psp_4u:3665: te bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakrāmantaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptā yāvad arhattvaṃ prāptāḥ,
K03psp_4u:3666: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām asti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā nimittaṃ vā
K03psp_4u:3667: praṇihitaṃ vā te prajñāpāramitayā virahitā upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhītā bhūtakoṭiṃ
K03psp_4u:3670: kena kāraṇena bhagavaṃs tair evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair dharmaiḥ subhāvitaiḥ
K03psp_4u:3671: prajñāpāramitayā virahitā upāyakauśalyena cāparigṛhītā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkṛtvā śrāvakā
K03psp_4u:3672: bhavanti. bodhisattvāḥ punar bhagavaṃs tair evaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair dharmaiḥ
K03psp_4u:3673: subhāvitaiḥ prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ cāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyante?
K03psp_4u:3676: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān dharmān bhāvayann upāyakauśalyam anāgamya śrāvako bhavati.
K03psp_4u:3677: aparaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahitaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān
K03psp_4u:3678: dharmān bhāvayann upāyakauśalena bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmaty anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:3679: abhisaṃbuddhyate. tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuner yojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhaved,
K03psp_4u:3680: dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet,
K03psp_4u:3681: sa devebhyas trayastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpam āgantavyaṃ manyeta,
K03psp_4u:3682: sa ca pakṣī śakunir apakṣo bhavet,
K03psp_4u:3683: sa devebhyas trayastriṃśebhya ātmānaṃ parimoktavyaṃ manyeta jambūdvīpaṃ gamiṣyāmīti. atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakuner ardhapatitasyaltad abhavat,
K03psp_4u:3684: aho batāhaṃ deveṣu trayastriṃśeṣu pratitiṣṭheyam iti. tat kiṃ manyase śāriputrāpi nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3691: aho batāham akṣato 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratitiṣṭheyam iti. tat kiṃ manyase śāriputrāpi nu sa pakṣī śakunir akṣato 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratitiṣṭhet?
K03psp_4u:3694: kṣataś cāsau bhagavann upahataś cāprāpta eva jambūdvīpaṃ maraṇaṃ nigacchet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3695: evam etad bhavati bhagavan yasya mahāṃś cātmabhāvo bhavati,
K03psp_4u:3696: ajātapakṣaś ca dūrāc ca viprakṛṣṭāt prapatati.
K03psp_4u:3698: evam eva śāriputra kiñ cāpi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān avagamya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_4u:3699: tasya ca mahat prasthānaṃ mahāṃś cittotpādo 'pramāṇaparigraho 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
K03psp_4u:3701: virahitaḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3702: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāvirahitena cittena dānaṃ dattaṃ
K03psp_4u:3703: bhavati śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānāny utpāditāni sa
K03psp_4u:3705: tena sa śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. kiñ cāpi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:3708: na ca sa tathāgatānāṃ śīlaṃ jānāti samādhiṃ jānāti prajñāṃ jānāti vimuktiṃ jānāti vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ jānāti,
K03psp_4u:3709: so 'jānan na budhyamānaḥ śūnyatāyām ānimitte praṇihite vā śāntiṃ śṛṇoti sa tāṃ śāntiṃ
K03psp_4u:3710: nimittīkaroti nimittataś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati. evaṃ hi pariṇāmayan
K03psp_4u:3711: bodhisattvaḥ sthāsyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3712: evam etac chāriputra yaḥ prajñāpāramitayopāyakauśalena ca virahito bhavati,
K03psp_4u:3713: na ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_4u:3714: sa śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati. iti tathatānupalambhasvabhāvaḥ
K03psp_4u:3716: yaḥ punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatācittenāvirahito
K03psp_4u:3717: dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānāni ca samāpadyate
K03psp_4u:3719: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān bhāvayati na ca nimittīkaroti yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāvayati na ca nimittīkaroti. iti sāmānyena mokṣabhāgīyam
K03psp_4u:3720: sa ca prajñāpāramitayopāyakauśalyena cāvirahitas traiyadhvikān buddhān samanvāharati,
K03psp_4u:3721: teṣāṃ cātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatayaś ca śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3722: tatsarvaṃ na nimittīkaroti na śūnyatāsamādhiṃ nimittīkaroti ānimittasamādhim apraṇihitasamādhiṃ
K03psp_4u:3723: na nimittīkaroti veditavyam etac chāriputra nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau
K03psp_4u:3726: akṣato 'nupahato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. iti śraddhātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
K03psp_4u:3728: tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dattaṃ na ca nimittīkṛtaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3729: śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannaṃ prajñā bhāvitā na ca nimittīkṛtā,
K03psp_4u:3731: idaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tad upāyakauśalyaṃ yan nimittavirahitena
K03psp_4u:3732: cittena dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate
K03psp_4u:3737: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān bhāvayati yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati na ca nimittīkaroti. iti vīryātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
K03psp_4u:3740: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā copāyakauśalyena cāvirahitāśayas tasyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. iti smṛtyātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
K03psp_4u:3742: tathā hi bhagavan tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya na
K03psp_4u:3743: kaścid dharma upalabdho yo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena cābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ cābhisaṃbudhyeta
K03psp_4u:3744: rūpaṃ vā vedanā vā saṃjñā vā saṃskārā vā vijñānaṃ vā,
K03psp_4u:3745: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādo vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā sarvapāramitā
K03psp_4u:3746: vā sarvaśūnyatā vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā vā dharmā āryasatyāni vā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo
K03psp_4u:3748: vā buddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā vā. ye punar ime bhagavan bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrāḥ
K03psp_4u:3749: kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahitā upāyakauśalyavirahitāś ca saṃśayas teṣāṃ
K03psp_4u:3752: tathā hi bhagavaṃs tair bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitair yadyad eva dānaṃ dattaṃ tatsarvaṃ nimittīkṛtya dattam,
K03psp_4u:3753: evaṃ yadyad eva śīlaṃ rakṣitaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryam ārabdhaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3754: yā caiva prajñā vyavacāritā sā sarvā nimittīkṛtya vyavacāritā. tasmāt saṃśayas teṣāṃ
K03psp_4u:3755: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:3756: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena
K03psp_4u:3759: dānaṃ dātavyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ dhyānaṃ
K03psp_4u:3760: samāpattavyaṃ prajñā bhāvayitavyā. ānimittasahagatena cittena adhyātmaśūnyatā bhāvayitavyā,
K03psp_4u:3761: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvayitavyā. ānimittasahagatena cittena smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayitavyāni. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni,
K03psp_4u:3762: ānimittasahagatena cittenāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo bhāvayitavyaḥ. ānimittasahagatena cittenāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ
K03psp_4u:3768: atha khalu kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantam etad avocan:
K03psp_4u:3770: yatra hi sarvākāraiś ca nāma bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvadharmā 'bhisaṃboddhavyās te ca dharmā na saṃvidyanti nopalabhyante.
K03psp_4u:3775: na ca me kaścid dharma upalabdho yo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena cābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ cābhisaṃbudhyeta. (PSP_4:130)
K03psp_4u:3777: atyantaviśuddhatvād devaputrāḥ sarvadharmāṇām. iti prajñātmakaṃ mokṣabhāgiyam
K03psp_4u:3778: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3781: yathā punar ahaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi. yathā ca mama bhavati,
K03psp_4u:3782: tathā svabhisaṃbodhā bhagavann anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3783: tathā hi bhagavan na kaścid abhisaṃbudhyate na kenacid abhisaṃbudhyate na kiñcid abhisaṃboddhavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3785: śūnyeṣu bhagavan sarvadharmeṣu sa dharmo na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:3786: yo 'bhisaṃbudhyeta yena vābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ vābhisaṃbudhyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3788: yasyāpi dharmasya vṛddhaye vā prahāṇāya vā dānaṃ vā dadyāt,
K03psp_4u:3789: śīlaṃ vā rakṣet kṣāntiṃ vā saṃpādayet vīryaṃ vā ārabheta dhyānaṃ vā samāpadyeta,
K03psp_4u:3792: yaś cābhisaṃbudhyeta yena cābhisaṃbudhyeta yaṃ cābhisaṃbudhyeta sarve te dharmāḥ
K03psp_4u:3793: śūnyāḥ. anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa svabhisaṃbodhā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām anuttarā
K03psp_4u:3795: tathā hi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvena śūnyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3805: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3806: anenāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3807: tathā hy āyuṣman subhūte nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:3808: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. evam evāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:3809: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:3812: atha ca punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva ākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:3813: sacet punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākāśasamān sarvadharmān adhimucya svabhisaṃbodhā
K03psp_4u:3814: syād anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir na durabhisaṃbhavā na tv evaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā
K03psp_4u:3815: vivarterann anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher. anenāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa vijñāyate
K03psp_4u:3818: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3829: evaṃ vistareṇa skandhadhātava āyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni
K03psp_4u:3838: āyuṣman śāriputrānyatra rūpāt sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:3844: śāriputrānyatra vijñānāt sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:3847: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
K03psp_4u:3848: daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāḥ yāvad anyatra sarvākārajñatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:3853: śāriputra yā rūpasya tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K03psp_4u:3855: yā vijñānasya tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ vistareṇa skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaḥ
K03psp_4u:3858: yā āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K03psp_4u:3859: yāvat yā sarvākārajñatāyās tathatā sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:3864: śāriputrānyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
K03psp_4u:3867: śāriputrānyatra vijñānatathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ vistareṇānyatra skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādatathatāyā,
K03psp_4u:3873: anyatra sarvākārajñatātathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:3882: evaṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭīḥ.
K03psp_4u:3892: āyuṣman śāriputrānyatra tathatāyāḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ dharmatāyā dharmadhātor dharmasthititāyā dharmaniyāmatāyā
K03psp_4u:3893: anyatrācintyadhātoḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
K03psp_4u:3897: evaṃ satyataḥ sthititas teṣu dharmeṣv anupalambhamāneṣu,
K03psp_4u:3898: katamaḥ sa dharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
K03psp_4u:3899: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3901: tayā na kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartiṣyate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. ya ime trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ tathāgatenākhyātāḥ,
K03psp_4u:3902: eṣāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ na bhaviṣyati. eka eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati yad uta bodhisattvayāniko yathāyuṣmataḥ subhūter nirdeśaḥ.
K03psp_4u:3903: atha khalv āyuṣmān Pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3904: kiṃ punar āyuṣman śāriputra subhūtiḥ sthavira ekam api bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam icchati,
K03psp_4u:3906: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3907: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte ekam api bodhisattvayānikaṃ bodhisattvam icchasi?
K03psp_4u:3908: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat: (PSP_4:134)
K03psp_4u:3909: kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ chāriputra tathatāyāṃ trīn bodhisattvān icchasi,
K03psp_4u:3910: śrāvakayānikaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvayānikaṃ vā bodhisattvam icchasi?
K03psp_4u:3914: tat kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ śāriputra tathatāyāṃ trayo bodhisattvā upalabhyante?
K03psp_4u:3918: kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ chāriputra tathatā ekato vā dvābhyāṃ vā tribhir vākārair upalabhyate?
K03psp_4u:3922: kiṃ punar āyuṣmañ śāriputra tathatāyām ekaṃ bodhisattvam upalabhate?
K03psp_4u:3926: evaṃ satyataḥ sthititas te dharmā anupalabhyamānāḥ kutaḥ punar āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:3927: ayaṃ śrāvakayāniko bodhisattvo 'yaṃ pratyekabuddhayāniko bodhisattvo 'yaṃ buddhayāniko bodhisattva ity,
K03psp_4u:3928: ayaṃ sarvadharmatathatāyāṃ prabhāvyamānāyāṃ yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittan
K03psp_4u:3929: nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati
K03psp_4u:3930: na saṃtrāsam āpadyate. ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niryāsyaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K03psp_4u:3931: tatra khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
K03psp_4u:3932: sādhu sādhu subhūte pratibhāntu te subhūte yathāpīdaṃ buddhānubhāvena,
K03psp_4u:3933: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmatathatāyāṃ prabhāvyamānāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:3934: yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī
K03psp_4u:3935: bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:3937: atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3938: katamayā bhagavan bodhyā niryāsyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
K03psp_4u:3940: anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā niryāsyaty ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. iti madhyāni mokṣabhāgīyānīty uktaṃ mokṣabhāgīyam
K03psp_4u:3941: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:3942: niryātukāmena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kathaṃ sthātavyam?
K03psp_4u:3944: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena sattvānām antike samacittatāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3961: sarvasattvā na viheṭhanācittenālambitavyāḥ. iti madhyam uṣmagatam
K03psp_4u:3962: sarvasattvānām antike mātṛcittam utpādayitavyaṃ pitṛcittam utpādayitavyaṃ bhrātṛcittam
K03psp_4u:3963: utpādayitavyaṃ bhaginīcittam utpādayitavyaṃ putracittam utpādayitavyaṃ duhitṛcittam
K03psp_4u:3964: utpādayitavyaṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitacittam utpādayitavyaṃ sarvasattvāś ca mātṛcittena
K03psp_4u:3968: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitacittenālambitavyāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryāntukāmena sthātavyam.
K03psp_4u:3970: ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativiratena bhavitavyaṃ pare ca prāṇātipātavairamaṇo samādāpayitavyāḥ,
K03psp_4u:3973: teṣāñ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena. evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryāstukāmena sthātavyam.
K03psp_4u:3982: ye cānye kāmamithyācārāt prativiratā bhavanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
K03psp_4u:3983: evam anṛtavacanāt paruṣavacanāt piśunavacanād avadyapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt,
K03psp_4u:3994: evam ātmanā ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:3997: pare ca caturthe dhyāne samādāpayitavyāś caturthadhyānasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:4003: ye cānye maitrīvihāriṇas teṣām api varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
K03psp_4u:4018: pare ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau samādāpayitavyāḥ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatteś ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:4020: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena. iti mṛdumūrdhagatam
K03psp_4u:4031: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena. iti madhyamūrdhagatam
K03psp_4u:4037: evaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad ātmanā cābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā bhāvayitavyā,
K03psp_4u:4041: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādinā n bhavitavyaṃ samanujñena.
K03psp_4u:4045: ye cānye sattvāś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
K03psp_4u:4051: ye cānye sattvā āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayanti,
K03psp_4u:4062: ye cānye sattvāś catvāry āryasatyāni bhāvayanti,
K03psp_4u:4090: ātmanā ca mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā ca paripūrayitavyā,
K03psp_4u:4091: pare ca mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca samādāpayitavyā,
K03psp_4u:4093: ye cānye mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇāṃ ca paripūrayanti, (PSP_4:139)
K03psp_4u:4100: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena sthātavyam. ity adhimātramūrdhagatam
K03psp_4u:4101: ātmanā ca duṣkhaṃ parijānāti samudayaṃ ca prajahāti nirodhaṃ ca sākṣātkaroti mārgañ ca bhāvayati,
K03psp_4u:4102: parāṃś ca duṣkhaparijñāyai samudayaprahāṇāya nirodhasākṣātkriyāyai mārgabhāvanāyai samādāpayati,
K03psp_4u:4103: duḥkhaparijñānasya samudayaprahāṇasya nirodhasākṣātkriyāyā mārgabhāvanāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K03psp_4u:4104: ye cānye duḥkhaṃ prajānanti samudayaṃ prajahati nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvanti mārgaṃ ca bhāvayanti,
K03psp_4u:4105: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti mṛdvī kṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4106: ātmanā ca srotaāpattiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_4u:4111: evam ātmanā ca sakṛdāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_4u:4112: ātmanā cānāgāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti.
K03psp_4u:4113: ātmanā cārhattvaphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_4u:4118: ātmanā ca pratyekabuddhaphalasākṣātkriyāyai jñānam utpādayati na ca pratyekabuddhaphalajñānasākṣātkriyāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_4u:4123: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti madhyā kṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4129: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena sthātavyam. ity adhimātrā kṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4139: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti mṛdavo 'gradharmāḥ
K03psp_4u:4141: parāṃś ca bodhisattvābhijñāsu samādāpayati bodhisattvābhijñānāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K03psp_4u:4143: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti madhyāgradharmāḥ
K03psp_4u:4162: saddharmasthiteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye cānye saddharmasthitiṃ parigṛhṇanti,
K03psp_4u:4163: teṣāñ ca mahāpuruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4164: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena
K03psp_4u:4165: bhavitavyam. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām upāyakauśalye
K03psp_4u:4167: anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ bhaviṣyati anāvaraṇā vedanā anāvaraṇā saṃjñā anāvaraṇāḥ saṃskārā,
K03psp_4u:4169: evaṃ vistareṇa yāvad anāvaraṇā saddharmasthitir bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4170: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataś caivaṃ rūpan na parigṛhītaṃ,
K03psp_4u:4171: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
K03psp_4u:4173: evaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā na parigṛhītā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4174: tathā hi subhūte yo rūpasyāparigraho na tad rūpaṃ,
K03psp_4u:4176: tathā hi yo vijñānasyāparigraho na tad vijñānam. evaṃ yāvad yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā
K03psp_4u:4177: aparigraho na sā sarvākārajñatā. asmin khalu punar bodhisattvasthāne bhāṣyamāṇe dvayor
K03psp_4u:4178: bodhisattvasahasrayor anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt. ity adhimātrāgradharmāḥ
K03psp_4u:4180: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4181: avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ka ākārāḥ?
K03psp_4u:4186: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4187: yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanabhūmir yā ca śrāvakabhūmir yā ca pratyekabuddhabhūmir yā
K03psp_4u:4188: ca bodhisattvabhūmir yā ca tathāgatabhūmir uktā sarvā sā tathatayāvikalpā nirvikalpādvayādvaidhīkārā,
K03psp_4u:4189: yathā ca sā tathatāvikalpā tathaiva na vikalpayaty,
K03psp_4u:4191: evam avatīrṇo yathā tathatā tathā śrutvā tato 'tikramya na kiñcid vikalpayati,
K03psp_4u:4192: na hi tās tathatāyā ekaikato nobhayato nānubhayato,
K03psp_4u:4193: na ca yatkiñcitpralāpī bhavati. arthopasaṃhitāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate nānarthopasaṃhitāṃ,
K03psp_4u:4194: na ca parasya ca kṛtākṛtaṃ vyavalokayati,
K03psp_4u:4196: subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti sāmānyenāvaivartikalakṣaṇam
K03psp_4u:4203: anākārā hi subhūte sarvadharmā aliṅgā ānimittāḥ.
K03psp_4u:4204: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4205: yadi bhagavann anākārāḥ sarvadharmā aliṅgā ānimittāḥ,
K03psp_4u:4206: katamair bhagavan dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'vinivartanīya iti nirdṛśyate?
K03psp_4u:4208: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpād vinivṛtto,
K03psp_4u:4209: vedanāyā vinivṛttaḥ saṃjñāyā vinivṛttaḥ saṃskārebhyo vinivṛtto,
K03psp_4u:4210: vijñānād vinivṛtto 'yaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4211: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ skandhebhyo vinivṛtto dhātubhyo vinivṛtta āyatanebhyo
K03psp_4u:4213: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ. yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:4215: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vinivṛttaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4224: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4225: tathā hi subhūte rūpasya svabhāvo na saṃvidyate. evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
K03psp_4u:4226: vijñānasya svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratiṣṭhet. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate,
K03psp_4u:4227: evaṃ yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ svabhāvo na saṃvidyate yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratiṣṭhet. iti nirvedhāṅgasthitasyāvaivartikalakṣaṇam
K03psp_4u:4228: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ito bahirdhānāṃ yeṣāṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ mukham ullokayati,
K03psp_4u:4229: ime bhagavantaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇājñeyaṃ jānanti dṛśyaṃ paśyanti samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prajñāṃ
K03psp_4u:4230: ca prajñāpayantīti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. na vicikitsām āpadyate na śīlavrataṃ parāmṛṣati na kudṛṣṭiṃ patati,
K03psp_4u:4232: nānyeṣāṃ devānāṃ namaskāraṃ karoti. puṣpair vā gandhair vā dhūpair vā vilepanair
K03psp_4u:4233: vā cūrṇair vā cīvarair vā cchatrair vā dhvajair vā patākābhir vā nānyeṣāṃ dātavyaṃ
K03psp_4u:4235: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4237: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4238: na narakeṣūpapadyate na yamaloke na tiryagyonyāṃ nāsureṣūpapadyate na pratyanteṣu
K03psp_4u:4239: janapadeṣūpapadyate na jaḍamūko bhavati na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate na ca strībhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_4u:4240: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4242: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate sa ātmanā ca prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4247: evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt piśunavacanāt paruṣavacanād avadyapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādād,
K03psp_4u:4253: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4254: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi daśākuśalān karmapathānnādhyāpadyate,
K03psp_4u:4255: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo (PSP_4:144)
K03psp_4u:4258: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā dānapāramitāyāṃ vartate,
K03psp_4u:4259: śīlapāramitāyāṃ vartate kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vartate vīryapāramitāyāṃ vartate dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vartate,
K03psp_4u:4262: evaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntyā saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtena prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
K03psp_4u:4263: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4264: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yānyān dharmān paryavāpnoti
K03psp_4u:4265: sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam itivṛttakaṃ yāvad avadānopadeśaṃ tattad dharmadānaṃ dadata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4266: sarvasattvānām anena dānena dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṅ gacchantu,
K03psp_4u:4267: sa tad dharmadānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_4u:4268: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4270: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kāṅkṣā nāsti vimatir nāsti vicikitsā.
K03psp_4u:4272: kena kāraṇena bhagavann avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kāṅkṣā nāsti vimatir nāsti vicikitsā?
K03psp_4u:4274: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati
K03psp_4u:4275: rūpaṃ vā vedanāṃ vā saṃjñāṃ vā saṃskārāṃ vā vijñānaṃ vā skandhān vā dhātūn vā āyatanāni
K03psp_4u:4276: vā pratītyasamutpādaṃ vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:4277: sarvapāramitā vā sarvaśūnyatā vā sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān
K03psp_4u:4278: vā dharmān apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr vā āryasatyāni vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitā
K03psp_4u:4279: vā daśatathāgatabalāni vā vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido vā āveṇikān buddhadharmān na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:4281: yatra kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā syāt,
K03psp_4u:4282: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato (PSP_4:145)
K03psp_4u:4285: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ snigdhena kāyakarmaṇā
K03psp_4u:4286: manaāpena snigdhena vākkarmaṇā manaāpena snigdhena manaskarmaṇā manaāpena kāntena
K03psp_4u:4288: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4289: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satatasamitaṃ maitreṇa
K03psp_4u:4290: kāyakarmaṇā manaāpena maitreṇa vākkarmaṇā manaāpena maitreṇa manaskarmaṇā manaāpena
K03psp_4u:4292: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4294: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcabhir nivaraṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
K03psp_4u:4296: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4298: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarveṇa sarvam anuśayo nāsti,
K03psp_4u:4299: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4301: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā na bhrāntacitto 'tikrāmati vā pratikrāmati vā,
K03psp_4u:4302: so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā upasthitasmṛtir atikrāmati,
K03psp_4u:4303: upasthitasmṛtir eva pratikrāmati. smṛtimāṃś caiva gacchati ca kramati tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ ca kalpayati na sahasā bhūmau pādāv utkṣipati,
K03psp_4u:4304: na sahasā bhūmau pādau pratikṣipati na sahasā bhūmau pādau nikṣipati,
K03psp_4u:4305: smṛtimān eva sa pādau utkṣipati pratikṣipati nikṣipati,
K03psp_4u:4307: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo (PSP_4:146)
K03psp_4u:4310: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cīvaraparibhoge na kāyajugupsito bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4311: na yūkilaś caukṣasamudācāraḥ śucisamudācāraḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'lpābādhaś ca bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4312: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4314: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni tāni aśītikrimikulasahasrāṇi kāye prativasanti kāyaṃ bhakṣayanti,
K03psp_4u:4315: tāny avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ kāye na saṃvidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4316: tathā hi subhūte tāni kuśalamūlāni bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvalokābhyudgatāni,
K03psp_4u:4317: tena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāny aśītikrimikulasahasrāṇi kāye na saṃvidyante. yathāyathā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitāni kuśalamūlāni
K03psp_4u:4318: tathātathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyapariśuddhiñ ca vākpariśuddhiñ ca cittapariśuddhiṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_4u:4319: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4321: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4322: kathaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyapariśuddhiś ca vākpariśuddhiś ca cittapariśuddhiś ca bhavati?
K03psp_4u:4324: yathāyathā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni pravardhante,
K03psp_4u:4325: tathātathā kāyacakratvaṃ vākcakratvaṃ cittacakratvaṃ ca kāyavākcittakauṭilyatāñ ca
K03psp_4u:4326: taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ pariśodhayati. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāyapariśuddhiś
K03psp_4u:4328: sa tayā kāyapariśuddhyā vākpariśuddhyā cittapariśuddhyā ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiñ cātikrāmati. iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_4u:4329: kāyapariśuddhiś ca vākpariśuddhiś ca cittapariśuddhiś ca,
K03psp_4u:4330: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4332: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na lābhasatkāraguruko bhavati na piṇḍapātaguruko bhavati yāvan na cīvaraguruko bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4334: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4336: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na mātsaryacittam
K03psp_4u:4337: utpadyate na dauḥśīlyacittam utpadyate na kṣubdhacittam utpadyate na kausīdyacittam
K03psp_4u:4338: utpadyate nāsamāhitacittam utpadyate na dauṣprajñācittam utpadyate nerṣyācittam utpadyate
K03psp_4u:4339: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:4342: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthirabuddhiś ca bhavati satkṛtya ca parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
K03psp_4u:4343: yat kiṃcit parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti tat sarvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃsyandayati yāni tāni laukikāni kṛtyāni tāni sarvāṇi prajñāpāramitām āgamya dharmatayā saṃsyandayati,
K03psp_4u:4345: yo dharmadhātau na yujyate sarvaṃ taṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujyamānaṃ samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:4348: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
K03psp_4u:4349: aṣṭau mahānirayān purato 'bhinirmāya tatraikaikasmin mahāniraye bahūni bodhisattvaśatāni
K03psp_4u:4350: bahūni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K03psp_4u:4351: dahyamānāni pacyamānāni duḥkhī tīvrī kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhavamānāny (PSP_4:148)
K03psp_4u:4354: ime te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyās tathāgatair vyākṛtās teṣu mahānarakeṣūpapannās,
K03psp_4u:4355: tvam api nairayikas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
K03psp_4u:4357: punar eva tvam etad bodhicittaṃ pratiniḥsṛjya,
K03psp_4u:4360: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
K03psp_4u:4361: veditavyaṃ vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
K03psp_4u:4362: niyato 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaivartyadhātau sthānaṃ subhūte 'navakāśo yad
K03psp_4u:4363: avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo narake vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā asureṣu vā kāyeṣūpapadyate,
K03psp_4u:4365: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4367: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4372: evaṃ mayā vīryapāramitā pariśodhayitavyā evaṃ mayā dhyānapāramitā pariśodhayitavyā,
K03psp_4u:4374: evaṃ mayā yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyā,
K03psp_4u:4375: tat sarvaṃ pratideśaya yat tvayā pūrvam atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ
K03psp_4u:4376: samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat saddharmasthitir
K03psp_4u:4377: etasminn antare yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam anumoditan tat pratideśaya tan nisṛja,
K03psp_4u:4378: yad etat tvayā śrutaṃ naitad buddhavacanaṃ naitat samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitaṃ kavikṛtakaṃ kāvyam etat,
K03psp_4u:4379: yad ahaṃ bhāṣe etad buddhavacanam etat tathāgatena bhāṣitam.
K03psp_4u:4380: saced bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣubhyati kāṅkṣati vicikitsati,
K03psp_4u:4381: veditavyam evam eṣa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vyākṛtas tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair,
K03psp_4u:4385: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kṣubhyati na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
K03psp_4u:4390: dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām aparapraṇeyaś ca bhavati yāvad anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:4391: tadyathāpi nāma arhan kṣīṇāsravo bhikṣur na parasya śraddhayā gacchati pratyakṣakārī
K03psp_4u:4392: dharmatāyām asaṃhāryo bhavati māreṇa pāpīyasā. evam eva subhūte 'navamardanīyo bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:4394: apratyudāvartanīyadharmā ca bhavati śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā buddhayānikair vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:4395: niyato 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyadhātau sthito 'parapraṇeyaś ca bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4396: sa tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāpi śraddhayā na gacchati,
K03psp_4u:4397: prāg eva śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā buddhayānikānāṃ vā prāg eva mārasya pāpīyasaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4398: prāg evānyatīrthikānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ vā śraddhayā gacchen naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4399: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:4400: yasya śraddhayā gacched rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskārāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā,
K03psp_4u:4401: rūpatathatāyā vā vedanātathatāyā vā saṃjñātathatāyā vā saṃskāratathatāyā vā vijñānatathatāyā vā,
K03psp_4u:4405: anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na samanupaśyati yāvad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathatān na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:4406: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4408: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣenāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4411: sa khalu punar māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgapratirūpakam upadekṣyati,
K03psp_4u:4412: yo 'sau mārgapratirūpakaḥ saṃsārāvacarair laukikair ākārair yadi vāsti saṃjñā yadi vā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upadekṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4414: iyaṃ pratipad yena mārgeṇa yayā pratipadā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpsyasi,
K03psp_4u:4416: anenāyuṣman mārgeṇānayā pratipadā ihaiva tvaṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kuru,
K03psp_4u:4417: na tu tāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyasi,
K03psp_4u:4418: aho batāyam ihaiva tavātmabhāvo na nirvṛtto bhavet,
K03psp_4u:4419: kutas tvam anyam ātmabhāvaṃ pratigṛhītavyaṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:4420: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na calati,
K03psp_4u:4422: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo 'yaṃ mārgapratirūpakam upadiśati,
K03psp_4u:4427: nānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sākṣātkriyāyai saṃvartate. uttare cāsya harṣa utpadyate,
K03psp_4u:4428: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo mamaitāny aṅgāny upadiśati,
K03psp_4u:4429: yāni mayaivaṃ buddhvā sarveṣv api triṣu yāneṣu śikṣitavyam.
K03psp_4u:4430: tam enaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ harṣitaṃ viditvā evaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4431: icchasi tvaṃ kulaputra tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān draṣṭuṃ yair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair
K03psp_4u:4433: gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dānapāramitā
K03psp_4u:4434: paripūritā śīlapāramitā paripūritā kṣāntipāramitā paripūritā vīryapāramitā paripūritā
K03psp_4u:4436: gaṅgānadīvālukopamāś caiva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛcchitāḥ paripraśnīkṛtā,
K03psp_4u:4437: asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair bodhisattvayāne sthātavyaṃ?
K03psp_4u:4438: kathaṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā sthātavyam? evaṃ (PSP_4:151)
K03psp_4u:4442: yathā tair buddhair bhagavadbhir ākhyātaṃ tathā sthitvā tathā caritvā tathā yogam āpadyāpi tair eva tāvad bodhisattvair mahāsattvair anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nābhisaṃbuddhā,
K03psp_4u:4443: tathā caritais tathānuśāsitais tathā sthitais tathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvākārajñatā nānuprāptā,
K03psp_4u:4444: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāpsyasi?
K03psp_4u:4445: saced bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ vivecyamānasya cittasyānyathātvaṃ na bhavati nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:4447: bahukaro me 'yaṃ bhikṣur yo mamaitāny aṅgāny upadiśati,
K03psp_4u:4448: yair aṅgaiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpyate sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat sarvākārajñatānuprāpyate.
K03psp_4u:4449: tataḥ sa punar māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittasyānavalīnatāṃ viditvā tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe saṃbahulān bhikṣūn abhinirmiṇoti,
K03psp_4u:4451: ime te 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravā ye te 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā abhūvaṃs te 'rhattve sthitāḥ,
K03psp_4u:4452: kutaḥ punas tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase?
K03psp_4u:4455: na ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratyudāvartyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati,
K03psp_4u:4457: asthānam anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:4458: caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:4459: carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran,
K03psp_4u:4466: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4467: saced evaṃ śikṣitvā yathā tathāgatenākhyātaṃ tayā caryayāvirahitasyaibhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktair
K03psp_4u:4468: manasikārair avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate dānapāramitayā na parihīyate
K03psp_4u:4469: śīlapāramitayā na parihīyate kṣāntipāramitayā na parihīyate vīryapāramitayā na parihīyate
K03psp_4u:4470: dhyānapāramitayā na parihīyate prajñāpāramitayā na parihīyate adhyātmaśūnyatayā na
K03psp_4u:4472: na parihīyate apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhir na parihīyate śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñābhir
K03psp_4u:4475: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4476: yo mārakarmāṇi budhyate sa na parihīyate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ ebhiḥ subhūte
K03psp_4u:4477: ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K03psp_4u:4479: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4480: kuto bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti prajñāyate.
K03psp_4u:4484: dhātusaṃjñāyā āyatanasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādasaṃjñāyāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃjñāyā rāgasaṃjñāyā doṣasaṃjñāyā mohasaṃjñāyā dṛṣṭisaṃjñāyāḥ,
K03psp_4u:4485: dānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ śīlapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ vīryapāramitāsaṃjñāyā dhyānapāramitāsaṃjñāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāsaṃjñāyā vivartito,
K03psp_4u:4492: bodhisattvasaṃjñāyā vivartito yāvad buddhasaṃjñāyā vivartitaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4493: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmair
K03psp_4u:4494: bodhisattvanyāmam avakrāntaḥ. sa tam api dharmaṃ nopalabhate anupalabhamāno nābhisaṃskaroty
K03psp_4u:4495: anabhisaṃskurvan notpādayati tenocyate 'nutpādakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya ity,
K03psp_4u:4496: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4498: punar aparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vicchandayiṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4499: ākāśasamaiṣā yad uta sarvākārajñatā ākāśabhāvanaiṣā abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇaśūnyatā,
K03psp_4u:4500: ete 'pi dharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā na cākāśasamair dharmair abhāvasvabhāvaiḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyaiḥ kaścid dharma upalabhyate,
K03psp_4u:4501: yo vābhisaṃbudhyate yena vābhisaṃbudhyate yaṃ vābhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:4502: sarva ete ākāśasamā dharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyā nirarthakaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase mārakarma etat paridīpitaṃ yad iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir
K03psp_4u:4503: naitat samyaksaṃbuddhabhāṣitam iti. tasmāt tvaṃ kulaputra pratiprasrambhaya etān
K03psp_4u:4504: manasikārān mā te dīrgharātram anarthāya duṣkhāya vinipātāya saṃvarterann iti. tatra
K03psp_4u:4505: tair bodhisattvayānikaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā tāḥ paribhāṣāḥ śrutvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:4506: mārakarmāṇo tāni yo me 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati kiṃ cāpy ākāśasamāḥ sarvadharmā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās,
K03psp_4u:4507: tān sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante tān vayam ākāśasamān abhāvasvabhāvān
K03psp_4u:4508: sarvadharmān svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāsaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbuddhya sattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:4515: prathamacittotpādam upādāya imān dharmān śrutvā dṛḍhacittair bhavitavyam aprakampacittair
K03psp_4u:4517: ta ime yair dṛḍhacittatāyai aprakampacittatāyai asaṃhāryacittatāyai samanvāgatāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caranto bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmayiṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:4519: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4520: kiṃ punar bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ utāho vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo
K03psp_4u:4521: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4525: kathaṃ bhagavann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
K03psp_4u:4526: kathaṃ ca vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ?
K03psp_4u:4528: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā vinivartito 'yaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vaktavyaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4529: yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā
K03psp_4u:4531: vaktavyaḥ. ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgatasyāvinivartanīyasya
K03psp_4u:4533: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo māreṇa pāpīyasā na śakyate vivecayitum anuttarāyāḥ
K03psp_4u:4535: punar aparaṃ subhūte ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_4u:4538: ākāṅkṣann avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni samāpadyate samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān samāpadyate,
K03psp_4u:4541: imaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir nirodhasamāpattibhiś ca parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_4u:4542: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgam āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ mārgaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
K03psp_4u:4545: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ parigṛhṇāti na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvaṃ parigṛhṇāti
K03psp_4u:4546: na pratyekabodhiṃ parigṛhṇāti ākāṅkṣamāṇa evaṃ saṃcintyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāvena
K03psp_4u:4547: sarvasattvānām arthaṃ karoti tam ātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir
K03psp_4u:4548: liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4550: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manasikāreṇa samanvāgato bodhicittenāvirahito na rūpaguruko bhavati na kṣaṇaguruko bhavati nāsravaguruko bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4551: na dānaguruko bhavati na śīlaguruko bhavati na kṣāntiguruko bhavati na vīryaguruko bhavati na dhyānaguruko bhavati na prajñāguruko bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4552: nāpramāṇaguruko bhavati nārūpyaguruko bhavati na samāpattiguruko bhavati nābhijñāguruko
K03psp_4u:4553: bhavati na saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyadharmaguruko bhavati na sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiguruko
K03psp_4u:4554: bhavati na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaguruko bhavati nāryasatyaguruko bhavati na vaiśāradyaguruko
K03psp_4u:4555: bhavati na pratisaṃvidguruko bhavati na samyaksaṃbodhiguruko bhavati na sattvaparipācanaguruko
K03psp_4u:4556: bhavati na buddhadarśanaguruko bhavati na kuśalamūlāvaropanaguruko bhavati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4557: tathā hi te sarvadharmā ākāśasamā abhāvasvabhāvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ. sa khalu punaḥ
K03psp_4u:4558: subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ane imena ca manasikāreṇa samanvāgataś
K03psp_4u:4559: caturbhiś ceryāpathair abhikrāmati na pratikrāmati na bhrāntacitta āgacchati na bhrāntacitto
K03psp_4u:4561: na ca sthāsyati na niṣīdiṣyati na śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati sa smṛta evāgamiṣyati gamiṣyati caṅkramiṣyati sthāsyati niṣīdiṣyati śayyāṃ kalpayiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:4562: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4564: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ paripācanāya pañcakāmaguṇān upadiśati sarvasattvānāṃ dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_4u:4566: pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ yāvad anyatarānyatarān mānuṣyakān pariṣkārān dadāti,
K03psp_4u:4568: parāṃś ca dānapāramitāyāṃ samādāpayati dānapāramitāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
K03psp_4u:4569: ye cānye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4574: ye cānye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. iti samudaye dharmajñānam
K03psp_4u:4575: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'gāram adhyāvasan jambūdvīpaṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_4u:4576: evaṃ cāturdvīpakaṃ lokadhātuṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ yāvat trisāhasraṃ mahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadāti,
K03psp_4u:4577: na ca kāmaguṇān paribhuṅkte satatasamitaṃ brahmacārī bhavati,
K03psp_4u:4578: na ca kasyacid avamardanākāraṃ janayati yenāvamardanākāreṇa paro 'nāttamanāḥ syāt,
K03psp_4u:4579: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4580: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitaṃ vajrapānir yakṣaḥ sadānubaddho bhaviṣyaty,
K03psp_4u:4581: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
K03psp_4u:4582: yathā mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satatasamitaṃ samanubaddho yāvat pañcavajrapāṇi kulāni satatasamitaṃ samanubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:4583: sa na śakyate manuṣyair amanuṣyair vāvakramanāyānavamardanīyo (PSP_4:157)
K03psp_4u:4584: bhavati sa devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā punarloke sahadharmeṇa. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4585: tasya cittaṃ na vikṣipyate bodhimanasikārād yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:4586: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nendriyāṇi vikalāni bhavanti śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtindriyaṃ samādhindriyaṃ prajñendriyaṃ sa satpuruṣo bhaviṣyati nāsatpuruṣaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4588: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ?
K03psp_4u:4590: yadā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhicittaṃ na vinaṅkṣyate,
K03psp_4u:4591: etāvatā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satpuruṣo bhavati nāsatpuruṣaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4592: ebhir api subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4593: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimanasikāraiḥ samanvāgato yāni tāni
K03psp_4u:4594: strīṇām āveśanāni vaśīkaraṇāni mantravidyauṣadhibhaiṣajyāni tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa
K03psp_4u:4595: sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvan na prayukte na ca prayojayati na ca strīṇām āveśanam anyatarānyataraṃ karoti,
K03psp_4u:4596: na striyāḥ puruṣasya vā ādeśanāprātihāryaṃ karoti,
K03psp_4u:4597: putro vā te bhaviṣyati dhītā vā te bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:4599: dīrghāyuṣko vā bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4600: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nimittaṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:4603: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti samudaye 'nvayajñānam
K03psp_4u:4604: punar aparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni
K03psp_4u:4605: liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo
K03psp_4u:4607: tān ākārāṃs tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni deśayiṣyāmi,
K03psp_4u:4608: tāni śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'ham,
K03psp_4u:4609: evaṃ bhagavann ity āyuṣmāṃ subhūtir bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt.
K03psp_4u:4611: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimanasikārair avirahito na skandhayogam anuyukto (PSP_4:158)
K03psp_4u:4612: viharati, na dhātvāyatanayogam anuyukto viharati. na pratītyasamutpādāṅgayogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4613: tathā hi sa śūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya hīnatvaṃ vā utkṛṣṭatvaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4614: na caurakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4615: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyāharaṇaṃ vā haranaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe dharmajñānam
K03psp_4u:4616: na senākathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4617: tathā hi sa prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyālpatvaṃ vā bahutvaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4618: na yuddhakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4619: tathā hi sarvadharmatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyānunayaṃ vā pratighaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na grāmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:4620: tathā hi sarvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya nicayaṃ vāsaṃnicayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nagarakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:4621: tathā hi sa ākāśaśūnyatāyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vāsaṃgrahaṃ vā samanupaśyati. na nigamakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4622: tathā hi subhūte koṭyāṃ sthito na kasyacid dharmasyātyayaṃ vānatyayaṃ vā samanupaśyati. nātmakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
