K03psp_4u:4623: evaṃ na sattvajīvajantupoṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakakathāyogam anuyukto viharati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4624: atyantaviśuddhatvāt sarvadharmāṇām anyatra prajñāpāramitākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
K03psp_4u:4625: avirahitaś ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ. iti nirodhe 'nvayajñānam
K03psp_4u:4626: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ caran na mātsaryakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
K03psp_4u:4627: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran na dauḥśīlyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
K03psp_4u:4628: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran na pratighakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
K03psp_4u:4629: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran na kauśīdyakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
K03psp_4u:4630: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran na vikṣepakathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
K03psp_4u:4631: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dauṣprajñākathāyogam anuyukto viharati,
K03psp_4u:4632: sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāṃ viharan dharmakāmaś caiva bhavati nādharmakāmaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4633: sa dharmadhātau caran na bhedyasya dharmasya varṇavādī (PSP_4:159)
K03psp_4u:4634: bhavati, samitrakāmo bhavati nāmitrakāmo buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:4635: ca mahāsattvānāṃ ye ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikāḥ kulaputrās tān apy anuttarāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:4638: darśanāya yatra lokadhātau tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_4u:4640: sa imair manasikārair rātriṃdivaṃ viharati yad uta buddhamanasikāraiḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4641: tathā hi prāyeṇa subhūte 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktān
K03psp_4u:4642: manasikārān utpādayitvā daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ karmapathair vartamānāḥ teṣu buddhakṣetreṣūpapadyante,
K03psp_4u:4643: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti.
K03psp_4u:4644: tatra prathamaṃ dhyānam utpādayitvā yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim utpādayitvā tatropapadyante,
K03psp_4u:4645: yatra saṃmukhībhūtās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K03psp_4u:4646: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ. iti mārge dharmajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4647: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:4648: carato 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitasya smṛtyupasthāne
K03psp_4u:4652: avinivartanīyo vāhaṃ na vāham avinivartanīya iti vicikitsā cāsya notpadyate. niḥsaṃśayaś ca bhavati svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4653: tathā hi so 'ṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
K03psp_4u:4654: yo vivartate vā na vā vivartate. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphalabhūmau
K03psp_4u:4655: sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati svakāyāṃ bhūmāv evaṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvabhūmau
K03psp_4u:4656: sthito buddhabhūmau sthito na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsaty,
K03psp_4u:4657: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. (PSP_4:160)
K03psp_4u:4658: sa tatrāvinivartanīyabhūmau sthito buddhakṣetrañ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_4u:4662: sarvāṇi ca tāni mārakarmāṇi budhyate buddhvā ca vidhvastāni viralīkaroti. tadyathāpi
K03psp_4u:4663: nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakarmakārī ānantaryacittenāvirahito yāvan maraṇakālam
K03psp_4u:4666: anuvartate cāsya tat paryutthānaṃ yāvan maraṇakālam. evam eva subhūte 'vinivartanīyasya
K03psp_4u:4667: bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ bhūtaṃ sthitam avinivartanīyabhūmāv
K03psp_4u:4669: na śakyate sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena vivartayitum. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4670: tathā hi tad avinivartanīyacittaṃ sadevamānuṣāsuram atikramya samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāntaṃ sa svakāyāṃ bhūmau sthitvābhijñāparamapāramitāḥ prāpya buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
K03psp_4u:4673: teṣu ca buddhakṣetreṣu kuśalamūlāny avaropayitvā tāṃś ca buddhān bhagavataḥ paripṛcchati paripraśnayati paryupāste.
K03psp_4u:4674: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tathā sthitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4675: sa māna utpannotpannāni ca mārakarmāṇy avabudhyate,
K03psp_4u:4676: utpannotpannānāñ ca mārakarmāṇāṃ vaśena na gacchati,
K03psp_4u:4677: tāni ca mārakarmāṇy upāyakauśalyena bhūtakoṭīḥ śodhayati,
K03psp_4u:4678: svakāyāñ ca bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4680: na bhūtakoṭim ekāṃ vā dve vā vikalpayati,
K03psp_4u:4681: tasya jātivinivṛttasyāpi na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4682: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyati. iti mārge dharmajñānam
K03psp_4u:4683: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu
K03psp_4u:4684: na kasyacid dharmasyotpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā saṃkleśaṃ vā vyavadānaṃ vā samanupaśyate.
K03psp_4u:4687: abhisaṃbhotsya evāham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4688: tathā hi subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
K03psp_4u:4689: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthitaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmāv,
K03psp_4u:4691: anavamardanīyaḥ svakāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4692: tathā hi subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati.
K03psp_4u:4693: sacet khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4696: na ca tvayānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdho,
K03psp_4u:4697: yena tvaṃ vyākriyathās tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:4698: na ca tvayi te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
K03psp_4u:4699: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K03psp_4u:4700: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:4701: na ca cittasyānyathā tvaṃ bhavati veditavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:4702: subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vyākṛto 'haṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4703: tathā hi mama te dharmāḥ saṃvidyante yair dharmair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākriyante 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. iti mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntiḥ
K03psp_4u:4704: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4705: mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣaḥ śrāvakatve tvaṃ kulaputra vyākṛto na tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:4707: sacet subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:4708: māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkrānto mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
K03psp_4u:4709: na ca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā samādāpayati.
K03psp_4u:4710: saced ayam asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyān buddhaveṣeṇopasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati:
K03psp_4u:4711: naitad buddhabhāṣitaṃ na śrāvakair mārabhāṣitāny etāni sūtrāṇi yatra tvaṃ carasi. veditavyam etad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān mārādhiṣṭhito vā puruṣo,
K03psp_4u:4712: yo mām amuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher vivecayati. veditavyam etat subhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ taiḥ pūrvakais tathāgatair (PSP_4:162)
K03psp_4u:4713: arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthito 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyāyāṃ bhūmau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4714: tathā hy asya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ta ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
K03psp_4u:4715: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4716: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartaniyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_4u:4717: saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti.
K03psp_4u:4718: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenaiva yogam
K03psp_4u:4720: tatra kataro dharmo yasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti
K03psp_4u:4722: iha subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti dharmaṃ deśayati,
K03psp_4u:4723: tatraike mohapuruṣāḥ pratikrośanti prativahanti naiṣa dharmo na vinayo naitac chāstuḥ śāsanam,
K03psp_4u:4724: asya subhūte kṛtaśo bodhisattvo mahāsattva ātmaparityāgam api karoti jīvitaparityāgam api karoti. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivam
K03psp_4u:4725: ye 'pi te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ bhāṣiṣyante,
K03psp_4u:4726: aham api tatra gaṇanāṃ yāsyāmy aham api tatra vyākṛto mamāpy eṣa dharmo yasya dharmasya
K03psp_4u:4727: kṛtenāham ātmaparityāgaṃ karomi jīvitaparityāgaṃ karomīmaṃ subhūte 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpaśya
K03psp_4u:4728: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtenātmaparityāgaṃ karoti jīvitaparityāgaṃ karoty,
K03psp_4u:4729: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4730: punar aparaṃ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
K03psp_4u:4731: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante taṃ sarvam udgṛhṇāti tathodgṛhītañ ca samānaṃ na vipraṇāśayati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4733: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4734: katamasyā bhagavan dhāraṇyāḥ pratilabdhatvād bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti?
K03psp_4u:4736: dhāraṇadhāraṇīpratilabdhasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntā na vipraṇaśyanti.
K03psp_4u:4738: tathāgatasyaiva bhagavann arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na śrāvakabhāṣitāni na devabhāṣitāni
K03psp_4u:4739: na nāgabhāṣitāni na yakṣabhāṣitāni na gandharvabhāṣitāni nāsurabhāṣitāni na garuḍabhāṣitāni
K03psp_4u:4742: ye kecit subhūte rutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ sarvatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4744: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārair ebhir liṅgair ebhir nimittaiḥ samanvāgato 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
K03psp_4u:4745: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4750: evam etat subhūte evam etat mahāguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
K03psp_4u:4752: parimitaguṇasamanvāgataḥ subhūte 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4753: tathā hy anenānantam aparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdham asaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhais,
K03psp_4u:4754: tatra ca jñāne sthitvāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharati yābhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir abhinirhṛtābhiḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena na śakyaḥ paryādātum.
K03psp_4u:4756: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4758: mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān ākāraliṅganimittāni nirdeṣṭuṃ yair ākārair
K03psp_4u:4759: yair liṅgair yair nimittair avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prabhāvyate sādhu
K03psp_4u:4760: bhagavan gambhīrāṇi gambhirāṇi sthānāni nirdiśatu yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_4u:4761: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caraṃś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni paripūrayati,
K03psp_4u:4770: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4772: sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ subhūte yas tvam avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām arthāya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni paripṛcchitavyāni
K03psp_4u:4773: gambhīram iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanam ānimittasyāpraṇihitasyānabhisaṃskārasyānutpādasyānirodhasyānirvāṇasyāśāntasya
K03psp_4u:4774: tathatāyā bhūtakoṭer dharmadhātor imāni tāni subhūte gambhīragambhīrāṇi sthānāni
K03psp_4u:4775: yeṣām etad adhivacanaṃ yad idaṃ nirvāṇam iti.
K03psp_4u:4777: nirvāṇasyaivaitad bhagavann adhivacanaṃ na punar bhagavan sarvadharmāṇām?
K03psp_4u:4779: sarvadharmāṇām evaitat subhūte 'dhivacanaṃ gambhīram iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4784: evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mano 'pi subhūte gambhīraṃ,
K03psp_4u:4788: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā subhūte gambhīrā. evaṃ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo,
K03psp_4u:4793: evam abdhātuḥ tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ subhūte gambhīraḥ. pratītyasamutpādaḥ subhūte gambhīro,
K03psp_4u:4795: evaṃ saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśo vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātir jarāmaraṇaṃ śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ subhūte
K03psp_4u:4801: bodhir api subhūte gambhīrā. kathañ ca punaḥ subhūte rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ?
K03psp_4u:4812: yathā bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā tathā gambhīraṃ,
K03psp_4u:4817: yathā bodhitathatā tathā gambhīram. iti bhāvanāmārgagāmbhīryam
K03psp_4u:4821: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na rūpaṃ nānyatra rūpād,
K03psp_4u:4822: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na vedanā nānyatra vedanāyāḥ,
K03psp_4u:4823: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na saṃjñā nānyatra saṃjñayāḥ,
K03psp_4u:4824: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na saṃskārā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo,
K03psp_4u:4825: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na vijñānaṃ nānyatra vijñānād. evaṃ yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na skandhadhātvāyatanāni nānyatra skandhadhātvāyatanebhyo,
K03psp_4u:4826: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na pratītyasamutpādo nānyatra pratītyasamutpādād,
K03psp_4u:4827: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na pratītyasamutpādaṅgāni nānyatra pratītyasamutpādāṅgebhyo,
K03psp_4u:4828: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na sarvapāramitā nānyatra sarvapāramitābhyo,
K03psp_4u:4829: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na sarvaśūnyatā nānyatra sarvaśūnyatābhyo,
K03psp_4u:4830: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nānyatra bodhipakṣebhyo dharmebhyo,
K03psp_4u:4834: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ nāveṇikābuddhadharmā nānyatrāveṇikebhyo buddhadharmebhyo,
K03psp_4u:4835: yatra subhūte tathatāyāṃ na bodhir nānyatra bodheḥ tathatā.
K03psp_4u:4836: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4837: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat sūkṣmeṇopāyenāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpataś ca vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam. evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo,
K03psp_4u:4838: vijñānataś ca vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitaṃ,
K03psp_4u:4839: sarvadharmasaṃgrahe 'py asya laukikalokottareṇa sāsraveṇānāsraveṇa sāsravāṇāsravebhyo vārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam.
K03psp_4u:4841: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4842: yadā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīragambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyaty upanidhyāsyati. iti bhāvanāpathaḥ
K03psp_4u:4843: evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ājñaptam,
K03psp_4u:4844: evaṃ mayā śikṣitavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām ākhyātam,
K03psp_4u:4845: evaṃ mayā pratipattavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyām uddiṣṭam ity. ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:4846: mahāsattvaḥ tathā saṃpādayaṃs tathopanidhyāyaṃs tathopaparīkṣamāṇas tathā prayujyamānas
K03psp_4u:4849: sa tena cittotpādenāsaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇakuśalamūlaṃ parigrahīṣyaty aparimāṇāt kalpāt saṃsārāc chorayiṣyati vipṛṣṭhīkariṣyati vyantīkariṣyati,
K03psp_4u:4850: kaḥ punar vādo yadāvyavakīrṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃś caran bodhipratisaṃyuktair manasikārair
K03psp_4u:4851: vihariṣyati. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritas tasyānyatarayā
K03psp_4u:4852: striyā sārdham abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt sā ca
K03psp_4u:4853: strī paraparigṛhītā na labhate gṛhato niṣkramaṇāya. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:4854: subhūte kiṃ pratisaṃyuktās tasya puruṣasya vitarkā varterann iti.
K03psp_4u:4856: strīpratisaṃyuktā evaṃ bhagavaṃs tasya puruṣasya vitarkā varterann,
K03psp_4u:4857: iyaṃ me strī āgatā etayā sārdhaṃ niṣīdiṣyāmi pratikramiṣyāmi paricārayiṣyāmīti.
K03psp_4u:4860: subhūte rātryā vā divasasya vātyayena kiyantas tasya puruṣasya vitarkā varteran.
K03psp_4u:4862: bahavo bhagavan bahavaḥ sugata tasya puruṣasya divasasya vātyayena rātryā vātyayena vitarkā varteran.
K03psp_4u:4864: yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasya vātyayena rātryā vātyayena vitarkā vartante,
K03psp_4u:4865: iyataḥ kalpān sa bodhi sattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃsārāc chorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti vyantīkaroti
K03psp_4u:4866: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ śikṣate upaparīkṣate upanidhyāyati
K03psp_4u:4868: yathā yathā tān doṣān vivarjayati yair doṣair bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ
K03psp_4u:4869: samyaksaṃbodheḥ. evaṃ yogan anuyuktasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānena
K03psp_4u:4870: vihāreṇa viharato yathā prajñāpāramitāyām upadiṣṭāyām ekadivasena yat kuśalamūlaṃ
K03psp_4u:4871: yena kuśalamūlena gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paripūrṇāḥ syur,
K03psp_4u:4872: nedaṃ tasya kuśalasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm
K03psp_4u:4873: api yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam
K03psp_4u:4874: api upaniśām api upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
K03psp_4u:4876: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K03psp_4u:4877: kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt triṣu ratneṣu buddharatne dharmaratne saṃgharatne. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:4878: subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:4883: ayam eva tataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K03psp_4u:4884: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4885: eṣa hi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgo yenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
K03psp_4u:4888: subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed,
K03psp_4u:4889: evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiṣv anāgāmiṣv arhatsu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet,
K03psp_4u:4890: pratyekabuddheṣu tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:4891: subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:4896: ayam eva tataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_4u:4897: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ yogam āpadyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4898: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim
K03psp_4u:4899: atikramya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_4u:4902: subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K03psp_4u:4903: kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ
K03psp_4u:4904: samāpadyeta prajñāṃ bhāvayet tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:4909: ataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_4u:4910: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvaikadivasam api dānaṃ
K03psp_4u:4911: dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ samāpadyeta prajñāṃ
K03psp_4u:4913: mātaiṣā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā janayitrī caiṣā bodhisattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:4914: mahāsattvānāṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitā. atra hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā bodhisattvā
K03psp_4u:4918: subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhan sattvebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadyāt. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:4919: subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:4924: ataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K03psp_4u:4925: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvaikadivasam api sattvebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadyāt. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4926: tathā hi subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaḥ (PSP_4:169)
K03psp_4u:4927: sa sarvākārajñatayāvirahito yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayāvirahitaḥ,
K03psp_4u:4928: tasmat tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitayāvirahitena bhavitavyam.
K03psp_4u:4931: subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K03psp_4u:4932: kalpān yogam āpadyeta caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir
K03psp_4u:4933: yogam āpadyeta caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ
K03psp_4u:4934: pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭaṅgena mārgeṇa yogam
K03psp_4u:4935: āpadyeta caturbhir āryasatyair aṣṭabhir vimokṣair navabhir anupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ
K03psp_4u:4936: śūnyatānimittā praṇihitasamādhibhir yāvad aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikabuddhadharmair yogam
K03psp_4u:4938: subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:4943: ataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
K03psp_4u:4944: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyām ekam api divasaṃ yogam āpadyeta
K03psp_4u:4945: caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ caturbhiḥ
K03psp_4u:4946: smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ
K03psp_4u:4947: pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhir
K03psp_4u:4948: yāvad aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair yogam āpadyeta. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:4949: asthānaṃ subhūte 'navakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahitaḥ
K03psp_4u:4950: sarvākārajñatāyā vivartate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. sthānañ ca khalu punaḥ subhūte
K03psp_4u:4951: 'vakāśaś ca yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā virahitaḥ sarvākārajñatāyā vivartate,
K03psp_4u:4952: sthānam etad vidyate. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitayāvirahitena bhavitavyam.
K03psp_4u:4956: virahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃs tiṣṭhaṃs tad āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānaṃ tābhyāṃ pratisaṃlayanapratisaṃyuktān manasikārān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:4957: subhūte 'pi nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:4962: ataḥ sa subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K03psp_4u:4963: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvaikadivasam api tad āmiṣadānaṃ
K03psp_4u:4966: eṣa hi paramaḥ pariṇāmo yad uta prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmaḥ. yaḥ punaḥ prajñāpāramitayā
K03psp_4u:4967: virahitaḥ pariṇāmo na sa pariṇāmaḥ. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:4971: subhūte yaḥ kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prajñāpāramitāvirahito gaṅgānadīvālukopamān
K03psp_4u:4972: kalpāṃs tiṣṭhann atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ
K03psp_4u:4973: yaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam anumodyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:4974: subhūte 'pi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:4979: ataḥ subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
K03psp_4u:4980: ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ sthitvā ekadivasam api yaṃ kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet. tat kasya
K03psp_4u:4981: eṣa hi paramo 'numodanāpariṇāmo yad uta prajñāpāramitānumodanā pariṇāmas,
K03psp_4u:4982: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitānumodanāpariṇāmanā kuśalamūlena bhavitavyam.
K03psp_4u:4984: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:4985: yadā punar bhagavann abhisaṃskāraḥ kalpita ity ukto bhagavatā tadā kathaṃ sa (PSP_4:171)
K03psp_4u:4986: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet?
K03psp_4u:4987: na ca bhagavann abhisaṃskāreṇa śakyā samyagdṛṣṭir vā niyāmo vāvakramituṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ
K03psp_4u:4988: vānuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vānuprāptuṃ pratyekāṃ
K03psp_4u:4989: vā bodhim anuprāptum anuttarāṃ samyak saṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum. iti vipakṣo mṛdumadhyaḥ
K03psp_4u:4992: na hy abhisaṃskāreṇa śakyā samyagdṛṣṭir vā niyāmo vāvakramituṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ
K03psp_4u:4993: vā anuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vānuprāptuṃ pratyekāṃ
K03psp_4u:4994: vā bodhim anuprāptum anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ,
K03psp_4u:4995: sa cāpi subhūte abhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka evākhyāyate,
K03psp_4u:4999: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ suśikṣito bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5001: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo iha śūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā yathā yathābhisaṃskārān pratyavekṣate tathā tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati,
K03psp_4u:5002: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito bhavati tathā tathāsaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
K03psp_4u:5003: ity arthakṣiptavipakṣasya mṛdumṛduḥ pratipakṣo 'dhimātrādhimātraḥ iti bhāvanāmārgasthāvaivartikalakṣaṇam
K03psp_4u:5005: asaṃkhyeyasya ca bhagavann aprameyasya cāparimāṇasya ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ?
K03psp_4u:5008: asaṃkhyeyam iti subhūte yasya saṃkhyā na vidyate yaḥ saṃkhyān nopaiti,
K03psp_4u:5009: asaṃkhyeyam iti vā apramāṇam iti vā subhūte yasya pramāṇan nopalabhyate 'tītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu,
K03psp_4u:5010: aparimāṇam iti subhūte yan na śakyaṃ pramātum.
K03psp_4u:5012: syād bhagavan paryāyo yad rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
K03psp_4u:5013: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam api bhagavann asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
K03psp_4u:5015: syāt subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa rūpam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
K03psp_4u:5017: vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syād ity asaṃkhyeyādīnām upalakṣaṇām.
K03psp_4u:5018: katamena bhagavan paryāyeṇa rūpam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt,
K03psp_4u:5020: vijñānam apy asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt?
K03psp_4u:5022: rūpaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃ khyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5024: vijñānaṃ subhūte śūnyam asaṃkhyeyam aprameyam aparimāṇaṃ syāt.
K03psp_4u:5026: kiṃ punar bhagavan rūpam eva śūnyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5032: subhūte na mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity ākhyātāḥ.
K03psp_4u:5035: ye ca bhagavan śūnyā akṣayā api te,
K03psp_4u:5036: asaṃkhyeyā api te aprameyā api te,
K03psp_4u:5042: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate.
K03psp_4u:5045: naiṣāṃ dharmāṇām arthato vā vyañjanato vā nānākaraṇam upalabhyate. anabhilapyam etat subhūte tathāgatenābhilapitam,
K03psp_4u:5046: akṣayam iti vā asaṃkhyeyam iti vā aprameyam iti vā aparimāṇam iti vā śūnyam iti vā
K03psp_4u:5047: ānimittam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā anabhisaṃskāram iti vā anutpāda iti vā virāga
K03psp_4u:5048: iti vā nirodha iti vā nirvāṇam iti vā deśanāniṣpandanirdeśa eṣa subhūte tathāgatasyākṣayam
K03psp_4u:5049: iti yāvan nirvāṇam iti ceti codyapūrvakas tathāgatakaruṇāniṣpandanirdeśaḥ.
K03psp_4u:5050: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5051: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad iyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathāgatena deśyate,
K03psp_4u:5052: sā ca dharmatā anabhilapyā yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi,
K03psp_4u:5057: yā subhūte dharmāṇām anabhilapyatā sā śūnyatā,
K03psp_4u:5060: kiṃ punar bhagavann anabhilāpyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā?
K03psp_4u:5062: na subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇir.
K03psp_4u:5064: saced bhagavann anabhilapyasyārthasya nāpi vṛddhir nāpi parihāṇiḥ,
K03psp_4u:5065: dānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5066: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5067: prajñāpāramitāyā api na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5068: caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5069: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5070: aṣṭānāṃ vimokṣāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5071: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīnām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnām āryasatyānāṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñānaṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5072: daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānāṃ caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ pratisaṃvidāṃ na vṛddhir
K03psp_4u:5073: na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā
K03psp_4u:5074: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5075: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati. saced bhagavann āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5076: yāvad aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ na vṛddhir na parihāṇir bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5077: tadā abhavyā hi bhagavan sarvākārajñatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum ity anabhilapyasya hānivṛddhyā bhāvena codyam.
K03psp_4u:5080: nānabhilapyasyārthasya vṛddhir vā parihāṇir vā. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya
K03psp_4u:5081: mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5088: 'haṃ dānapāramitayā vivarddhe. eṣa ca punar asyaivaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:5091: caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
K03psp_4u:5093: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tān manasikārāṃs tāṃś
K03psp_4u:5094: cittotpādāṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati yathānuttarā
K03psp_4u:5096: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5097: katamā ca punar bhagavann anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
K03psp_4u:5101: katamaiṣā bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ tathatā yānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ?
K03psp_4u:5103: yā subhūte rūpasya tathatā yā vedanāyās tathatā yā saṃjñayāḥ tathatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ tathatā yā vijñānasya tathatā,
K03psp_4u:5104: evaṃ yā skandhatathatā yā dhātutathatā yā āyatanatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādatathatā yā pratītyasamutpādāṅgatathatā,
K03psp_4u:5105: evaṃ yāvad yā nirvāṇasya tathatā sānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
K03psp_4u:5106: sā naiva vivarddhate na parihīyate. tat subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayāvirahito 'bhīksṇaṃ bahulaṃ viharati,
K03psp_4u:5107: na kasyacid dharmasya vṛddhiṃ vā parihāṇiṃ vā samanupaśyati. evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya naiva vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
K03psp_4u:5108: evaṃ ca subhūte dānapāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
K03psp_4u:5109: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāyā na vṛddhir na parihāṇir,
K03psp_4u:5110: evaṃ śūnyatānāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām āryasatyānām apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ
K03psp_4u:5112: daśānāṃ balānāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratisaṃvidām aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:5113: na vṛddhir na parihāṇiḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5117: tat kiṃ prathamacittotpādena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5118: utāho paścimena cittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K03psp_4u:5119: yadi tāvad bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādenānuttarāṃ (PSP_4:175)
K03psp_4u:5123: evam asamavasṛtānāṃ bhagavaṃś cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ kuśalamūlāny upacayaṃ gacchanti,
K03psp_4u:5124: na cānupacitaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum?
K03psp_4u:5127: tena hi subhūte upamāṃ te kariṣyāmy asyaivārthasya vijñāpanāya,
K03psp_4u:5128: upamayā ihaikatyā vidvāṃsaḥ puruṣā bhāṣitasyārtham ājñāsyanti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K03psp_4u:5129: subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalitasya dīpyamānāyāṃ vartau prathamābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
K03psp_4u:5132: na bhagavan prathamābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā na ca prathamābhinipātam anāgamyārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
K03psp_4u:5133: na bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā,
K03psp_4u:5134: na ca paścimābhinipātam anāgamyārciṣaḥ sā vartir dagdhā.
K03psp_4u:5137: subhūte api nu sā vartir dagdhā.
K03psp_4u:5141: evam eva subhūte na prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5142: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5143: na ca paścimacittotpādena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5144: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:5145: abhisaṃbudhyate. abhisaṃbudhyate ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:5146: atra hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam
K03psp_4u:5147: upādāya daśa bhūmīḥ paripūrayitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_4u:5149: katamā bhagavan daśa bhūmīḥ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
K03psp_4u:5151: śuklavipaśyanābhūmiṃ subhūte paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5152: evaṃ gotrabhūmim aṣṭamakabhūmiṃ darśanabhūmiṃ tanubhūmiṃ vītarāgabhūmiṃ kṛtāvībhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:5154: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5155: bodhisattvabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5156: buddhabhūmiṃ paripūrayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5157: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśasu bhūmiṣu śikṣamāṇo na ca prathamacittotpādenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5158: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5160: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5161: abhisaṃbudhyate ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhim.
K03psp_4u:5166: na ca prathamacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5167: na ca nāma bhagavan paścimena cittotpādena,
K03psp_4u:5168: na ca paścimacittotpādam anāgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate,
K03psp_4u:5169: abhisaṃbudhyate ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim.
K03psp_4u:5172: subhūte yac cittaṃ niruddham api nu tat punar evotpatsyate.
K03psp_4u:5177: subhūte yac cittam utpannam api nu tan nirodhadharmi.
K03psp_4u:5192: subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā bhūtakoṭir bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_4u:5212: subhūte api nu tathatā tathatāṃ samanupaśyati.
K03psp_4u:5228: sa na kutracic carati. tat kasya hetos?
K03psp_4u:5229: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ete samudācārā na bhavanti,
K03psp_4u:5230: na samudācaranti tathatāyāṃ sthitasya na bhagavan kiñcit samudācārati,
K03psp_4u:5231: nāpi tatra kaścit samudācarati. iti caryāgāmbhīryam
K03psp_4u:5232: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5233: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati sa kutra carati?
K03psp_4u:5235: carati bhagavan paramārthe yatra dvayasamudācāro na saṃvidyate.
K03psp_4u:5238: subhūte yaḥ paramārthe carati samudācāre carati,
K03psp_4u:5244: subhūte api nu tena nimittasaṃjñā vānimittasaṃjñā vā vibhāvitā bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5248: tat kathaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nimittasaṃjñā vā ānimittasaṃjñā vā na vibhāvitā bhavati?
K03psp_4u:5249: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5250: na bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ prayujyate,
K03psp_4u:5251: nimittaṃ vā bhāvayiṣyāmy animittaṃ vā bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
K03psp_4u:5252: iha punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nāparipūrṇair
K03psp_4u:5253: daśabhis tathāgatabalair caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir mahāmaitryā
K03psp_4u:5254: mahākaruṇayā aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_4u:5255: idaṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena
K03psp_4u:5256: na kaṃcid dharmaṃ bhāvī vā karoty abhāvī vā karoti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5257: tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitas,
K03psp_4u:5258: tatra ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ sthitvā trīn samādhīn samāpadyate,
K03psp_4u:5259: sattvānāṃ kṛtaśas taiś ca samādhibhiḥ sattvān paripācayati.
K03psp_4u:5260: evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trīn samādhīn samāpadyate,
K03psp_4u:5261: tatra ca bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvas trīṣu samādhiṣu sthitvā sattvāṃś ca praṇidhānena caratas tān apraṇihitena niyojayati,
K03psp_4u:5262: sattvāṃś ca vikalpe caratas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati,
K03psp_4u:5263: sattvāṃś ca nimitte caratas tān bodhisattvo mahāsattva ānimitte pratiṣṭhāpayati.
K03psp_4u:5264: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tribhiḥ samādhibhiḥ
K03psp_4u:5266: ity upāyakauśalaṃ gāmbhīryam ity uktaḥ śaikṣo 'vaivartiko gaṇaḥ
K03psp_4u:5267: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma:
K03psp_4u:5268: ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatas trīn samādhīn samāpadyate śūnyatām ānimittam apraṇihitam,
K03psp_4u:5270: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5271: yady āyuṣman śāriputra divase bhāvanayā vivardhate,
K03psp_4u:5272: evaṃ svapnāntaragato 'pi vivardhate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5273: avikalpaḥ, atha khalv āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaś ca,
K03psp_4u:5274: saced āyuṣman śāriputra yadi divase bodhisattvasya (PSP_4:179)
K03psp_4u:5276: tadā svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhaviṣyati. iti bhavaśāntyor akalpanā
K03psp_4u:5277: evam ukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5278: yat punar āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragataḥ karma karoti,
K03psp_4u:5279: bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā,
K03psp_4u:5281: tathā nāsya bhavaty ācayo vā upacayo vā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5282: na hi svapne kasyacid dharmasyācavo vā upacayo vā upalabhyate. atha vibuddho vikalpayiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5284: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5286: yaś ca svapnāntare hatas taṃ prativibudho vikalpayati,
K03psp_4u:5287: aho hato mayā hataḥ sādhu hata iti,
K03psp_4u:5290: nāyuṣman subhūte anārambaṇakarmotpadyate sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate.
K03psp_4u:5292: evam etad āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ cetanotpadyate
K03psp_4u:5293: sārambaṇam evāyuṣman śāriputra karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ sārambaṇā cetanotpadyate
K03psp_4u:5295: nādṛṣṭair nāśrutair nāmatair nāvijñātair dharmair buddhiḥ pravartate. tatra kācid buddhiḥ saṃkleśaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
K03psp_4u:5297: tasmāt tarhy āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate nānārambaṇā.
K03psp_4u:5299: yady āyuṣman subhūte sarvāṇi karmāṇi sarvāś cetanā viviktā uktā bhagavatā,
K03psp_4u:5300: tat kathaṃ sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5303: nimittīkṛtyāyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇam eva karmotpadyate nānārambaṇaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5305: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ subhūtiṃ sthaviram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5306: yady āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāc chīlaṃ rakṣet kṣāntyā saṃpādayed vīryam ārabheta dhyānaṃ (PSP_4:180)
K03psp_4u:5308: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet pariṇāmitaṃ bhavaty anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
K03psp_4u:5309: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5310: ayam āyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūta ekajātipratibaddho bhagavatāvinivartanīyatāyai vyākṛta eṣa paripraṣṭavya eṣa visarjayiṣyati.
K03psp_4u:5311: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5313: ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūta ekajātipratibaddho bhagavato 'vinivartanīyatāyai vyākṛta eṣa paripraṣṭavya eṣa visarjayiṣyatīti.
K03psp_4u:5314: evam ukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5315: tat kiṃ nāmadheyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo visarjayiṣyaty,
K03psp_4u:5320: yā vedanāśūnyatā yā saṃjñāśūnyatā yā saṃskāraśūnyatā,
K03psp_4u:5322: yā ca rūpasya śūnyatā na sā pratibalā visarjayituṃ,
K03psp_4u:5323: yā vedanāyāḥ śūnyatā yā saṃjñāyāḥ śūnyatā yā saṃskārāṇāṃ śūnyatā yā vijñānasya śūnyatā na sā pratibalā visarjayitum?
K03psp_4u:5324: tat kiṃ visarjayiṣyati nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
K03psp_4u:5328: tam apy ahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
K03psp_4u:5332: tam apy ahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi sarva ete dharmā advayā advaidhīkārāḥ.
K03psp_4u:5333: atha khalv āyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5334: kaścit tvayā maitreya ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtā yathaitān dharmān bhāṣase?
K03psp_4u:5336: na mayaite dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtā yathāham etān dharmān bhāṣe.
K03psp_4u:5338: gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathāpi nāma dānapāramitāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5341: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5343: śāriputra samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yena tvaṃ dharmeṇārhann iti prabhāvyase.
K03psp_4u:5347: evam eva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavaty,
K03psp_4u:5348: ayaṃ dharmo vyākariṣyaty ayaṃ dharmo vyākriyate ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate. evañ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati,
K03psp_4u:5350: nāhaṃ nābhisaṃbhotsye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye 'ham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ,
K03psp_4u:5351: yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ carati sa carati prajñāpāramitāyām. evañ caran śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
K03psp_4u:5352: nāhaṃ nābhisaṃbhotsye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye 'ham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim.
K03psp_4u:5354: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5355: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāñ caratā jighatsitān sattvān
K03psp_4u:5356: dṛṣṭvā pipāsitān durnivasitān duḥprāvṛtān śayanāsanavihīnāṃś ca sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5357: tathā tathā dānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaiṣāṃ
K03psp_4u:5358: sattvānām amī doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāpsyante. yathāpi tac cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ
K03psp_4u:5359: devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ
K03psp_4u:5360: brahmapārṣadyānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ mahābrahmaṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānāṃ ābhāsvarāṇāṃ
K03psp_4u:5361: parīttaśubhānām apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānām anabhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ vṛhatphalānāṃ
K03psp_4u:5362: śuddhāvāsānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ sudarśanānām aspṛhānām atapānām akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānām upabhogaparibhogāya,
K03psp_4u:5363: evaṃvidhās tasmin buddhakṣetre sattvānām upabhogaparibhogā bhaviṣyanti. evañ caran
K03psp_4u:5364: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāyāś ca samyaksaṃbodher abhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5365: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā prāṇātipātikān
K03psp_4u:5366: sattvān dṛṣṭvā adattādāyikān kāmamithyācārikān mṛṣāvādikān pāruṣikān piśunavacanān
K03psp_4u:5368: mithyādṛṣṭikān alpāyuṣkān bahvābādhān bahvāyāsān durvarṇān alpeśākhyān alpabhogān nīcakulān nihīnavṛttīn aṅgavihīnān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5369: tathā tathā śīlapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
K03psp_4u:5370: tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānām amī doṣā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. evañ
K03psp_4u:5371: caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher abhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5372: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratānyonyavyāpādabahulacittān
K03psp_4u:5373: sattvān dṛṣṭvā loṣṭatāḍanaśastraprahārāṃś ca dadato jīvitāṃś ca vyavaropayato daṇḍādaṇḍi
K03psp_4u:5374: muṣalāmuṣali keśākeśi kacākaci kurvataś ca sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5375: tathā tathā kṣāntipāramitāyāñ cariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
K03psp_4u:5376: tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānām amī doṣā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. sarvasattvāś
K03psp_4u:5382: maitracittā bhaviṣyanti. evañ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāyāś ca samyaksaṃbodher abhyāsī bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_4u:5383: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vīryapāramitāyāñ caratā hīnavīryān
K03psp_4u:5384: sattvān dṛṣṭvā kuśīdān alasān nirudyogān alpasattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ prasthitān śrāvakayānena
K03psp_4u:5385: vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā bodhisattvayānena vā sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5386: tathā tathā vīryapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
K03psp_4u:5387: tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānām amī doṣā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:5389: paripūrayaty anuttarāyāś ca samyaksaṃbodher abhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5390: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā sattvān
K03psp_4u:5391: pañcasu nivaraṇeṣu pravartamānān dṛṣṭvā kāmacchande vyāpāde styānamiddhe uddhatakaukṛtye
K03psp_4u:5393: pravartamānān sattvān mūḍhān mūḍhasmṛtīn prathamadhyānavirahitān dvitīyadhyānavirahitāṃs
K03psp_4u:5397: tathā tathā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
K03psp_4u:5398: tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānām amī doṣā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. evañ
K03psp_4u:5399: caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayaty anuttarāyāś ca
K03psp_4u:5401: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā duḥprajñān
K03psp_4u:5402: prajñāparihīṇān sattvān dṛṣṭvā laukikalokottarayā samyagdṛṣṭyā vihīnān akriyāvādino
K03psp_4u:5403: nāstikavādān ucchedavādān śāśvatavādān ekatvānyatvobhayatvavādāṃś ca sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam
K03psp_4u:5404: upaparīkṣitavyaṃ tathā tathā prajñāpāramitāyāñ cariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:5405: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhaksetre teṣāṃ sattvānām amī doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti
K03psp_4u:5406: na prajñāsyante. evañ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayaty
K03psp_4u:5408: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā triṣu rāśiṣu vartamānān sattvān dṛṣṭvā niyatāniyatamithyātvaniyatān evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5411: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5412: buddhakṣetre niyatāniyatamithyātvaniyatānāṃ sattvānām antaśaḥ śabdo 'pi na bhaviṣyati
K03psp_4u:5413: na prajñāsyate. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati
K03psp_4u:5415: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā nairayikān sattvān tairyagyonikān sattvān yāmalaukikān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam
K03psp_4u:5418: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre trayāṇām apāyānām antaśaḥ śabdo 'pi na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate.
K03psp_4u:5419: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.

K03psp_4u:5424: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānām ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti na
K03psp_4u:5425: tac ca me buddhakṣetraṃ samapāṇitalajātaṃ bhaviṣyati. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5426: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā imāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ mṛttikāmayīṃ dṛṣṭvā apagatajātarūparajatām evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5429: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5430: buddhakṣetre iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī suvarṇavālukācchannā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte
K03psp_4u:5431: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayaty anuttarāyāś ca samyaksaṃbodher abhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5432: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvān mamakāraparigrahavartamānān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5435: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5436: buddhakṣetre teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ mamakāraparigraho na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:5437: caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5438: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā caturo varṇān dṛṣṭvā kṣatriyān brahmaṇān vaiśyāñ śūdrān evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5441: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5442: buddhakṣetre caturṇāṃ varṇānām antaśaḥ śabdo na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate. evañ caran
K03psp_4u:5443: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś (PSP_4:185)
K03psp_4u:5445: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:5446: hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamatān dṛṣṭvā hīnakulīnatāṃ madhyakulīnatāṃ cotkṛṣṭakulīnatāṃ ca sattvānāṃ
K03psp_4u:5447: dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi,
K03psp_4u:5449: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5450: buddhakṣetre sattvānām amī doṣā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. evaṃ caran subhūte
K03psp_4u:5451: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5452: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sattvānāṃ varṇanānātvaṃ dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5455: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ varṇanānātvaṃ na bhaviṣyati na
K03psp_4u:5456: anyatra sarvasattvā abhirūpā bhaviṣyanti prāsādikā darśanīyā paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
K03psp_4u:5457: samanvāgatāḥ. evañ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati
K03psp_4u:5459: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā adhipatiṃ dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5462: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5463: buddhakṣetre 'dhipatiprajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate. anyatra dharmarājena
K03psp_4u:5464: tathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhena. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:5465: mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5466: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sattvānāṃ gatisaṃbhedaṃ dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5468: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyāmi sattvaṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:5469: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhaksetre sattvānāṃ gatisaṃbhedo na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate,
K03psp_4u:5474: aṣṭabhir vimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir abhijñābhir yāvac catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir.
K03psp_4u:5475: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5476: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā catasro yonīḥ sattvānāṃ dṛṣṭvāṇḍajāṃ jarāyujāṃ saṃsvedajām aupapādukāṃ dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,

K03psp_4u:5480: aṇḍajā jarāyujā saṃsvedajā anyatra sarvasattvā aupapādukā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.

K03psp_4u:5484: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5485: buddhakṣetre sarvasattvāḥ pañcābhijñā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:5486: mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5487: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sarvasattvānām uccāraprasrāvādīn dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5490: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5491: buddhakṣetre sarvasattvā dharmaprītidhyānāhārā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:5492: mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5493: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sattvān prabhāvirahitān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5496: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya (PSP_4:187)
K03psp_4u:5497: tatra buddhakṣetre sarvasattvāḥ svayaṃprabhā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākirajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5498: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sattvānāṃ rātridivasamāsārdhamāsasaṃvatsarān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5501: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5502: buddhaksetre sattvānāṃ rātridivasamāsārdhamāsasaṃvatsarāṇāṃ śabdo na bhaviṣyati na
K03psp_4u:5503: prajñāsyate. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati
K03psp_4u:5505: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratāyūrvihīnān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5508: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5509: buddhakṣetre sattvā aparimitāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K03psp_4u:5510: ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5511: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sattvān lakṣaṇavirahitān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5514: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra
K03psp_4u:5515: buddhakṣetre sattvā dvātriṃśadbhir mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ
K03psp_4u:5516: caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5517: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā sattvān kuśalamūlavirahitān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5520: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sarvasattvāḥ kuśalamūlasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:5521: yaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā buddhān bhagavata upasthāsyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati,
K03psp_4u:5523: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā rogaspṛṣṭān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5524: tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyāmi,
K03psp_4u:5525: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre sattvānāṃ catvāro vyādhayo na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. katame catvāro?
K03psp_4u:5526: vātikā vā paittikā vā śleṣmikā vā sāṃnipātikā vā. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī
K03psp_4u:5527: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā tribhiḥ kleśaiḥ kliṣṭān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5530: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre trayaḥ kleśā na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante. katamāḥ trayo?
K03psp_4u:5531: rāgo dveṣo mohaḥ. sarvasattvāś ca vigatarāgā bhaviṣyanti vigatadveṣā vigatamohā bhaviṣyanti.
K03psp_4u:5532: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5533: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratā hīnādhimuktikān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5535: buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyāmi sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:5536: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre dvayor yānayoḥ śabdo na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate,
K03psp_4u:5538: anyatra sarvasattvāḥ sarvākārajñatāyām abhisaṃprasthitā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5539: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caratābhimānikān sattvān dṛṣṭvaivam upaparikṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5542: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre 'bhimānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ śabdo 'pi na bhaviṣyati na prajñāsyate,
K03psp_4u:5543: anyatra sarvasattvā nirabhimānā bhaviṣyanti. evaṃ caran (PSP_4:189)
K03psp_4u:5544: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ piripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5545: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5547: sacet me tatra buddhakṣetre mitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ syād mitā ca prabhā,
K03psp_4u:5549: api tu khalu tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi,
K03psp_4u:5551: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetre amitam āyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5553: amitaś ca bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5554: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5555: yāvanti gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi tāvanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ yāvan na bhaven na tāvad aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye,
K03psp_4u:5556: 'pi tu khalu tathā tathā ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu cariṣyāmi,
K03psp_4u:5558: sattvāṃś ca paripācayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya yāvanti
K03psp_4u:5559: gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi bhavanti mamaikaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati.
K03psp_4u:5560: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5561: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carataivam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5563: bahur ayaṃ sattvadhātus tenaivaṃ yoniśo manasikartavyam,
K03psp_4u:5567: na ca kaścit parinirvāsyati. evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati sarvākārajñatāyāś cābhyāsī bhavati.
K03psp_4u:5568: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi gaṅgadevā nāma bhaginī saṃnipatitābhut saṃniṣaṇṇā,
K03psp_4u:5569: sotthāyāsanād ekāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jāmumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya (PSP_4:190)
K03psp_4u:5571: ahaṃ bhagavann ahaṃ sugata ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritvaivaṃrūpaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhīṣye yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddheneha prajñāpāramitāyām
K03psp_4u:5572: atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpaṃ gṛhītvā,
K03psp_4u:5576: suvarṇavarṇapītavarṇaṃ ca puṣpayugaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tena kṣipati sma. samanantarakṣiptaṃ
K03psp_4u:5577: ca tad dūṣyayugam atha tāvad eva buddhānubhāvenopari vaihāyasam antarīkṣe bhagavato
K03psp_4u:5579: caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ samaṃ bhāgaśo ghaṭitaṃ suvibhaktaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ.
K03psp_4u:5580: atha khalu sā strīs tatkūṭāgāraṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati.
K03psp_4u:5581: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāḥ striyā adhyāśayaṃ viditvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot,
K03psp_4u:5582: dharmatā khalu punar eṣā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitaṃ prāduḥ kurvanti.
K03psp_4u:5583: atha khalu tāvad evānekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo bhagavato mukhadvārād niścaranti sma.
K03psp_4u:5584: tadyathāpi nāma nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātā māñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikarajatavarṇās tān anantāparyantān
K03psp_4u:5585: lokadhātūn gatvā punar evāgatya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhny antarhitāḥ.
K03psp_4u:5586: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ cīvaraṃ pravaritvā dakṣiṇaṃ
K03psp_4u:5587: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5590: smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
K03psp_4u:5591: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5592: iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
K03psp_4u:5593: loke bhaviṣyati tārakopame kalpe 'yam ānanda etasyā gaṅgadevāyā bhaginyāś caramaḥ
K03psp_4u:5594: strībhāvo bhaviṣyati. iyam ānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivarjya puruṣabhāvaṃ
K03psp_4u:5597: sa tatra brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati. asya khalu punar ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya suvarṇapuṣpa iti nāmadheyaṃ (PSP_4:191)
K03psp_4u:5598: bhaviṣyati. sa khalu punar ānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tataś cyutaḥ samāno buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5600: tadyathāpi nāṃ ānanda rājā cakravartī prāsādena prāsādaṃ caṅkrāmati,
K03psp_4u:5601: sa yāvajjīvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ nākrāmati yāvan maraṇakālam iti. evam evānanda suvarṇapuṣpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetreṇa buddhakṣetraṃ
K03psp_4u:5604: yāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tatra buddhaksetre saṃnipatitā bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:5606: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasā cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantam ānandam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5608: tathāgatasaṃnipātaḥ sa veditavyo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaḥ saṃnipātaḥ suvarṇapuṣpasya
K03psp_4u:5609: ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhaksetre na pramāṇabaddho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
K03psp_4u:5610: na śakyaṃ tasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pramāṇaṃ kartum,
K03psp_4u:5620: khalu punar ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:5621: abhisaṃbuddhasya tatra buddhakṣetra ime doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante,
K03psp_4u:5623: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5624: kva bhagavann etayā gaṅgadevayā kuśalamūlam avaropitam?
K03psp_4u:5626: dīpaṅkarasyānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike etayā bhaginyā kuśalamūlam avaropitam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5627: tac ca kuśalamūlam anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5628: sa ca dīpaṅkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpair abhyavakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā,
K03psp_4u:5629: yadā mayā ānanda dīpaṃkaras tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pañcabhir (PSP_4:192)
K03psp_4u:5631: tadāhaṃ tena dīpaṃkareṇa bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena kuśalamūlasamanvāgato
K03psp_4u:5632: 'yam iti viditvā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhaviṣyasi tvam anāgate 'dhvani
K03psp_4u:5633: sākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid
K03psp_4u:5634: anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāñ ca buddho bhagavāṃs tadā
K03psp_4u:5635: mamaitayā bhaginyā vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittam utpāditam,
K03psp_4u:5636: aho batāham apy anāgate 'dhvani evaṃ vyākriyeyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K03psp_4u:5637: yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. evam ānandaitayā bhaginyā
K03psp_4u:5638: tasya dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamaṃ cittam anuttarāyai
K03psp_4u:5640: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5641: kṛtaparikarmā bhagavann iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
K03psp_4u:5645: kṛtaparikarmā ānandaiṣā gaṅgadevā bhaginy anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye.
K03psp_4u:5647: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5648: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃś caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
K03psp_4u:5654: yāvat kathaṃ bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ?
K03psp_4u:5657: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5658: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyam iti pratyavekṣitavyam,
K03psp_4u:5664: evaṃ yāvat kāmadhātuḥ śūnya iti pratyavekṣitavyaḥ,
K03psp_4u:5666: ārūpyadhātuḥ śūnya iti pratyavekṣitavyaḥ. tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5667: yathā pratyavekṣamāṇas tac cittaṃ na vikṣipati,
K03psp_4u:5671: asamanupaśyan na sākṣātkaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5672: tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyair dharmaiḥ suśikṣito na kasyacid dharmasya vyavacchedaṃ karoti,
K03psp_4u:5676: sarvāṃs tān dharmān na saṃyuktān na visaṃyuktān samanupaśyati.
K03psp_4u:5677: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5679: na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyā dharmāḥ sākṣātkartavyā iti. kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ sthitaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti?
K03psp_4u:5681: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
K03psp_4u:5685: nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate. asamāhita eva bodhisattvo mahāsattva āraṃbaṇe cittam upanibadhnāti,
K03psp_4u:5686: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣair dharmair,
K03psp_4u:5687: na cāsravakṣayaṃ sākṣātkaroti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5688: evam udārajñānasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5689: yo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sthita evaṃ jānāti parijayasyāyaṃ kālo nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti.
K03psp_4u:5690: tena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
K03psp_4u:5698: evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgānām āryāṣṭāṅgikasya mārgasya bhāvanāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
K03psp_4u:5700: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo bahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālo yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyā ayaṃ kālaḥ,
K03psp_4u:5706: caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānāṃ pratilābhāyāyaṃ kālaḥ pratisaṃvitpratilābhāyāyaṃ kālo, (PSP_4:194)
K03psp_4u:5714: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran śūnyatāyāṃ ca parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_4u:5719: apraṇihitena ca viharati. smṛtyupasthānāni ca bhāvayati smṛtyupasthānaiś ca viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti. evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni,
K03psp_4u:5720: āryāṣṭāṅgikaṃ ca mārgañ ca bhāvayaty āryāṣṭāṅgikena ca mārgeṇa viharati na ca sākṣātkaroti.
K03psp_4u:5721: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
K03psp_4u:5722: bodhipakṣyāṃś ca dharmān bhāvayati bodhipakṣyaiś ca dharmair viharati,
K03psp_4u:5723: na ca srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti na ca sakṛdāgāmiphalan na cānāgāmiphalan nārhattvaphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti. ity upāyakauśalaprayogaḥ
K03psp_4u:5724: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścid eva puruṣaḥ śūraś ca bhaved,
K03psp_4u:5733: sarvāsu ca catuḥṣaṣṭhiṣu kalāsu pariniṣpanno bhavet,
K03psp_4u:5734: sarvatra ca śilpasthāneṣu ca karmasthāneṣu ca gatiṃgato bhavet,
K03psp_4u:5736: sa yāṃ yām eva ca kāṃścit kriyām ārabheta sarvatra tatra tatra ca lābhasatkārasamanvāgato bhavet,
K03psp_4u:5737: tena ca bahujanaṃ satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet,
K03psp_4u:5738: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sa mātāpitṛputradārān
K03psp_4u:5739: gṛhītvā kenacid eva karaṇīyena mahābhayabhairavam aṭavīkāntāraṃ praviṣṭas syād bālānāṃ
K03psp_4u:5741: tatra ca sa puruṣaḥ praviśya tān mātāpitṛputradārān (PSP_4:195)
K03psp_4u:5743: mā bhaiṣṭa mā bhaiṣṭāhaṃ yuṣmān ito mahābhayabhairavād aṭavīkāntārād bālānāṃ bhīṣaṇāt
K03psp_4u:5744: sa romaharṣaṇāc chīghram evāpakrāmayiṣyāmi śīghram eva parimocayiṣyāmi. tasya ca
K03psp_4u:5745: puruṣasya tatrāṭavīkāntāre bahavo 'mitrā vadhakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
K03psp_4u:5746: sa ca puruṣaḥ parameṇa prajñābalena samanvāgato bhavet,
K03psp_4u:5747: sa tān parimocayitvā mātāpitṛputradārāṃs tasmād aṭavīkāntārān niṣkāśayitvā punar
K03psp_4u:5748: eva grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā janapadaṃ vā janapradeśaṃ vā gatvā prītisaumanasya
K03psp_4u:5750: na ca teṣāṃ sattvānām antike pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāṃ vā manaḥ praduṣayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5751: tathā hi sa kṛtayogyaḥ sarvāsu ca kalāsu bhavet,
K03psp_4u:5752: tena tatrāṭavīkāntāre bahutarāś ca śūratarāś ca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarāś ca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇām anye udāratarāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā abhinirmitā bhaveyuḥ,
K03psp_4u:5753: te tena bhayena sarve 'pagatā bhaveyuḥ. atha sa puruṣas tān mātāpitṛputradārān svastinā parimocayitvā sukhaṃ viharet.
K03psp_4u:5754: evam eva subhūte yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām antike maitryārambaṇena
K03psp_4u:5755: cittena karuṇāmuditopekṣārambaṇena cittena sphāritvā viharaty atrāntare subhūte bodhisattvo
K03psp_4u:5756: mahāsattvo na cānimittena vyāhriyate na cānimittasamādhiṃ sākṣātkriyayā śrāvakabhūmau
K03psp_4u:5759: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunir antarīkṣe carati na ca bhūmau patati,
K03psp_4u:5760: ākāśe vāntarīkṣe viharati na ca tatra tiṣṭhati na pratiṣṭhate. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ ca parijayaṃ karoti śūnyatayā ca viharati,
K03psp_4u:5761: ānimitte ca parijayaṃ karoty ānimittena ca viharaty,
K03psp_4u:5762: apraṇihite ca parijayaṃ karoty apraṇihitena ca viharati,
K03psp_4u:5763: na ca śūnyatāṃ vānimittaṃ vāpraṇihitaṃ vā sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_4u:5764: yayā sākṣātkriyayā śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pated,
K03psp_4u:5765: aparipūrṇair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir
K03psp_4u:5766: aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā cāparimāṇeṣu ca buddhadharmeṣu
K03psp_4u:5768: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavān iṣvastrācāryo bhaved iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ
K03psp_4u:5769: sa kāṇḍam ūrdhvamukhaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍais tasya pūrvakasya kāṇḍasya paraṃparayā
K03psp_4u:5770: pṛthivyāṃ patanaṃ na dadyāt tāvat kāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ na patati yāvat sa puruṣa ākāṅkṣet.
K03psp_4u:5771: atha khalv etat kāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nipatet,
K03psp_4u:5774: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena
K03psp_4u:5775: parigṛhītas tāvat tāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti yāvan na tāni kuśalamūlāni
K03psp_4u:5777: yadā tāni kuśalamūlāni paripakvāni bhavanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tadā tāṃ
K03psp_4u:5778: paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti. tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K03psp_4u:5779: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivam eteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatopanidhyātavyā upaparīkṣitavyāḥ.
K03psp_4u:5781: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
K03psp_4u:5782: duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya iha dharmatāyāṃ śikṣate bhūtakoṭyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5783: śikṣate dharmadhātau śikṣate atyantaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣate yāvat svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5788: tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ. yasya subhūte sarvasattvā aparityaktās tasyaivaṃrūpaḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣo
K03psp_4u:5789: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittam abhinirharati,
K03psp_4u:5791: asaṃvidyamānair dharmair vartamānāḥ śāntaṃ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukham abhinirharaty,
K03psp_4u:5794: upāyakauśalyasamanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tasmin samaye veditavyo,
K03psp_4u:5795: na cāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti yāvan na sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti. ity asādhāraṇopāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:5796: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yānīmāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣitukāmo bhavati,
K03psp_4u:5797: tadyathedam adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ (PSP_4:197)
K03psp_4u:5800: dīrgharātram ime sattvā ātmasaṃjñāyāṃ sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ jantusaṃjñāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5801: poṣasaṃjñāyāṃ puruṣasaṃjñāyāṃ pudgalasaṃjñāyāṃ manujasaṃjñāyāṃ mānavasaṃjñāyāṃ kārakasaṃjñāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5803: teṣām upalambhadṛṣṭiprahāṇāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhaṃ
K03psp_4u:5804: ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ bhāvayaty apraṇihitaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ bhāvayati samāpadyate ca na ca bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroti,
K03psp_4u:5808: tasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphalam anuprāpnuyād na sakṛdāgāmiphalan nānāgāmiphalaṃ nārhattvam anuprāpnuyāt,
K03psp_4u:5810: evaṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena cittotpādena etaiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgato
K03psp_4u:5811: nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti na ca parihīyate caturbhir apramāṇaiś caturbhir dhyānaiś
K03psp_4u:5812: catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir
K03psp_4u:5813: ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgikena
K03psp_4u:5814: mārgeṇa śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhibhir adhyātmaśūnyatayā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na parihīyate,
K03psp_4u:5822: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhair na parihīyate pañcabhir abhijñābhir daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir na parihīyate,
K03psp_4u:5824: mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā na parihīyate. evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tasmin samaye
K03psp_4u:5825: sarvabodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ samanvāgato na ca parihīyate tato yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K03psp_4u:5828: tīkṣṇatamāni cāsyendriyāṇi bhavanti yathā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhānām. ity aśaktyupāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:5829: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:5830: dīrgharātram ime sattvāś caturbhir viparyāsair viparyastacittā nityasaṃjñāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñāyāṃ śubhasaṃjñāyām ātmasaṃjñāyāñ ca teṣām arthāya bodhaye
K03psp_4u:5831: tathā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi,
K03psp_4u:5832: yathānityam iti duḥkham ity aśubham iti anātmīyam iti vā samudācāro 'pi na bhaviṣyati. so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgata upāyakauśalyena ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
K03psp_4u:5834: vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā
K03psp_4u:5837: na ca bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K03psp_4u:5838: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:5841: rūpam iti vā vedaneti vā saṃjñeti vā saṃskārā iti vā vijñānam iti vā skandhā iti
K03psp_4u:5842: vā dhātava iti vā āyatanānīti vā pratītyasamutpādā iti vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānīti
K03psp_4u:5843: vā caturbhir dhyānaiś caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhis teṣāṃ tathā
K03psp_4u:5844: kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya sattvānām ete upalambhadoṣā na bhaviṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:5845: sa imaiś cittotpādaiḥ samanvāgato 'nena copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
K03psp_4u:5846: na bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroty apūrṇair daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś
K03psp_4u:5847: catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā
K03psp_4u:5848: ca śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhaṃ tasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāvanā
K03psp_4u:5850: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:5851: dīrgharātram ime sattvā nimittena caritāḥ strīnimitteṣu vā puruṣanimitteṣu vā rūpanimitteṣu vā ārūpyanimitteṣu (PSP_4:199)
K03psp_4u:5852: vā, teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya,
K03psp_4u:5853: eṣāṃ sattvānām ime doṣā na bhaviṣyanti. sa tena cittotpādena samanvāgato 'nena copāyakauśalyena
K03psp_4u:5854: samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cāntarā bhūtakoṭīṃ sākṣātkaroty aparipūrṇair
K03psp_4u:5855: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir
K03psp_4u:5856: āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca tasya tena cittotpādena samanvāgatasyānimittasamādhivimokṣamukhaṃ
K03psp_4u:5857: tasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati. ity ānimittopāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:5858: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata evaṃ bhavati,
K03psp_4u:5859: dīrgharātram ime sattvāḥ praṇidhānena caritā yad uta śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ lokapālatvaṃ cakravartitvam abhilaṣanti rūpam abhilaṣanti evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān,
K03psp_4u:5861: teṣām aham arthāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tathā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi
K03psp_4u:5862: yathaiva te sattvānāṃ praṇidhānadoṣā na bhaviṣyantīti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya
K03psp_4u:5863: mahāsattvasya ebhiś cittotpādair ebhiś ca kuśalamūlair anena copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
K03psp_4u:5866: aparipūrṇair daśabhir balair vaiśāradyaiḥ pratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā ca yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddha
K03psp_4u:5867: asthānaiḥ subhūte 'navakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ
K03psp_4u:5870: caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu
K03psp_4u:5871: mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ caran yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu caran parijayaṃ kurvāṇa,
K03psp_4u:5872: evaṃ jñānadharmasamanvāgato 'nabhisaṃskāre vā pateta traidhātukena vā sārdhaṃ saṃvasen naitat sthānaṃ vidyate.
K03psp_4u:5874: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva eṣu bodhipākṣikeṣu (PSP_4:200)
K03psp_4u:5875: dharmeṣu caran parijayaṃ kurvāṇaḥ paripraṣṭavyaḥ. kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ
K03psp_4u:5876: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caritvā parijayaṃ kṛtvā na
K03psp_4u:5879: na srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā nāgāmiphalaṃ vārhattvaṃ vā pratyekāṃ vā bodhim anuprāpnuyāt?
K03psp_4u:5880: kathaṃ śūnyatām ānimittam apraṇihitam anabhisaṃskāram anutpādam abhāvaṃ vā sākṣātkuryāt prajñāpāramitāṃ ca bhāvayed? iti.
K03psp_4u:5881: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvair mahāsattvair evaṃ paripṛcchamāna evaṃ vyākuryāc,
K03psp_4u:5886: na ca sarvasattvāḥ parityaktavyā iti. veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5887: tathā hi yo 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parijayaṃ sūcayati taṃ vyākaroti taṃ prabhāvayati.
K03psp_4u:5888: sacet punaḥ subhūte pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākuryān,
K03psp_4u:5890: nānimitte nāpraṇihite nānabhisaṃskāre nānutpāde nābhāve na tena bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ parijayaḥ kartavyo,
K03psp_4u:5891: na ca sarvasattvāḥ samālambitavyā iti. veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5892: tathā hi yo 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parijayaṃ taṃ na sūcayati taṃ na vyākaroti taṃ na prabhāvayati,
K03psp_4u:5893: yaḥ punar avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmaṃ taṃ na sūcayati na vyākaroti na bhāvayati,
K03psp_4u:5894: veditavyam etat subhūte bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parijayaṃ
K03psp_4u:5895: kṛtvā tato bhūmer atikrānto yāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyabhūmiḥ.
K03psp_4u:5898: syāt punar bhagavan paryāyo yad avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo (PSP_4:201)
K03psp_4u:5901: syāt subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śrutvā vāśrutvā vā evaṃ visarjayed yathāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
K03psp_4u:5902: veditavyas tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair avinivartanīyo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
K03psp_4u:5904: tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhāya caranti,
K03psp_4u:5905: alpakās te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ visarjayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:5909: evam etat subhūte evam etat. tat kasya hetoḥ?
K03psp_4u:5910: tathā hi subhūte 'lpakās te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau,
K03psp_4u:5911: ye punas te vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti ta evaṃ visarjayiṣyanti,
K03psp_4u:5912: uttaptakuśalamūlās te veditavyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena. ity apramāṇaviṣayopāyaḥ
K03psp_4u:5915: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ sarvākārābhisaṃbodhādhikāras tathatāparivartaś
